296  ColorForEmpty(int r, int g, int b, int a = 255) {}
297  ~ColorForEmpty() {}
298 
299  public:
300  int alpha() const {return 0;}
301  int red() const {return 0;}
302  int green() const {return 0;}
303  int blue() const {return 0;}
304  void setRgb(int r, int g, int b, int a = 255) {}
305  bool isValid() const {return false;}
306  };

308  class MatrixForEmpty
309  {
310  public:
311  MatrixForEmpty() {}
312  MatrixForEmpty(qreal m11, qreal m12, qreal m21, qreal m22, qreal dx, qreal dy) {}
313  ~MatrixForEmpty() {}
314 
315  public:
316  MatrixForEmpty& translate(qreal dx, qreal dy) {return *this;}
317  MatrixForEmpty& scale(qreal sx, qreal sy) {return *this;}
318  MatrixForEmpty& shear(qreal sh, qreal sv) {return *this;}
319  MatrixForEmpty& rotate(qreal a) {return *this;}
320  qreal m11() const {return 0;}
321  qreal m12() const {return 0;}
322  qreal m21() const {return 0;}
323  qreal m22() const {return 0;}
324  qreal dx() const {return 0;}
325  qreal dy() const {return 0;}
326  };

472  class PaletteForEmpty
473  {
474  Q_GADGET
475 
476  public:
477  enum ColorGroup { Active, Disabled, Inactive, NColorGroups, Current, All, Normal = Active };
478  Q_ENUM(ColorGroup)
479  enum ColorRole { WindowText, Button, Light, Midlight, Dark, Mid,
480  Text, BrightText, ButtonText, Base, Window, Shadow,
481  Highlight, HighlightedText,
482  Link, LinkVisited,
483  AlternateBase,
484  NoRole,
485  ToolTipBase, ToolTipText,
486  NColorRoles = ToolTipText + 1,
487  Foreground = WindowText, Background = Window };
488  Q_ENUM(ColorRole)
489 
490  public:
491  PaletteForEmpty() {}
492  ~PaletteForEmpty() {}
493 
494  public:
495  void setColor(ColorRole cr, const ColorPrivate& color) {}
496  };

517  class PainterForEmpty : public QObject
518  {
519  Q_OBJECT
520 
521  public:
522  enum CompositionMode
523  {
524  CompositionMode_SourceOver,
525  CompositionMode_DestinationOver,
526  CompositionMode_Clear,
527  CompositionMode_Source,
528  CompositionMode_Destination,
529  CompositionMode_SourceIn,
530  CompositionMode_DestinationIn,
531  CompositionMode_SourceOut,
532  CompositionMode_DestinationOut,
533  CompositionMode_SourceAtop,
534  CompositionMode_DestinationAtop,
535  CompositionMode_Xor,
536  //svg 1.2 blend modes
537  CompositionMode_Plus,
538  CompositionMode_Multiply,
539  CompositionMode_Screen,
540  CompositionMode_Overlay,
541  CompositionMode_Darken,
542  CompositionMode_Lighten,
543  CompositionMode_ColorDodge,
544  CompositionMode_ColorBurn,
545  CompositionMode_HardLight,
546  CompositionMode_SoftLight,
547  CompositionMode_Difference,
548  CompositionMode_Exclusion,
549  // ROPs
550  RasterOp_SourceOrDestination,
551  RasterOp_SourceAndDestination,
552  RasterOp_SourceXorDestination,
553  RasterOp_NotSourceAndNotDestination,
554  RasterOp_NotSourceOrNotDestination,
555  RasterOp_NotSourceXorDestination,
556  RasterOp_NotSource,
557  RasterOp_NotSourceAndDestination,
558  RasterOp_SourceAndNotDestination,
559  RasterOp_NotSourceOrDestination,
560  RasterOp_SourceOrNotDestination,
561  RasterOp_ClearDestination,
562  RasterOp_SetDestination,
563  RasterOp_NotDestination
564  };
565  enum RenderHint
566  {
567  Antialiasing = 0x01,
568  TextAntialiasing = 0x02,
569  SmoothPixmapTransform = 0x04,
570  HighQualityAntialiasing = 0x08,
571  NonCosmeticDefaultPen = 0x10,
572  Qt4CompatiblePainting = 0x20
573  };
574  Q_FLAG(RenderHint)
575 
576  Q_DECLARE_FLAGS(RenderHints, RenderHint)
577  Q_FLAG(RenderHints)
578 
579  public:
580  PainterForEmpty() : mFontMetrics(mFont) {}
581  ~PainterForEmpty() {}
582 
583  public:
584  PaintDevicePrivate* device() const {return nullptr;}
585  bool begin(PaintDevicePrivate*) {return false;}
586  bool end() {return false;}
587  void setRenderHint(RenderHint hint, bool on = true) {}
588  void setRenderHints(RenderHints hints, bool on = true) {}
589  void setMatrix(const MatrixPrivate& matrix, bool combine = false) {mMatrix = matrix;}
590  const MatrixPrivate& matrix() const {return mMatrix;}
591  void setClipRect(const QRectF&) {}
592  QRectF clipBoundingRect() const {return QRectF();}
593  const FontPrivate& font() const {return mFont;}
594  void setFont(const FontPrivate& f) {mFont = f;}
595  FontMetricsPrivate fontMetrics() const {return mFontMetrics;}
596 
597  public:
598  MatrixPrivate mMatrix;
599  FontPrivate mFont;
600  FontMetricsPrivate mFontMetrics;
601  };
602  Q_DECLARE_OPERATORS_FOR_FLAGS(PainterForEmpty::RenderHints)

613  class ImageForEmpty : public PaintDeviceForEmpty
614  {
615  Q_OBJECT
616 
617  public:
618  enum Format {
619  Format_Invalid,
620  Format_Mono,
621  Format_MonoLSB,
622  Format_Indexed8,
623  Format_RGB32,
624  Format_ARGB32,
625  Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied,
626  Format_RGB16,
627  Format_ARGB8565_Premultiplied,
628  Format_RGB666,
629  Format_ARGB6666_Premultiplied,
630  Format_RGB555,
631  Format_ARGB8555_Premultiplied,
632  Format_RGB888,
633  Format_RGB444,
634  Format_ARGB4444_Premultiplied,
635  Format_RGBX8888,
636  Format_RGBA8888,
637  Format_RGBA8888_Premultiplied,
638  Format_BGR30,
639  Format_A2BGR30_Premultiplied,
640  Format_RGB30,
641  Format_A2RGB30_Premultiplied,
642  Format_Alpha8,
643  Format_Grayscale8,
644  #if 0
645  // reserved for future use
646  Format_Grayscale16,
647  #endif
648  #ifndef Q_QDOC
649  NImageFormats
650  #endif
651  };
652 
653  public:
654  ImageForEmpty() {}
655  ImageForEmpty(const ImageForEmpty&) {}
656  ImageForEmpty(int width, int height, Format format) {}
657  ImageForEmpty(bytes data, int width, int height, Format format) {}
658  ~ImageForEmpty() {}
659 
660  public:
661  uint08* bits() {return nullptr;}
662  bytes bits() const {return nullptr;}
663  bytes constBits() const {return nullptr;}
664  int bitPlaneCount() const {return 0;}
665  int width() const {return 0;}
666  int height() const {return 0;}
667  ImageForEmpty scaled(int w, int h) const {return ImageForEmpty();}
668  ImageForEmpty transformed(const MatrixPrivate& matrix) const {return ImageForEmpty();}
669  ImageForEmpty convertToFormat(Format f) const {return ImageForEmpty();}
670 
671  public:
672  ImageForEmpty& operator=(const ImageForEmpty&) {return *this;}
673  };

698  int height() const {return 0;}
699  ImagePrivate toImage() const {return ImagePrivate();}
700  BitmapPrivate mask() const {return BitmapPrivate();}
701 
702  public:

704  };

726  PM_SliderTickmarkOffset, //
727  PM_SliderSpaceAvailable, // available space for slider to move

729  PM_DockWidgetHandleExtent,

735  PM_TabBarBaseOverlap,

744  PM_MenuDesktopFrameWidth,
745  PM_MenuBarPanelWidth,

750  PM_IndicatorHeight,
751  PM_ExclusiveIndicatorWidth,
752  PM_ExclusiveIndicatorHeight,
753  PM_DialogButtonsSeparator,
754  PM_DialogButtonsButtonWidth,
755  PM_DialogButtonsButtonHeight,
756  PM_MdiSubWindowFrameWidth,
757  PM_MDIFrameWidth = PM_MdiSubWindowFrameWidth, // ### Qt 6: remove
758  PM_MdiSubWindowMinimizedWidth,
759  PM_MDIMinimizedWidth = PM_MdiSubWindowMinimizedWidth, // ### Qt 6: remove
760  PM_HeaderMargin,

762  PM_HeaderGripMargin,

772  PM_SpinBoxSliderHeight,
773  PM_DefaultTopLevelMargin, // ### Qt 6: remove
774  PM_DefaultChildMargin, // ### Qt 6: remove
775  PM_DefaultLayoutSpacing, // ### Qt 6: remove
776  PM_ToolBarIconSize,
777  PM_ListViewIconSize,
778  PM_IconViewIconSize,
779  PM_SmallIconSize,
780  PM_LargeIconSize,
781  PM_FocusFrameVMargin,
782  PM_FocusFrameHMargin,
783  PM_ToolTipLabelFrameWidth,
784  PM_CheckBoxLabelSpacing,
785  PM_TabBarIconSize,
786  PM_SizeGripSize,
787  PM_DockWidgetTitleMargin,
788  PM_MessageBoxIconSize,
789  PM_ButtonIconSize,
790  PM_DockWidgetTitleBarButtonMargin,
791  PM_RadioButtonLabelSpacing,
792  PM_LayoutLeftMargin,
793  PM_LayoutTopMargin,
794  PM_LayoutRightMargin,
795  PM_LayoutBottomMargin,
796  PM_LayoutHorizontalSpacing,
797  PM_LayoutVerticalSpacing,
798  PM_TabBar_ScrollButtonOverlap,
799  PM_TextCursorWidth,
800  PM_TabCloseIndicatorWidth,
801  PM_TabCloseIndicatorHeight,
802  PM_ScrollView_ScrollBarSpacing,
803  PM_ScrollView_ScrollBarOverlap,
804  PM_SubMenuOverlap,
805  PM_TreeViewIndentation,
806  PM_HeaderDefaultSectionSizeHorizontal,
807  PM_HeaderDefaultSectionSizeVertical,
808  PM_TitleBarButtonIconSize,
809  PM_TitleBarButtonSize,
810  // do not add any values below/greater than this
811  PM_CustomBase = 0xf0000000
812  };
813  Q_ENUM(PixelMetric)
814 
815  public:
816  StyleForEmpty() {}
817  ~StyleForEmpty() {}
818 
819  public:
820  int pixelMetric(PixelMetric metric) const {return 0;}
821  };

898  ~WidgetForEmpty() {}

903  void resize(const QSize&) {}
904  void resize(int w, int h) {}
905  bool isHidden() const {return false;}
906  void setAttribute(Qt::WidgetAttribute attribute, bool on = true) {}
907  void setAutoFillBackground(bool enabled) {}
908  void setFocusPolicy(Qt::FocusPolicy policy) {}
909  void setLayout(WidgetForEmpty*) {}
910  void setMouseTracking(bool enable) {}
911  void setMask(const BitmapPrivate&) {}
912  void clearMask() {}
913  void setMinimumSize(int minw, int minh) {}
914  void setMaximumSize(int maxw, int maxh) {}
915  void addAction(ActionPrivate* action) {}
916  void setWindowFlags(Qt::WindowFlags type) {}
917  Qt::WindowFlags windowFlags() const {return Qt::WindowFlags();}
918  void setWindowModality(Qt::WindowModality windowModality) {}
919  void setWindowOpacity(qreal level) {}
920  const PalettePrivate& palette() const {return mPalette;}
921  void setPalette(const PalettePrivate&) {}
922  QPoint mapToGlobal(const QPoint& pos) const {return QPoint();}
923  int minimumWidth() const {return 0;}
924  int minimumHeight() const {return 0;}
925  int maximumWidth() const {return 0;}
926  int maximumHeight() const {return 0;}
927  QPoint pos() const {return QPoint();}
928  QSize size() const {return QSize();}
929  WindowPrivate* windowHandle() const {return nullptr;}
930  Qt::WindowType windowType() const {return Qt::Widget;}
931  WIdPrivate winId() const {return WIdPrivate();}
932  int x() const {return 0;}
933  int y() const {return 0;}
934  int width() const {return 0;}
935  int height() const {return 0;}
936 
937  public Q_SLOTS:
938  bool close() {return true;}
939  void hide() {}
940  void lower() {}
941  void raise() {}
942  void repaint() {}
943  void setDisabled(bool disable) {}
944  void setEnabled(bool) {}
945  void setFocus() {}
946  void setHidden(bool hidden) {}
947  void setStyleSheet(const QString& styleSheet) {}
948  virtual void setVisible(bool visible) {}
949  void setWindowModified(bool) {}
950  void setWindowTitle(const QString& name)
951  {
952  BOSS_TRACE("┏━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━");
953  BOSS_TRACE("┃ %s", name.toUtf8().constData());
954  BOSS_TRACE("┗━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━");
955  }
956  void setWindowIcon(const IconPrivate& icon) {}
957  void show() {}
958  void showFullScreen() {}
959  void showMaximized() {}
960  void showMinimized() {}
961  void showNormal() {}
962  void update() {}
963 
964  protected:
965  virtual void changeEvent(QEvent* event) {}
966  virtual void closeEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event) {}
967  void create(WIdPrivate window = 0, bool initializeWindow = true, bool destroyOldWindow = true) {}
968  void destroy(bool destroyWindow = true, bool destroySubWindows = true) {}
969  virtual void enterEvent(QEvent* event) {}
970  virtual void focusInEvent(FocusEventPrivate* event) {}
971  bool focusNextChild() {return false;}
972  virtual bool focusNextPrevChild(bool next) {return false;}
973  virtual void focusOutEvent(FocusEventPrivate* event) {}
974  bool focusPreviousChild() {return false;}
975  virtual void keyPressEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) {}
976  virtual void keyReleaseEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) {}
977  virtual void leaveEvent(QEvent* event) {}
978  virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) {}
979  virtual void mouseMoveEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) {}
980  virtual void mousePressEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) {}
981  virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) {}
982  virtual bool nativeEvent(const QByteArray &eventType, void *message, long *result) {return false;}
983  virtual void paintEvent(PaintEventPrivate* event) {}
984  virtual void resizeEvent(ResizeEventPrivate* event) {}
985  virtual void wheelEvent(WheelEventPrivate* event) {}
986 
987  protected:
988  PalettePrivate mPalette;
989  };

1328  class MainData;

1335  class SizePolicy
1336  {
1337  public:
1338  SizePolicy();
1339  ~SizePolicy();

1346 
1347  class FTFontClass
1348  {
1349  public:
1350  FTFontClass()
1351  {
1352  mHeight = 0;
1353  }
1354  ~FTFontClass()
1355  {
1356  }
1357  FTFontClass(const FTFontClass& rhs)
1358  {
1359  operator=(rhs);
1360  }
1361  FTFontClass& operator=(const FTFontClass& rhs)
1362  {
1363  mNickName = ToReference(rhs.mNickName);
1364  mHeight = ToReference(rhs.mHeight);
1365  return *this;
1366  }
1367  public:
1368  String mNickName;
1369  sint32 mHeight;
1370  };
1371 
1372  class CanvasClass
1373  {
1374  public:
1375  CanvasClass();
1376  CanvasClass(PaintDevicePrivate* device);
1377  ~CanvasClass();
1378  public:
1379  void Bind(PaintDevicePrivate* device);
1380  void Unbind();
1381  private:
1382  void BindCore(PaintDevicePrivate* device);
1383  void UnbindCore();
1384  public:
1385  // Getter
1386  static inline CanvasClass* get() {return ST();}
1387  inline PainterPrivate& painter() {return mPainter;}
1388  inline bool is_font_ft() const {return mUseFontFT;}
1389  inline chars font_ft_nickname() const {return mFontFT.mNickName;}
1390  inline sint32 font_ft_height() const {return mFontFT.mHeight;}
1391  inline const QRect& scissor() const {return mScissor;}
1392  inline const ColorPrivate& color() const {return mColor;}
1393  // Setter
1394  inline void SetFont(chars name, sint32 size)
1395  {mUseFontFT = false; painter().setFont(FontPrivate(name, size));}
1396  inline void SetFontFT(chars nickname, sint32 height)
1397  {mUseFontFT = true; mFontFT.mNickName = nickname; mFontFT.mHeight = height;}
1398  inline void SetScissor(sint32 l, sint32 t, sint32 r, sint32 b)
1399  {
1400  mScissor = QRect(l, t, r - l, b - t);
1401  mPainter.setClipRect(mScissor);
1402  }
1403  inline void SetColor(uint08 r, uint08 g, uint08 b, uint08 a)
1404  {mColor.setRgb(r, g, b, a);}
1405  inline const PainterPrivate::CompositionMode& mask() const {return mMask;}
1406  inline void SetMask(PainterPrivate::CompositionMode mask)
1407  {mMask = mask;}
1408  private:
1409  static inline CanvasClass*& ST() {static CanvasClass* _ = nullptr; return _;}
1410  private:
1411  const bool mIsTypeSurface;
1412  bool mIsSurfaceBinded;
1413  CanvasClass* mSavedCanvas;
1414  float mSavedZoom;
1415  bool mUseFontFT;
1416  FTFontClass mFontFT;
1417  FontPrivate mSavedFont;
1418  PainterPrivate mPainter;
1419  QRect mScissor;
1420  ColorPrivate mColor;
1421  PainterPrivate::CompositionMode mMask;
1422  };
1423 
1424  class ViewAPI : public QObject
1425  {
1426  Q_OBJECT
1427 
1428  public:
1429  enum ParentType {PT_Null, PT_GenericView, PT_MainViewGL, PT_MainViewMDI};
1430  enum WidgetRequest {WR_Null, WR_NeedExit = -1, WR_NeedHide = -2};
1431 
1432  public:
1433  ViewAPI(ParentType type, buffer buf, View* manager, View::UpdaterCB cb, WidgetPrivate* data, WidgetPrivate* device)
1434  {
1435  m_parent_type = type;
1436  m_parent_buf = buf;
1437  m_parent_ptr = nullptr;
1438  m_view_manager = manager;
1439  m_next_manager = nullptr;
1440  m_view_cb = cb;
1441  m_view_data = data;
1442  m_paint_device = device;
1443  if(manager)
1444  manager->SetCallback(m_view_cb, m_view_data);
1445 
1446  m_event_blocked = false;
1447  m_width = 0;
1448  m_height = 0;
1449  m_request = WR_Null;
1450  m_paintcount = 0;
1451  m_longpress_x = 0;
1452  m_longpress_y = 0;
1453 
1454  connect(&m_tick_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &ViewAPI::tick_timeout);
1455  connect(&m_update_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &ViewAPI::update_timeout);
1456  connect(&m_tooltip_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &ViewAPI::tooltip_timeout);
1457  connect(&m_longpress_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &ViewAPI::longpress_timeout);
1458  }
1459 
1460  ViewAPI(const ViewAPI& rhs) = delete;
1461  ViewAPI& operator=(const ViewAPI& rhs) = delete;
1462 
1463  ~ViewAPI()
1464  {
1465  m_tick_timer.stop();
1466  m_update_timer.stop();
1467  m_tooltip_timer.stop();
1468  m_longpress_timer.stop();
1469 
1470  if(getParent()) sendDestroy();
1471  Buffer::Free(m_parent_buf);
1472  delete m_view_manager;
1473  delete m_next_manager;
1474  }
1475 
1476  public:
1477  inline ParentType getParentType() const
1478  {
1479  return m_parent_type;
1480  }
1481 
1482  inline void* getParent() const
1483  {
1484  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", (m_parent_buf != nullptr) != (m_parent_ptr != nullptr));
1485  return (void*) (((ublock) m_parent_buf) | ((ublock) m_parent_ptr));
1486  }
1487 
1488  inline void renewParent(void* ptr)
1489  {
1490  m_parent_buf = nullptr;
1491  m_parent_ptr = ptr;
1492 
1493  if(getParent())
1494  sendCreate();
1495  }
1496 
1497  inline bool parentIsPtr() const
1498  {
1499  return (m_parent_ptr != nullptr);
1500  }
1501 
1502  inline bool hasViewManager() const
1503  {
1504  return (m_view_manager != nullptr);
1505  }
1506 
1507  void setViewAndCreateAndSize(h_view view)
1508  {
1509  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
1510  g_view = getWidget();
1511  m_view_manager->SetView(view);
1512 
1513  sendCreate();
1514  sendSizeWhenValid();
1515  }
1516 
1517  h_view changeViewManagerAndDestroy(View* manager)
1518  {
1519  sendDestroy();
1520  h_view OldViewHandle;
1521  if(m_view_manager)
1522  {
1523  OldViewHandle = m_view_manager->SetView(h_view::null());
1524  delete m_view_manager;
1525  }
1526 
1527  m_view_manager = manager;
1528  m_view_manager->SetCallback(m_view_cb, m_view_data);
1529  return OldViewHandle;
1530  }
1531 
1532  inline void setNextViewManager(View* manager)
1533  {
1534  delete m_next_manager;
1535  m_next_manager = manager;
1536  update(1);
1537  }
1538 
1539  inline void changeViewData(WidgetPrivate* data)
1540  {
1541  m_view_data = data;
1542  if(m_view_manager)
1543  m_view_manager->SetCallback(m_view_cb, m_view_data);
1544  }
1545 
1546  inline ViewClass* getClass() const
1547  {
1548  return (ViewClass*) m_view_manager->GetClass();
1549  }
1550 
1551  inline WidgetPrivate* getWidget() const
1552  {
1553  if(m_view_manager)
1554  {
1555  if(m_view_data)
1556  return m_view_data;
1557  if(m_view_manager->IsNative())
1558  return (WidgetPrivate*) m_view_manager->GetClass();
1559  }
1560  return (WidgetPrivate*) getParent();
1561  }
1562 
1563  inline WidgetPrivate* getWidgetForPaint() const
1564  {
1565  if(m_paint_device)
1566  return m_paint_device;
1567  return getWidget();
1568  }
1569 
1570  inline void render(sint32 width, sint32 height)
1571  {
1572  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
1573  g_view = getWidget();
1574  m_view_manager->OnRender(width, height, 0, 0, width, height);
1575 
1576  if(m_next_manager)
1577  {
1578  h_view OldViewHandle = changeViewManagerAndDestroy(m_next_manager);
1579  setViewAndCreateAndSize(OldViewHandle);
1580  m_next_manager = nullptr;
1581  }
1582  }
1583 
1584  inline void touch(TouchType type, sint32 id, sint32 x, sint32 y)
1585  {
1586  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
1587  g_view = getWidget();
1588  m_view_manager->OnTouch(type, id, x, y);
1589  }
1590 
1591  inline void key(sint32 code, chars text, bool pressed)
1592  {
1593  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
1594  g_view = getWidget();
1595  m_view_manager->OnKey(code, text, pressed);
1596  }
1597 
1598  inline void sendCreate()
1599  {
1600  if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
1601  {
1602  g_view = getWidget();
1603  m_view_manager->OnCreate();
1604  m_tick_timer.start(1000 / USER_FRAMECOUNT);
1605  }
1606  }
1607 
1608  inline bool canQuit()
1609  {
1610  if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
1611  {
1612  g_view = getWidget();
1613  return m_view_manager->OnCanQuit();
1614  }
1615  return true;
1616  }
1617 
1618  inline void sendDestroy()
1619  {
1620  if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
1621  {
1622  m_tick_timer.stop();
1623  g_view = getWidget();
1624  m_view_manager->OnDestroy();
1625  }
1626  }
1627 
1628  inline void sendSizeWhenValid()
1629  {
1630  if(0 < m_width && 0 < m_height)
1631  if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
1632  {
1633  g_view = getWidget();
1634  m_view_manager->OnSize(m_width, m_height);
1635  }
1636  }
1637 
1638  inline void sendTick() const
1639  {
1640  if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
1641  {
1642  g_view = getWidget();
1643  m_view_manager->OnTick();
1644  }
1645  }
1646 
1647  inline void sendNotify(NotifyType type, chars topic, id_share in, id_cloned_share* out) const
1648  {
1649  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
1650  g_view = getWidget();
1651  m_view_manager->SendNotify(type, topic, in, out);
1652  }
1653 
1654  inline bool setEventBlocked(bool block)
1655  {
1656  const bool HasBlocked = m_event_blocked;
1657  m_event_blocked = block;
1658  return HasBlocked;
1659  }
1660 
1661  public:
1662  void resize(sint32 width, sint32 height)
1663  {
1664  m_width = width;
1665  m_height = height;
1666  sendSizeWhenValid();
1667  }
1668 
1669  void paint()
1670  {
1671  // for assert dialog's recursive call
1672  if(CanvasClass::get()) return;
1673  CanvasClass Canvas(getWidgetForPaint());
1674  render(m_width, m_height);
1675  }
1676 
1677  void nextPaint()
1678  {
1679  if(0 < m_paintcount)
1680  m_paintcount--;
1681  }
1682 
1683  void dirtyAndUpdate()
1684  {
1685  m_view_manager->DirtyAllSurfaces();
1686  update(1);
1687  }
1688 
1689  void update(sint32 count)
1690  {
1691  if(count == WR_NeedExit)
1692  m_request = WR_NeedExit;
1693  else if(count == WR_NeedHide)
1694  m_request = WR_NeedHide;
1695  else if(m_paintcount < count)
1696  {
1697  if(m_paintcount == 0)
1698  m_update_timer.start(1000 / USER_FRAMECOUNT);
1699  m_paintcount = count;
1700  }
1701  }
1702 
1703  bool closeEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event)
1704  {
1705  if(canQuit())
1706  {
1707  event->accept();
1708  return true;
1709  }
1710  event->ignore();
1711  return false;
1712  }
1713 
1714  void mousePressEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event)
1715  {
1716  if(m_event_blocked)
1717  {
1718  event->ignore();
1719  return;
1720  }
1721 
1722  if(event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
1723  {
1724  touch(TT_Press, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1725  m_longpress_timer.start(3000);
1726  m_longpress_x = event->x();
1727  m_longpress_y = event->y();
1728  }
1729  else if(event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
1730  touch(TT_ExtendPress, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1731  else if(event->button() == Qt::MidButton)
1732  touch(TT_WheelPress, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1733 
1734  m_tooltip_timer.stop();
1735  }
1736 
1737  void mouseMoveEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event)
1738  {
1739  if(m_event_blocked)
1740  {
1741  event->ignore();
1742  return;
1743  }
1744 
1745  if(event->buttons() == Qt::NoButton)
1746  {
1747  touch(TT_Moving, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1748  m_tooltip_timer.start(300);
1749  Platform::Popup::HideToolTip();
1750  }
1751  else
1752  {
1753  if(event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
1754  touch(TT_Dragging, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1755  if(event->buttons() & Qt::RightButton)
1756  touch(TT_ExtendDragging, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1757  if(event->buttons() & Qt::MidButton)
1758  touch(TT_WheelDragging, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1759  }
1760 
1761  if(5 < Math::Distance(m_longpress_x, m_longpress_y, event->x(), event->y()))
1762  m_longpress_timer.stop();
1763  }
1764 
1765  void mouseReleaseEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event)
1766  {
1767  if(m_event_blocked)
1768  {
1769  event->ignore();
1770  return;
1771  }
1772 
1773  if(event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
1774  touch(TT_Release, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1775  else if(event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
1776  touch(TT_ExtendRelease, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1777  else if(event->button() == Qt::MidButton)
1778  touch(TT_WheelRelease, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1779 
1780  m_longpress_timer.stop();
1781  }
1782 
1783  void wheelEvent(WheelEventPrivate* event)
1784  {
1785  if(m_event_blocked)
1786  {
1787  event->ignore();
1788  return;
1789  }
1790 
1791  sint32 WheelValue = event->delta() / 120;
1792  while(0 < WheelValue)
1793  {
1794  WheelValue--;
1795  touch(TT_WheelUp, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1796  }
1797  while(WheelValue < 0)
1798  {
1799  WheelValue++;
1800  touch(TT_WheelDown, 0, event->x(), event->y());
1801  }
1802  }
1803 
1804  void keyPressEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event)
1805  {
1806  if(m_event_blocked)
1807  {
1808  event->ignore();
1809  return;
1810  }
1811  if(!event->isAutoRepeat())
1812  key(event->key(), event->text().toUtf8().constData(), true);
1813  }
1814 
1815  void keyReleaseEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event)
1816  {
1817  if(m_event_blocked)
1818  {
1819  event->ignore();
1820  return;
1821  }
1822  if(!event->isAutoRepeat())
1823  key(event->key(), event->text().toUtf8().constData(), false);
1824  }
1825 
1826  private:
1827  void tick_timeout()
1828  {
1829  if(m_event_blocked)
1830  return;
1831  if(m_request == WR_Null)
1832  sendTick();
1833  else
1834  {
1835  if(m_request == WR_NeedExit)
1836  getWidget()->close();
1837  else if(m_request == WR_NeedHide)
1838  getWidget()->hide();
1839  m_request = WR_Null;
1840  }
1841  }
1842 
1843  void update_timeout()
1844  {
1845  if(m_event_blocked)
1846  return;
1847  if(m_paintcount == 0)
1848  m_update_timer.stop();
1849  getWidgetForPaint()->update();
1850  }
1851 
1852  void tooltip_timeout()
1853  {
1854  if(m_event_blocked)
1855  return;
1856  m_tooltip_timer.stop();
1857  point64 CursorPos;
1858  if(Platform::Utility::GetCursorPosInWindow(CursorPos))
1859  touch(TT_ToolTip, 0, CursorPos.x, CursorPos.y);
1860  }
1861 
1862  void longpress_timeout()
1863  {
1864  if(m_event_blocked)
1865  return;
1866  m_longpress_timer.stop();
1867  touch(TT_LongPress, 0, m_longpress_x, m_longpress_y);
1868  }
1869 
1870  private:
1871  ParentType m_parent_type;
1872  buffer m_parent_buf;
1873  void* m_parent_ptr;
1874  View* m_view_manager;
1875  View* m_next_manager;
1876  View::UpdaterCB m_view_cb;
1877  WidgetPrivate* m_view_data;
1878  WidgetPrivate* m_paint_device;
1879 
1880  private:
1881  bool m_event_blocked;
1882  sint32 m_width;
1883  sint32 m_height;
1884  WidgetRequest m_request;
1885  sint32 m_paintcount;
1886  QTimer m_tick_timer;
1887  QTimer m_update_timer;
1888  QTimer m_tooltip_timer;
1889  QTimer m_longpress_timer;
1890  sint32 m_longpress_x;
1891  sint32 m_longpress_y;
1892  };
1893 
1894  class GenericView : public FramePrivate
1895  {
1896  Q_OBJECT
1897 
1898  public:
1899  GenericView(WidgetPrivate* parent = nullptr) : FramePrivate(parent)
1900  {
1901  m_api = nullptr;
1902 
1903  setMouseTracking(true);
1904  setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
1905  setAutoFillBackground(false);
1906  }
1907 
1908  GenericView(View* manager, QString name, sint32 width, sint32 height, SizePolicy* policy)
1909  {
1910  BOSS_DECLARE_BUFFERED_CLASS(BufferedViewAPI, ViewAPI, PT_Null, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
1911  buffer NewAPI = Buffer::AllocNoConstructorOnce<BufferedViewAPI>(BOSS_DBG 1);
1912  BOSS_CONSTRUCTOR(NewAPI, 0, ViewAPI, ViewAPI::PT_GenericView, (buffer) this, manager, updater, this, nullptr);
1913  m_api = (ViewAPI*) NewAPI;
1914 
1915  m_name = name;
1916  m_firstwidth = width;
1917  m_firstheight = height;
1918  m_closing = false;
1919  setMinimumSize(policy->m_minwidth, policy->m_minheight);
1920  setMaximumSize(policy->m_maxwidth, policy->m_maxheight);
1921 
1922  setMouseTracking(true);
1923  setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
1924  setAutoFillBackground(false);
1925  }
1926 
1927  GenericView(h_view view)
1928  {
1929  takeView(view);
1930 
1931  setMouseTracking(true);
1932  setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
1933  setAutoFillBackground(false);
1934  }
1935 
1936  virtual ~GenericView()
1937  {
1938  if(m_api && m_api->parentIsPtr())
1939  Buffer::Free((buffer) m_api);
1940  m_window.set_buf(nullptr);
1941  }
1942 
1943  GenericView(const GenericView* rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
1944  GenericView& operator=(const GenericView& rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
1945 
1946  protected:
1947  void resizeEvent(ResizeEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1948  {
1949  m_api->resize(event->size().width(), event->size().height());
1950  }
1951 
1952  void paintEvent(PaintEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1953  {
1954  if(m_api->hasViewManager())
1955  m_api->paint();
1956  else FramePrivate::paintEvent(event);
1957  m_api->nextPaint();
1958  }
1959 
1960  protected:
1961  void closeEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1962  {
1963  if(m_api->closeEvent(event))
1964  {
1965  m_closing = true;
1966  m_window.set_buf(nullptr);
1967  setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
1968  }
1969  }
1970  void mousePressEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
1971  void mouseDoubleClickEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
1972  void mouseMoveEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseMoveEvent(event);}
1973  void mouseReleaseEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseReleaseEvent(event);}
1974  void wheelEvent(WheelEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->wheelEvent(event);}
1975  void keyPressEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyPressEvent(event);}
1976  void keyReleaseEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyReleaseEvent(event);}
1977  static void updater(void* data, sint32 count)
1978  {((GenericView*) data)->m_api->update(count);}
1979 
1980  protected:
1981  void takeView(h_view view)
1982  {
1983  GenericView* OldGenericView = cast(view);
1984  m_api = OldGenericView->m_api;
1985  OldGenericView->m_api = nullptr;
1986 
1987  m_name = OldGenericView->m_name;
1988  m_firstwidth = OldGenericView->m_firstwidth;
1989  m_firstheight = OldGenericView->m_firstheight;
1990  m_closing = false;
1991  setMinimumSize(OldGenericView->minimumWidth(), OldGenericView->minimumHeight());
1992  setMaximumSize(OldGenericView->maximumWidth(), OldGenericView->maximumHeight());
1993  Buffer::Free((buffer) OldGenericView);
1994 
1995  m_api->renewParent(this);
1996  m_api->changeViewData(this);
1997  view.clear_buf();
1998  view.set_ptr(m_api); // 삭제책임은 GenericView에 이관하였기에
1999  }
2000 
2001  public:
2002  inline const QString getName() const
2003  {
2004  return m_name;
2005  }
2006 
2007  inline const QSize getFirstSize() const
2008  {
2009  return QSize(m_firstwidth, m_firstheight);
2010  }
2011 
2012  inline bool closing() const
2013  {
2014  return m_closing;
2015  }
2016 
2017  inline void attachWindow(h_window window)
2018  {
2019  m_closing = false;
2020  m_window = window;
2021  }
2022 
2023  public:
2024  static GenericView* cast(h_view view)
2025  {
2026  ViewAPI* CurViewAPI = (ViewAPI*) view.get();
2027  BOSS_ASSERT("타입정보가 일치하지 않습니다", CurViewAPI->getParentType() == ViewAPI::PT_GenericView);
2028  return (GenericView*) CurViewAPI->getParent();
2029  }
2030 
2031  public:
2032  static bool CloseAllWindows()
2033  {
2034  WindowListPrivate processedWindows;
2035  while(auto w = ApplicationPrivate::activeModalWidget())
2036  {
2037  if(WindowPrivate* window = w->windowHandle())
2038  {
2039  if(!window->close()) return false;
2040  processedWindows.append(window);
2041  }
2042  }
2043  for(auto w : ApplicationPrivate::topLevelWidgets())
2044  {
2045  if(w->windowType() == Qt::Desktop)
2046  continue;
2047  if(WindowPrivate* window = w->windowHandle())
2048  {
2049  if(!window->close()) return false;
2050  processedWindows.append(window);
2051  }
2052  }
2053  return true;
2054  }
2055 
2056  public:
2057  ViewAPI* m_api;
2058 
2059  private:
2060  QString m_name;
2061  sint32 m_firstwidth;
2062  sint32 m_firstheight;
2063  bool m_closing;
2064  h_window m_window;
2065  };
2066 
2067  #ifndef BOSS_SILENT_NIGHT_IS_ENABLED
2068  class MainViewGL : public GLWidgetPrivate
2069  {
2070  Q_OBJECT
2071 
2072  public:
2073  MainViewGL(WidgetPrivate* parent) : GLWidgetPrivate(parent)
2074  {
2075  BOSS_DECLARE_BUFFERED_CLASS(BufferedViewAPI, ViewAPI, PT_Null, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
2076  buffer NewAPI = Buffer::AllocNoConstructorOnce<BufferedViewAPI>(BOSS_DBG 1);
2077  BOSS_CONSTRUCTOR(NewAPI, 0, ViewAPI, ViewAPI::PT_MainViewGL, (buffer) this, nullptr, updater, this, nullptr);
2078  m_api = (ViewAPI*) NewAPI;
2079 
2080  m_fbo_update = true;
2081  m_fbo = 0;
2082  m_fbo_render = 0;
2083  m_fbo_width = 0;
2084  m_fbo_height = 0;
2085 
2086  setAttribute(Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen);
2087  setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground);
2088  setAttribute(Qt::WA_AcceptTouchEvents);
2089  setMouseTracking(true);
2090  setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
2091  setAutoBufferSwap(false);
2092  setAutoFillBackground(false);
2093  }
2094 
2095  virtual ~MainViewGL()
2096  {
2097  if(m_api->parentIsPtr())
2098  Buffer::Free((buffer) m_api);
2099 
2100  if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
2101  {
2102  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2103  f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
2104  f->glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
2105  }
2106  }
2107 
2108  MainViewGL(const MainViewGL* rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
2109  MainViewGL& operator=(const MainViewGL& rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
2110 
2111  public:
2112  void onCloseEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event)
2113  {
2114  if(m_api->closeEvent(event))
2115  GenericView::CloseAllWindows();
2116  }
2117 
2118  protected:
2119  void initializeGL() Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2120  {
2121  }
2122 
2123  void resizeGL(int width, int height) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2124  {
2125  m_fbo_update = true;
2126  m_fbo_width = geometry().width();
2127  m_fbo_height = geometry().height();
2128  m_api->resize(m_fbo_width, m_fbo_height);
2129  }
2130 
2131  void paintGL() Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2132  {
2133  if(m_api->hasViewManager())
2134  {
2135  if(m_fbo_update)
2136  {
2137  m_fbo_update = false;
2138  if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
2139  {
2140  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2141  if(m_fbo) f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
2142  if(m_fbo_render) f->glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
2143 
2144  f->glGenRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
2145  f->glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, m_fbo_render);
2146  f->glRenderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_RGBA8, m_fbo_width, m_fbo_height);
2147  f->glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, 0);
2148 
2149  f->glGenFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
2150  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, m_fbo);
2151  f->glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_RENDERBUFFER, m_fbo_render);
2152  GLenum status = f->glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER);
2153  BOSS_ASSERT("프레임버퍼의 생성에 실패하였습니다", status == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE);
2154  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0);
2155  }
2156  }
2157  m_api->paint();
2158  swapBuffers();
2159  }
2160  else GLWidgetPrivate::paintGL();
2161  m_api->nextPaint();
2162  }
2163 
2164  protected:
2165  void closeEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->closeEvent(event);}
2166  void mousePressEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
2167  void mouseDoubleClickEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
2168  void mouseMoveEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseMoveEvent(event);}
2169  void mouseReleaseEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseReleaseEvent(event);}
2170  void wheelEvent(WheelEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->wheelEvent(event);}
2171  void keyPressEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyPressEvent(event);}
2172  void keyReleaseEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyReleaseEvent(event);}
2173  static void updater(void* data, sint32 count)
2174  {((MainViewGL*) data)->m_api->update(count);}
2175 
2176  public:
2177  ViewAPI* m_api;
2178 
2179  private:
2180  bool m_fbo_update;
2181  GLuint m_fbo;
2182  GLuint m_fbo_render;
2183  sint32 m_fbo_width;
2184  sint32 m_fbo_height;
2185  };
2186  #else
2187  class MainViewGL : public GLWidgetPrivate
2188  {
2189  Q_OBJECT
2190 
2191  public:
2192  MainViewGL(WidgetPrivate* parent) : GLWidgetPrivate(parent)
2193  {
2194  BOSS_DECLARE_BUFFERED_CLASS(BufferedViewAPI, ViewAPI, PT_Null, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
2195  buffer NewAPI = Buffer::AllocNoConstructorOnce<BufferedViewAPI>(BOSS_DBG 1);
2196  BOSS_CONSTRUCTOR(NewAPI, 0, ViewAPI, ViewAPI::PT_MainViewGL, (buffer) this, nullptr, updater, this, nullptr);
2197  m_api = (ViewAPI*) NewAPI;
2198  }
2199  virtual ~MainViewGL()
2200  {
2201  if(m_api->parentIsPtr())
2202  Buffer::Free((buffer) m_api);
2203  }
2204  MainViewGL(const MainViewGL* rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
2205  MainViewGL& operator=(const MainViewGL& rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
2206 
2207  public:
2208  void onCloseEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event)
2209  {
2210  if(m_api->closeEvent(event))
2211  GenericView::CloseAllWindows();
2212  }
2213 
2214  protected:
2215  void initializeGL() Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2216  {
2217  }
2218 
2219  void resizeGL(int width, int height) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2220  {
2221  m_api->resize(width, height);
2222  }
2223 
2224  void paintGL() Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2225  {
2226  if(m_api->hasViewManager())
2227  {
2228  m_api->paint();
2229  swapBuffers();
2230  }
2231  else GLWidgetPrivate::paintGL();
2232  m_api->nextPaint();
2233  }
2234 
2235  protected:
2236  void closeEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->closeEvent(event);}
2237  void mousePressEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
2238  void mouseDoubleClickEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
2239  void mouseMoveEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseMoveEvent(event);}
2240  void mouseReleaseEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseReleaseEvent(event);}
2241  void wheelEvent(WheelEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->wheelEvent(event);}
2242  void keyPressEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyPressEvent(event);}
2243  void keyReleaseEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyReleaseEvent(event);}
2244  static void updater(void* data, sint32 count)
2245  {((MainViewGL*) data)->m_api->update(count);}
2246 
2247  public:
2248  ViewAPI* m_api;
2249  };
2250  #endif
2251 
2252  class MainViewMDI : public MdiAreaPrivate
2253  {
2254  Q_OBJECT
2255 
2256  public:
2257  MainViewMDI(WidgetPrivate* parent) : MdiAreaPrivate(parent)
2258  {
2259  BOSS_DECLARE_BUFFERED_CLASS(BufferedViewAPI, ViewAPI, PT_Null, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
2260  buffer NewAPI = Buffer::AllocNoConstructorOnce<BufferedViewAPI>(BOSS_DBG 1);
2261  BOSS_CONSTRUCTOR(NewAPI, 0, ViewAPI, ViewAPI::PT_MainViewMDI, (buffer) this, nullptr, updater, this, viewport());
2262  m_api = (ViewAPI*) NewAPI;
2263 
2264  m_width = 0;
2265  m_height = 0;
2266 
2267  setAttribute(Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen);
2268  setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground);
2269  setAttribute(Qt::WA_AcceptTouchEvents);
2270  setMouseTracking(true);
2271  setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
2272  setAutoFillBackground(false);
2273  }
2274 
2275  virtual ~MainViewMDI()
2276  {
2277  if(m_api->parentIsPtr())
2278  Buffer::Free((buffer) m_api);
2279  }
2280 
2281  MainViewMDI(const MainViewMDI* rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
2282  MainViewMDI& operator=(const MainViewMDI& rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
2283 
2284  public:
2285  void onCloseEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event)
2286  {
2287  if(m_api->closeEvent(event))
2288  GenericView::CloseAllWindows();
2289  }
2290 
2291  protected:
2292  void resizeEvent(ResizeEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2293  {
2294  m_width = event->size().width();
2295  m_height = event->size().height();
2296  m_api->resize(m_width, m_height);
2297  }
2298 
2299  void paintEvent(PaintEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2300  {
2301  if(m_api->hasViewManager())
2302  m_api->paint();
2303  else MdiAreaPrivate::paintEvent(event);
2304  m_api->nextPaint();
2305  }
2306 
2307  protected:
2308  void closeEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->closeEvent(event);}
2309  void mousePressEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
2310  void mouseDoubleClickEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
2311  void mouseMoveEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseMoveEvent(event);}
2312  void mouseReleaseEvent(MouseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseReleaseEvent(event);}
2313  void wheelEvent(WheelEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->wheelEvent(event);}
2314  void keyPressEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyPressEvent(event);}
2315  void keyReleaseEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyReleaseEvent(event);}
2316  static void updater(void* data, sint32 count)
2317  {((MainViewMDI*) data)->m_api->update(count);}
2318

2321

2325  };
2326 
2327  class WidgetBox
2328  {
2329  public:
2330  WidgetBox()
2331  {
2332  m_view = nullptr;
2333  m_widget = nullptr;
2334  }
2335  ~WidgetBox()
2336  {
2337  if(m_view && !m_view->closing())
2338  delete m_view;
2339  }
2340

2342  {
2343  m_view = view;
