2351 
2352  class TrayIcon : public SystemTrayIconPrivate
2353  {
2354  Q_OBJECT
2355 
2356  public:
2357  TrayIcon(WidgetPrivate* menu)
2358  {
2359  m_ref_menu = menu;
2360  Qt::WindowFlags TypeCollector = Qt::Dialog;
2361  TypeCollector |= Qt::FramelessWindowHint;
2362  TypeCollector |= Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint;
2363  m_ref_menu->setWindowFlags(TypeCollector);
2364  m_ref_menu->installEventFilter(this);
2365  connect(this, SIGNAL(activated(SystemTrayIconPrivate::ActivationReason)),
2366  this, SLOT(iconActivated(SystemTrayIconPrivate::ActivationReason)));
2367  }
2368  ~TrayIcon()
2369  {
2370  }
2371 
2372  private slots:
2373  void iconActivated(SystemTrayIconPrivate::ActivationReason reason)
2374  {
2375  switch(reason)
2376  {
2377  case SystemTrayIconPrivate::Context: // R버튼 클릭
2378  case SystemTrayIconPrivate::Trigger: // L버튼 클릭
2379  case SystemTrayIconPrivate::MiddleClick: // 휠버튼 클릭
2380  {
2381  const QPoint ClickPos = CursorPrivate::pos();
2382  const QSize MenuSize = m_ref_menu->size();
2383  const QRect GeometryRect = ApplicationPrivate::desktop()->screenGeometry(ClickPos);
2384  const float PosX = (GeometryRect.right() < ClickPos.x() + MenuSize.width())?
2385  ClickPos.x() - MenuSize.width() : ClickPos.x();
2386  const float PosY = (GeometryRect.bottom() < ClickPos.y() + MenuSize.height())?
2387  ClickPos.y() - MenuSize.height() : ClickPos.y();
2388  m_ref_menu->move(PosX, PosY);
2389  m_ref_menu->show();
2390  m_ref_menu->activateWindow(); // setFocus()는 작동하지 않는다!
2391  m_ref_menu->raise(); // 부모기준 첫번째 자식으로 올림
2392  }
2393  break;
2394  case SystemTrayIconPrivate::DoubleClick: // L버튼 더블클릭된 순간
2395  break;
2396  default:
2397  break;
2398  }
2399  }
2400 
2401  private:
2402  bool eventFilter(QObject* watched, QEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2403  {
2404  if(watched == m_ref_menu && event->type() == QEvent::FocusOut)
2405  {
2406  m_ref_menu->hide();
2407  return true;
2408  }
2409  return QObject::eventFilter(watched, event);
2410  }
2411 
2412  private:
2413  WidgetPrivate* m_ref_menu;
2414  };
2415 
2416  class TrayBox
2417  {
2418  public:
2419  TrayBox()
2420  {
2421  m_ref_view = nullptr;
2422  m_tray = nullptr;
2423  }
2424  ~TrayBox()
2425  {
2426  delete m_tray;
2427  }
2428 
2429  void setWidget(GenericView* view, IconPrivate* icon)
2430  {
2431  m_ref_view = view;
2432  WidgetPrivate* OldWidget = m_ref_view->m_api->getWidget();
2433  OldWidget->resize(m_ref_view->getFirstSize());
2434  m_tray = new TrayIcon(OldWidget);
2435  if(icon) m_tray->setIcon(*icon);
2436  m_tray->show();
2437  }
2438 
2439  private:
2440  GenericView* m_ref_view;
2441  TrayIcon* m_tray;
2442  };
2443 
2444  class MainData
2445  {
2446  public:
2447  enum class WindowType {Normal, Minimize, Maximize};
2448  WindowType m_lastWindowType;
2449  rect128 m_lastWindowNormalRect;
2450 
2451  public:
2452  MainData(MainWindowPrivate* parent) :
2453  m_lastWindowType(WindowType::Normal), m_lastWindowNormalRect({0, 0, 0, 0})
2454  {
2455  m_parent = parent;
2456  m_viewGL = nullptr;
2457  m_viewMDI = nullptr;
2458  }
2459  ~MainData() {}
2460 
2461  public:
2462  void onCloseEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event)
2463  {
2464  if(m_viewGL)
2465  m_viewGL->onCloseEvent(event);
2466  else if(m_viewMDI)
2467  {
2468  m_viewMDI->closeAllSubWindows();
2469  if(m_viewMDI->currentSubWindow())
2470  event->ignore();
2471  else event->accept();
2472  }
2473  }
2474 
2475  public:
2476  void initForGL(bool frameless, bool topmost)
2477  {
2478  m_viewGL = new MainViewGL(m_parent);
2479  m_viewGL->m_api->renewParent(m_viewGL);
2480  // Qt5.9.1부터는 m_parent->setCentralWidget(m_viewGL)식의 접합은
2481  // 윈도우즈OS에서 다중 모니터상황에서 레이아웃의 정렬불량 문제가 발생
2482  WidgetPrivate* MainWidget = new WidgetPrivate();
2483  HBoxLayoutPrivate* MainLayout = new HBoxLayoutPrivate();
2484  MainLayout->setMargin(0);
2485  MainLayout->addWidget(m_viewGL);
2486  MainWidget->setLayout(MainLayout);
2487  m_parent->setCentralWidget(MainWidget);
2488 
2489  Qt::WindowFlags TypeCollector = Qt::Widget;
2490  if(frameless)
2491  {
2492  #if BOSS_MAC_OSX
2493  TypeCollector |= Qt::CustomizeWindowHint | Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint | Qt::WindowCloseButtonHint;
2494  #elif BOSS_WINDOWS | BOSS_LINUX
2495  TypeCollector |= Qt::FramelessWindowHint;
2496  #endif
2497  // Frameless에서의 그림자기능 연구중!
2498  //MainWidget->setAttribute(Qt::WA_TranslucentBackground);
2499  //MainWidget->layout()->setMargin(9);
2500  //QGraphicsDropShadowEffect* NewEffect = new QGraphicsDropShadowEffect();
2501  //NewEffect->setBlurRadius(9);
2502  //NewEffect->setOffset(4);
2503  //MainWidget->setGraphicsEffect(NewEffect);
2504  }
2505  if(topmost)
2506  TypeCollector |= Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint;
2507  if(TypeCollector != Qt::Widget)
2508  m_parent->setWindowFlags(TypeCollector);
2509  }
2510 
2511  void initForMDI(bool frameless, bool topmost)
2512  {
2513  m_viewMDI = new MainViewMDI(m_parent);
2514  m_viewMDI->m_api->renewParent(m_viewMDI);
2515  m_parent->setCentralWidget(m_viewMDI);
2516 
2517  Qt::WindowFlags TypeCollector = Qt::Widget;
2518  if(frameless)
2519  {
2520  #if BOSS_MAC_OSX
2521  TypeCollector |= Qt::CustomizeWindowHint | Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint | Qt::WindowCloseButtonHint;
2522  #elif BOSS_WINDOWS | BOSS_LINUX
2523  TypeCollector |= Qt::FramelessWindowHint;
2524  #endif
2525  }
2526  if(topmost)
2527  TypeCollector |= Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint;
2528  if(TypeCollector != Qt::Widget)
2529  m_parent->setWindowFlags(TypeCollector);
2530  }
2531 
2532  ViewAPI* getMainAPI()
2533  {
2534  BOSS_ASSERT("GL/MDI의 초기화가 되어있지 않습니다", m_viewGL || m_viewMDI);
2535  if(m_viewGL) return m_viewGL->m_api;
2536  return m_viewMDI->m_api;
2537  }
2538 
2539  GLWidgetPrivate* getGLWidget()
2540  {
2541  return m_viewGL;
2542  }
2543 
2544  WidgetPrivate* bindWidget(GenericView* view)
2545  {
2546  BOSS_ASSERT("GL/MDI의 초기화가 되어있지 않습니다", m_viewGL || m_viewMDI);
2547  if(m_viewGL) return view->m_api->getWidget();
2548  return m_viewMDI->addSubWindow(view->m_api->getWidget());
2549  }
2550 
2551  public:
2552  MenuPrivate* getMenu(chars name)
2553  {
2554  MenuPrivate** Result = m_menuMap.Access(name);
2555  if(!Result)
2556  {
2557  m_menuMap(name) = g_window->menuBar()->addMenu(QString::fromUtf8(name));
2558  Result = m_menuMap.Access(name);
2559  }
2560  return *Result;
2561  }
2562 
2563  ToolBarPrivate* getToolbar(chars name)
2564  {
2565  ToolBarPrivate** Result = m_toolbarMap.Access(name);
2566  if(!Result)
2567  {
2568  m_toolbarMap(name) = g_window->addToolBar(QString::fromUtf8(name));
2569  Result = m_toolbarMap.Access(name);
2570  }
2571  return *Result;
2572  }
2573 
2574  private:
2575  MainWindowPrivate* m_parent;
2576  MainViewGL* m_viewGL;
2577  MainViewMDI* m_viewMDI;
2578  Map<MenuPrivate*> m_menuMap;
2579  Map<ToolBarPrivate*> m_toolbarMap;
2580  };
2581 
2582  class MainWindow : public MainWindowPrivate
2583  {
2584  Q_OBJECT
2585 
2586  public:
2587  MainWindow() : m_window_pos({0, 0}), m_window_pos_old({0, 0}), m_window_size({0, 0}), m_window_size_old({0, 0})
2588  {
2589  setUnifiedTitleAndToolBarOnMac(true);
2590  g_data = new MainData(this);
2591  connect(&m_tick_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &MainWindow::tick_timeout);
2592  m_tick_timer.start(1000 / USER_FRAMECOUNT);
2593  m_inited_platform = false;
2594  m_first_visible = true;
2595  }
2596 
2597  ~MainWindow()
2598  {
2599  m_tick_timer.stop();
2600  delete g_data;
2601  g_data = nullptr;
2602  }
2603 
2604  public:
2605  void SetInitedPlatform() {m_inited_platform = true;}
2606  bool initedPlatform() const {return m_inited_platform;}
2607  void SetFirstVisible(bool visible) {m_first_visible = visible;}
2608  bool firstVisible() const {return m_first_visible;}
2609 
2610  protected:
2611  void moveEvent(MoveEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2612  {
2613  m_window_pos_old = m_window_pos;
2614  auto CurPos = event->pos();
2615  m_window_pos.x = CurPos.x();
2616  m_window_pos.y = CurPos.y();
2617  }
2618 
2619  void resizeEvent(ResizeEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2620  {
2621  m_window_size_old = m_window_size;
2622  auto CurSize = event->size();
2623  m_window_size.w = CurSize.width();
2624  m_window_size.h = CurSize.height();
2625  WidgetPrivate::resizeEvent(event);
2626  }
2627 
2628  void changeEvent(QEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2629  {
2630  if(event->type() == QEvent::WindowStateChange)
2631  {
2632  switch(windowState())
2633  {
2634  case Qt::WindowNoState:
2635  if(g_data->m_lastWindowType != MainData::WindowType::Normal)
2636  {
2637  g_data->m_lastWindowType = MainData::WindowType::Normal;
2638  auto& CurRect = geometry();
2639  const auto NewRect = QRect(g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.l, g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.t,
2640  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.r - g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.l,
2641  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.b - g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.t);
2642  if(CurRect != NewRect)
2643  setGeometry(NewRect);
2644  }
2645  break;
2646  case Qt::WindowMinimized:
2647  if(g_data->m_lastWindowType == MainData::WindowType::Normal)
2648  {
2649  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.l = m_window_pos.x;
2650  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.t = m_window_pos.y;
2651  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.r = m_window_pos.x + m_window_size.w;
2652  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.b = m_window_pos.y + m_window_size.h;
2653  }
2654  g_data->m_lastWindowType = MainData::WindowType::Minimize;
2655  break;
2656  case Qt::WindowMaximized:
2657  case Qt::WindowFullScreen:
2658  if(g_data->m_lastWindowType == MainData::WindowType::Normal)
2659  {
2660  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.l = m_window_pos_old.x;
2661  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.t = m_window_pos_old.y;
2662  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.r = m_window_pos_old.x + m_window_size_old.w;
2663  g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.b = m_window_pos_old.y + m_window_size_old.h;
2664  }
2665  g_data->m_lastWindowType = MainData::WindowType::Maximize;
2666  break;
2667  }
2668  }
2669  WidgetPrivate::changeEvent(event);
2670  }
2671 
2672  void closeEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2673  {
2674  g_data->onCloseEvent(event);
2675  }
2676 
2677  private slots:
2678  void OnSlot()
2679  {
2680  }
2681 
2682  private:
2683  void tick_timeout()
2684  {
2685  PlatformImpl::Core::LockProcedure();
2686  for(sint32 i = 0, iend = PlatformImpl::Core::GetProcedureCount(); i < iend; ++i)
2687  PlatformImpl::Core::GetProcedureCB(i)(PlatformImpl::Core::GetProcedureData(i));
2688  PlatformImpl::Core::UnlockProcedure();
2689  }
2690 
2691  private:
2692  point64 m_window_pos;
2693  point64 m_window_pos_old;
2694  size64 m_window_size;
2695  size64 m_window_size_old;
2696  QTimer m_tick_timer;
2697  bool m_inited_platform;
2698  bool m_first_visible;
2699  };
2700 
2701  class StackMessage
2702  {
2703  public:
2704  static StackMessage& Me()
2705  {static StackMessage _; return _;}
2706 
2707  public:
2708  void Push()
2709  {
2710  m_strings.AtAdding();
2711  }
2712 
2713  void Pop()
2714  {
2715  BOSS_ASSERT("StackMessage의 Pop이 초과됩니다", 0 < m_strings.Count());
2716  m_strings.SubtractionOne();
2717  }
2718 
2719  sint32 Count()
2720  {
2721  return m_strings.Count();
2722  }
2723 
2724  String Get(String str)
2725  {
2726  BOSS_ASSERT("StackMessage의 Push가 부족합니다", 0 < m_strings.Count());
2727  m_strings.At(-1) = str;
2728  String Result;
2729  for(sint32 i = 0, iend = m_strings.Count(); i < iend; ++i)
2730  {
2731  if(0 < i) Result += " → ";
2732  Result += m_strings[i];
2733  }
2734  return Result;
2735  }
2736 
2737  private:
2738  StackMessage()
2739  {
2740  }
2741  ~StackMessage()
2742  {
2743  }
2744 
2745  Strings m_strings;
2746  };
2747 
2748  class Tracker
2749  {
2750  typedef void (*ExitCB)(void*);
2751 
2752  public:
2753  Tracker(WidgetPrivate* parent, ExitCB exit, void* data)
2754  {
2755  m_parent = parent;
2756  m_exit = exit;
2757  m_data = data;
2758  m_next = nullptr;
2759  if(m_parent)
2760  Top().Insert(this);
2761  }
2762 
2763  ~Tracker()
2764  {
2765  if(m_parent)
2766  Top().Remove(this);
2767  }
2768 
2769  public:
2770  void Lock()
2771  {
2772  m_loop.exec();
2773  }
2774 
2775  void Unlock()
2776  {
2777  m_loop.quit();
2778  }
2779 
2780  static void CloseAll(WidgetPrivate* parent)
2781  {
2782  Tracker* CurNode = Top().m_next;
2783  while(CurNode)
2784  {
2785  Tracker* NextNode = CurNode->m_next;
2786  if(CurNode->m_parent == parent)
2787  {
2788  Top().Remove(CurNode);
2789  CurNode->m_exit(CurNode->m_data);
2790  }
2791  CurNode = NextNode;
2792  }
2793  }
2794 
2795  static bool HasAnyone(WidgetPrivate* parent)
2796  {
2797  Tracker* CurNode = Top().m_next;
2798  while(CurNode)
2799  {
2800  Tracker* NextNode = CurNode->m_next;
2801  if(CurNode->m_parent == parent)
2802  return true;
2803  CurNode = NextNode;
2804  }
2805  return false;
2806  }
2807 
2808  private:
2809  void Insert(Tracker* rhs)
2810  {
2811  rhs->m_next = m_next;
2812  m_next = rhs;
2813  }
2814 
2815  void Remove(Tracker* rhs)
2816  {
2817  Tracker* CurNode = this;
2818  while(CurNode)
2819  {
2820  if(CurNode->m_next == rhs)
2821  {
2822  CurNode->m_next = CurNode->m_next->m_next;
2823  break;
2824  }
2825  CurNode = CurNode->m_next;
2826  }
2827  }
2828 
2829  static Tracker& Top()
2830  {static Tracker _(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr); return _;}
2831 
2832  private:
2833  WidgetPrivate* m_parent;
2834  QEventLoop m_loop;
2835  ExitCB m_exit;
2836  void* m_data;
2837  Tracker* m_next;
2838  };
2839 
2840  class EditTracker : public LineEditPrivate
2841  {
2842  Q_OBJECT
2843 
2844  public:
2845  enum TrackerClosingType {TCT_Null, TCT_Enter, TCT_Escape, TCT_FocusOut, TCT_ForcedExit};
2846 
2847  public:
2848  EditTracker(UIEditType type, const QString& contents, WidgetPrivate* parent)
2849  : LineEditPrivate(contents, nullptr), m_tracker(parent, OnExit, this)
2850  {
2851  if(parent)
2852  m_parentpos = parent->mapToGlobal(QPoint(0, 0));
2853  else m_parentpos = QPoint(0, 0);
2854 
2855  m_closing = TCT_Null;
2856  #if BOSS_WINDOWS
2857  setWindowFlags(Qt::ToolTip | Qt::FramelessWindowHint);
2858  #else
2859  setWindowFlags(Qt::FramelessWindowHint);
2860  #endif
2861  setFrame(false);
2862  selectAll();
2863 
2864  switch(type)
2865  {
2866  case UIET_Int: setValidator(new IntValidatorPrivate(this)); break;
2867  case UIET_Float: setValidator(new DoubleValidatorPrivate(this)); break;
2868  default: break;
2869  }
2870 
2871  PalettePrivate Palette = palette();
2872  Palette.setColor(PalettePrivate::Base, ColorPrivate(255, 255, 255));
2873  Palette.setColor(PalettePrivate::Text, ColorPrivate(0, 0, 0));
2874  setPalette(Palette);
2875  }
2876 
2877  ~EditTracker() override
2878  {
2879  }
2880 
2881  TrackerClosingType Popup(sint32 x, sint32 y, sint32 w, sint32 h)
2882  {
2883  move(m_parentpos.x() + x, m_parentpos.y() + y);
2884  resize(w, h);
2885  show();
2886  activateWindow();
2887  setFocus();
2888  m_tracker.Lock();
2889  return m_closing;
2890  }
2891 
2892  protected:
2893  static void OnExit(void* data)
2894  {
2895  EditTracker* This = (EditTracker*) data;
2896  if(This->m_closing == TCT_Null)
2897  This->m_closing = TCT_ForcedExit;
2898  This->close();
2899  This->m_tracker.Unlock();
2900  }
2901 
2902  private:
2903  void focusOutEvent(FocusEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2904  {
2905  if(m_closing == TCT_Null)
2906  m_closing = TCT_FocusOut;
2907  close();
2908  m_tracker.Unlock();
2909  }
2910 
2911  void keyPressEvent(KeyEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2912  {
2913  if(event->key() == Qt::Key_Return || event->key() == Qt::Key_Enter)
2914  {
2915  if(m_closing == TCT_Null)
2916  m_closing = TCT_Enter;
2917  close();
2918  m_tracker.Unlock();
2919  }
2920  else if(event->key() == Qt::Key_Escape)
2921  {
2922  if(m_closing == TCT_Null)
2923  m_closing = TCT_Escape;
2924  close();
2925  m_tracker.Unlock();
2926  }
2927  else LineEditPrivate::keyPressEvent(event);
2928  }
2929 
2930  private:
2931  Tracker m_tracker;
2932  TrackerClosingType m_closing;
2933  QPoint m_parentpos;
2934  };
2935 
2936  class ListTracker : public ListWidgetPrivate
2937  {
2938  Q_OBJECT
2939 
2940  public:
2941  ListTracker(const Strings& strings, WidgetPrivate* parent)
2942  : ListWidgetPrivate(nullptr), m_tracker(parent, OnExit, this)
2943  {
2944  for(sint32 i = 0, iend = strings.Count(); i < iend; ++i)
2945  {
2946  ListWidgetItemPrivate* NewItem = new ListWidgetItemPrivate(QString::fromUtf8(strings[i]), this);
2947  NewItem->setTextAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter);
2948  addItem(NewItem);
2949  }
2950 
2951  if(parent)
2952  m_parentpos = parent->mapToGlobal(QPoint(0, 0));
2953  else m_parentpos = QPoint(0, 0);
2954 
2955  m_select = -1;
2956  #if BOSS_WINDOWS
2957  setWindowFlags(Qt::ToolTip | Qt::FramelessWindowHint);
2958  #else
2959  setWindowFlags(Qt::FramelessWindowHint);
2960  #endif
2961 
2962  connect(this, SIGNAL(itemPressed(QListWidgetItem*)), SLOT(onItemPressed(QListWidgetItem*)));
2963  }
2964 
2965  ~ListTracker()
2966  {
2967  }
2968 
2969  sint32 Popup(sint32 x, sint32 y, sint32 w, sint32 h)
2970  {
2971  move(m_parentpos.x() + x, m_parentpos.y() + y);
2972  resize(w, h);
2973  show();
2974  activateWindow();
2975  setFocus();
2976  m_tracker.Lock();
2977  return m_select;
2978  }
2979 
2980  protected:
2981  static void OnExit(void* data)
2982  {
2983  ListTracker* This = (ListTracker*) data;
2984  This->m_select = -1;
2985  This->close();
2986  This->m_tracker.Unlock();
2987  }
2988 
2989  private:
2990  void focusOutEvent(FocusEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2991  {
2992  close();
2993  m_tracker.Unlock();
2994  }
2995 
2996  private slots:
2997  void onItemPressed(ListWidgetItemPrivate* item)
2998  {
2999  m_select = row(item);
3000  close();
3001  m_tracker.Unlock();
3002  }
3003 
3004  private:
3005  Tracker m_tracker;
3006  sint32 m_select;
3007  QPoint m_parentpos;
3008  };
3009 
3010  #ifndef BOSS_SILENT_NIGHT_IS_ENABLED
3011  class OpenGLPrivate
3012  {
3013  private:
3014  OpenGLPrivate()
3015  {
3016  mVShader[0] = mVShader[1] = 0;
3017  mFShader[0] = mFShader[1] = 0;
3018  mProgram[0] = mProgram[1] = 0;
3019  switch(GetVersionGLES() & 0xF0)
3020  {
3021  case 0x20:
3022  InitShaderGLES20();
3023  break;
3024  case 0x30:
3025  InitShaderGLES30();
3026  break;
3027  default:
3028  InitShaderGL();
3029  break;
3030  }
3031  }
3032  ~OpenGLPrivate()
3033  {
3034  TermShader();
3035  }
3036 
3037  public:
3038  static OpenGLPrivate& ST()
3039  {static OpenGLPrivate _; return _;}
3040 
3041  public:
3042  void FillRect(uint32 fbo, const BOSS::Rect& rect, const BOSS::Color& color)
3043  {
3044  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3045  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3046 
3047  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3048  GLint ViewPortValues[4] = {0};
3049  f->glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, ViewPortValues);
3050  const GLint Width = ViewPortValues[2];
3051  const GLint Height = ViewPortValues[3];
3052  BOSS::Rect NewRect;
3053  NewRect.l = 2 * rect.l / Width - 1;
3054  NewRect.t = 1 - 2 * rect.t / Height;
3055  NewRect.r = 2 * rect.r / Width - 1;
3056  NewRect.b = 1 - 2 * rect.b / Height;
3057 
3058  f->glUseProgram(mProgram[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3059  f->glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3060  f->glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3061  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(VerticeID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3062  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(ColorID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3063  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(TexCoordsID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3064  f->glVertexAttribPointer(VerticeID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].vertices[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3065  f->glVertexAttribPointer(ColorID, 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].colors[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3066  f->glVertexAttribPointer(TexCoordsID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].texcoords[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3067  f->glUniformMatrix4fv(mMatrix[0], 1, GL_FALSE, (const GLfloat*) &mM[0][0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3068 
3069  f->glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3070  f->glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3071  f->glEnable(GL_BLEND); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3072  f->glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3073  f->glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3074  const QRect& CurScissor = CanvasClass::get()->scissor();
3075  const int ScreenHeight = CanvasClass::get()->painter().window().height();
3076  f->glScissor(CurScissor.x(), ScreenHeight - (CurScissor.y() + CurScissor.height()),
3077  CurScissor.width(), CurScissor.height());
3078 
3079  mAttrib[0].vertices[0] = NewRect.l;
3080  mAttrib[0].vertices[1] = NewRect.t;
3081  mAttrib[0].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3082  mAttrib[0].texcoords[0] = 0;
3083  mAttrib[0].texcoords[1] = 0;
3084 
3085  mAttrib[1].vertices[0] = NewRect.r;
3086  mAttrib[1].vertices[1] = NewRect.t;
3087  mAttrib[1].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3088  mAttrib[1].texcoords[0] = 1;
3089  mAttrib[1].texcoords[1] = 0;
3090 
3091  mAttrib[2].vertices[0] = NewRect.l;
3092  mAttrib[2].vertices[1] = NewRect.b;
3093  mAttrib[2].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3094  mAttrib[2].texcoords[0] = 0;
3095  mAttrib[2].texcoords[1] = 1;
3096 
3097  mAttrib[3].vertices[0] = NewRect.r;
3098  mAttrib[3].vertices[1] = NewRect.b;
3099  mAttrib[3].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3100  mAttrib[3].texcoords[0] = 1;
3101  mAttrib[3].texcoords[1] = 1;
3102  f->glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 4); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3103  }
3104  void DrawPixmap(uint32 fbo, float x, float y, const BOSS::Point p[3], const PixmapPrivate& pixmap, const BOSS::Point ip[3], const BOSS::Color& color)
3105  {
3106  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3107  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3108 
3109  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3110  GLint ViewPortValues[4] = {0};
3111  f->glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, ViewPortValues);
3112  const GLint DstWidth = ViewPortValues[2];
3113  const GLint DstHeight = ViewPortValues[3];
3114 
3115  auto CurContext = QGLContext::fromOpenGLContext(ctx);
3116  GLuint CurTexture = CurContext->bindTexture(pixmap);
3117  f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
3118  f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, CurTexture);
3119 
3120  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3121  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3122  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3123  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3124 
3125  f->glUseProgram(mProgram[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3126  f->glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3127  f->glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3128  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(VerticeID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3129  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(ColorID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3130  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(TexCoordsID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3131  f->glVertexAttribPointer(VerticeID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].vertices[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3132  f->glVertexAttribPointer(ColorID, 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].colors[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3133  f->glVertexAttribPointer(TexCoordsID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].texcoords[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3134  f->glUniformMatrix4fv(mMatrix[0], 1, GL_FALSE, (const GLfloat*) &mM[0][0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3135 
3136  f->glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3137  f->glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3138  f->glEnable(GL_BLEND); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3139  f->glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3140  f->glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3141  const QRect& CurScissor = CanvasClass::get()->scissor();
3142  const int ScreenHeight = CanvasClass::get()->painter().window().height();
3143  f->glScissor(CurScissor.x(), (ScreenHeight - (CurScissor.y() + CurScissor.height())),
3144  CurScissor.width(), CurScissor.height());
3145 
3146  const bool NeedReverse = !(fbo == 0 && pixmap.devicePixelRatio() == 1);
3147  mAttrib[0].vertices[0] = 2 * (x + p[0].x) / DstWidth - 1;
3148  mAttrib[0].vertices[1] = 1 - 2 * (y + p[0].y) / DstHeight;
3149  mAttrib[0].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3150  mAttrib[0].texcoords[0] = ip[0].x;
3151  mAttrib[0].texcoords[1] = (NeedReverse)? 1 - ip[0].y : ip[0].y;
3152 
3153  mAttrib[1].vertices[0] = 2 * (x + p[1].x) / DstWidth - 1;
3154  mAttrib[1].vertices[1] = 1 - 2 * (y + p[1].y) / DstHeight;
3155  mAttrib[1].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3156  mAttrib[1].texcoords[0] = ip[1].x;
3157  mAttrib[1].texcoords[1] = (NeedReverse)? 1 - ip[1].y : ip[1].y;
3158 
3159  mAttrib[2].vertices[0] = 2 * (x + p[2].x) / DstWidth - 1;
3160  mAttrib[2].vertices[1] = 1 - 2 * (y + p[2].y) / DstHeight;
3161  mAttrib[2].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3162  mAttrib[2].texcoords[0] = ip[2].x;
3163  mAttrib[2].texcoords[1] = (NeedReverse)? 1 - ip[2].y : ip[2].y;
3164  f->glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 3); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3165  }
3166  void DrawTexture(uint32 fbo, const BOSS::Rect& rect, id_texture_read tex, const BOSS::Rect& texrect, const BOSS::Color& color, orientationtype ori, bool antialiasing)
3167  {
3168  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3169  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3170  const float DeviceRatio = Platform::Utility::GetPixelRatio();
3171 
3172  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3173  GLint ViewPortValues[4] = {0};
3174  f->glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, ViewPortValues);
3175  #if BOSS_ANDROID
3176  const GLint DstWidth = ViewPortValues[2] / 4;
3177  const GLint DstHeight = ViewPortValues[3] / 4;
3178  #else
3179  const GLint DstWidth = ViewPortValues[2] / DeviceRatio;
3180  const GLint DstHeight = ViewPortValues[3] / DeviceRatio;
3181  #endif
3182  BOSS::Rect NewRect;
3183  NewRect.l = 2 * rect.l / DstWidth - 1;
3184  NewRect.t = 1 - 2 * rect.t / DstHeight;
3185  NewRect.r = 2 * rect.r / DstWidth - 1;
3186  NewRect.b = 1 - 2 * rect.b / DstHeight;
3187 
3188  const bool IsNV21 = (mProgram[1] && Platform::Graphics::IsTextureNV21(tex));
3189  if(IsNV21)
3190  {
3191  f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
3192  f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(tex, 0));
3193  f->glUniform1i(mTextureY, 0);
3194  f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE1);
3195  f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(tex, 1));
3196  f->glUniform1i(mTextureUV, 1);
3197  }
3198  else
3199  {
3200  f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
3201  f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(tex));
3202  }
3203  if(antialiasing)
3204  {
3205  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3206  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3207  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3208  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3209  }
3210  else
3211  {
3212  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3213  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3214  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
3215  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
3216  }
3217 
3218  const GLint SrcWidth = Platform::Graphics::GetTextureWidth(tex);
3219  const GLint SrcHeight = Platform::Graphics::GetTextureHeight(tex);
3220  const sint32 SelectedProgram = (IsNV21)? 1 : 0;
3221  f->glUseProgram(mProgram[SelectedProgram]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3222  f->glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3223  f->glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3224  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(VerticeID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3225  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(ColorID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3226  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(TexCoordsID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3227  f->glVertexAttribPointer(VerticeID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].vertices[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3228  f->glVertexAttribPointer(ColorID, 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].colors[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3229  f->glVertexAttribPointer(TexCoordsID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].texcoords[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3230  f->glUniformMatrix4fv(mMatrix[SelectedProgram], 1, GL_FALSE, (const GLfloat*) &mM[0][0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3231 
3232  f->glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3233  f->glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3234  f->glEnable(GL_BLEND); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3235  f->glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3236  f->glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3237  const QRect& CurScissor = CanvasClass::get()->scissor();
3238  const int ScreenHeight = CanvasClass::get()->painter().window().height();
3239  f->glScissor(CurScissor.x() * DeviceRatio,
3240  (ScreenHeight - (CurScissor.y() + CurScissor.height())) * DeviceRatio,
3241  CurScissor.width() * DeviceRatio,
3242  CurScissor.height() * DeviceRatio);
3243 
3244  mAttrib[0].vertices[0] = NewRect.l;
3245  mAttrib[0].vertices[1] = NewRect.t;
3246  mAttrib[0].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3247  mAttrib[1].vertices[0] = NewRect.r;
3248  mAttrib[1].vertices[1] = NewRect.t;
3249  mAttrib[1].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3250  mAttrib[2].vertices[0] = NewRect.l;
3251  mAttrib[2].vertices[1] = NewRect.b;
3252  mAttrib[2].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3253  mAttrib[3].vertices[0] = NewRect.r;
3254  mAttrib[3].vertices[1] = NewRect.b;
3255  mAttrib[3].color32 = color.ToABGR();
3256 
3257  sint32 UV[4] = {2, 3, 1, 0};
3258  switch(ori)
3259  {
3260  case orientationtype_normal0: UV[0] = 2; UV[1] = 3; UV[2] = 1; UV[3] = 0; break;
3261  case orientationtype_normal90: UV[0] = 0; UV[1] = 2; UV[2] = 3; UV[3] = 1; break;
3262  case orientationtype_normal180: UV[0] = 1; UV[1] = 0; UV[2] = 2; UV[3] = 3; break;
3263  case orientationtype_normal270: UV[0] = 3; UV[1] = 1; UV[2] = 0; UV[3] = 2; break;
3264  case orientationtype_fliped0: UV[0] = 3; UV[1] = 2; UV[2] = 0; UV[3] = 1; break;
3265  case orientationtype_fliped90: UV[0] = 2; UV[1] = 0; UV[2] = 1; UV[3] = 3; break;
3266  case orientationtype_fliped180: UV[0] = 0; UV[1] = 1; UV[2] = 3; UV[3] = 2; break;
3267  case orientationtype_fliped270: UV[0] = 1; UV[1] = 3; UV[2] = 2; UV[3] = 0; break;
3268  }
3269 
3270  mAttrib[UV[0]].texcoords[0] = texrect.l / SrcWidth; // 좌측상단
3271  mAttrib[UV[0]].texcoords[1] = (SrcHeight - texrect.b) / SrcHeight;
3272  mAttrib[UV[1]].texcoords[0] = texrect.r / SrcWidth; // 우측상단
3273  mAttrib[UV[1]].texcoords[1] = (SrcHeight - texrect.b) / SrcHeight;
3274  mAttrib[UV[2]].texcoords[0] = texrect.r / SrcWidth; // 우측하단
3275  mAttrib[UV[2]].texcoords[1] = (SrcHeight - texrect.t) / SrcHeight;
3276  mAttrib[UV[3]].texcoords[0] = texrect.l / SrcWidth; // 좌측하단
3277  mAttrib[UV[3]].texcoords[1] = (SrcHeight - texrect.t) / SrcHeight;
3278  f->glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 4); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3279  }
3280 
3281  private:
3282  void InitShader(chars vsource_rgb, chars fsource_rgb, chars vsource_nv21 = nullptr, chars fsource_nv21 = nullptr)
3283  {
3284  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3285  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3286 
3287  chars VSources[2] = {vsource_rgb, vsource_nv21};
3288  chars FSources[2] = {fsource_rgb, fsource_nv21};
3289  for(sint32 i = 0, iend = (vsource_nv21 && fsource_nv21)? 2 : 1; i < iend; ++i)
3290  {
3291  mVShader[i] = f->glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3292  f->glShaderSource(mVShader[i], 1, &VSources[i], NULL); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3293  f->glCompileShader(mVShader[i]); TestShader(BOSS_DBG mVShader[i]);
3294 
3295  mFShader[i] = f->glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3296  f->glShaderSource(mFShader[i], 1, &FSources[i], NULL); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3297  f->glCompileShader(mFShader[i]); TestShader(BOSS_DBG mFShader[i]);
3298 
3299  mProgram[i] = f->glCreateProgram(); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3300  f->glAttachShader(mProgram[i], mVShader[i]); TestShader(BOSS_DBG mVShader[i]);
3301  f->glAttachShader(mProgram[i], mFShader[i]); TestShader(BOSS_DBG mFShader[i]);
3302 
3303  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(VerticeID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3304  f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(ColorID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3305  f->glBindAttribLocation(mProgram[i], VerticeID, "a_position"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3306  f->glBindAttribLocation(mProgram[i], ColorID, "a_color"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3307  f->glVertexAttribPointer(VerticeID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].vertices[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3308  f->glVertexAttribPointer(ColorID, 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].colors[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3309 
3310  f->glLinkProgram(mProgram[i]); TestProgram(BOSS_DBG mProgram[i]);
3311  f->glValidateProgram(mProgram[i]); TestProgram(BOSS_DBG mProgram[i]);
3312 
3313  LoadIdentity();
3314  f->glUseProgram(mProgram[i]); TestProgram(BOSS_DBG mProgram[i]);
3315  mMatrix[i] = f->glGetUniformLocation(mProgram[i], "u_matrix"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3316  f->glUniformMatrix4fv(mMatrix[i], 1, GL_FALSE, (const GLfloat*) &mM[0][0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3317  if(i == 1)
3318  {
3319  mTextureY = f->glGetUniformLocation(mProgram[i], "u_texture_y"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3320  mTextureUV = f->glGetUniformLocation(mProgram[i], "u_texture_uv"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
3321  }
3322  }
3323  }
3324  void InitShaderGLES20()
3325  {
3326  InitShader(
3327  "attribute highp vec2 a_position;\n"
3328  "attribute highp vec4 a_color;\n"
3329  "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
3330  "varying mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
3331  "\n"
3332  "void main()\n"
3333  "{\n"
3334  " gl_Position = u_matrix * vec4(a_position.x, a_position.y, 0.0, 1.0);\n"
3335  " v_fragmentColor = a_color;\n"
3336  "}",
3337  "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
3338  "varying mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
3339  "\n"
3340  "void main()\n"
3341  "{\n"
3342  " gl_FragColor = v_fragmentColor;\n"
3343  "}");
3344  }
3345  void InitShaderGLES30()
3346  {
3347  InitShader(
3349  // RGB
3351  String::Format(
3352  "#version 300 es\n"
3353  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_position;\n"
3354  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec4 a_color;\n"
3355  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_texcoord;\n"
3356  "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
3357  "out mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
3358  "out mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
3359  "\n"
3360  "void main()\n"
3361  "{\n"
3362  " gl_Position = u_matrix * vec4(a_position.x, a_position.y, 0.0, 1.0);\n"
3363  " v_fragmentColor = a_color;\n"
3364  " v_texCoord = a_texcoord;\n"
3365  "}", VerticeID, ColorID, TexCoordsID),
3366  "#version 300 es\n"
3367  "layout (location = 0) out highp vec4 oColour;\n"
3368  "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
3369  "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture;\n"
3370  "in mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
3371  "in mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
3372  "\n"
3373  "void main()\n"
3374  "{\n"
3375  " oColour = v_fragmentColor * texture(u_texture, v_texCoord);\n"
3376  "}",
3378  // NV21
3380  String::Format(
3381  "#version 300 es\n"
3382  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_position;\n"
3383  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec4 a_color;\n"
3384  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_texcoord;\n"
3385  "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
3386  "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture_y;\n"
3387  "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture_uv;\n"
3388  "out mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
3389  "out mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
3390  "\n"
3391  "void main()\n"
3392  "{\n"
3393  " gl_Position = u_matrix * vec4(a_position.x, a_position.y, 0.0, 1.0);\n"
3394  " v_fragmentColor = a_color;\n"
3395  " v_texCoord = a_texcoord;\n"
3396  "}", VerticeID, ColorID, TexCoordsID),
3397  "#version 300 es\n"
3398  "layout (location = 0) out highp vec4 oColour;\n"
3399  "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
3400  "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture_y;\n"
3401  "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture_uv;\n"
3402  "in mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
3403  "in mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
3404  "\n"
3405  "void main()\n"
3406  "{\n"
3407  " highp float y = texture(u_texture_y, v_texCoord).r;\n"
3408  " highp float u = texture(u_texture_uv, v_texCoord).a - 0.5;\n"
3409  " highp float v = texture(u_texture_uv, v_texCoord).r - 0.5;\n"
3410  " highp float r = y + 1.403 * v;\n"
3411  " highp float g = y - 0.344 * u - 0.714 * v;\n"
3412  " highp float b = y + 1.770 * u;\n"
3413  " oColour = v_fragmentColor * vec4(r, g, b, 1.0);\n"
3414  "}");
3415  }
3416  void InitShaderGL()
3417  {
3418  InitShader(
3419  String::Format(
3420  "#version 330 core\n"
3421  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_position;\n"
3422  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec4 a_color;\n"
3423  "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_texcoord;\n"
3424  "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
3425  "out mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
3426  "out mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
3427  "\n"
3428  "void main()\n"
3429  "{\n"
3430  " gl_Position = u_matrix * vec4(a_position.x, a_position.y, 0.0, 1.0);\n"
3431  " v_fragmentColor = a_color;\n"
3432  " v_texCoord = a_texcoord;\n"
3433  "}", VerticeID, ColorID, TexCoordsID),
3434  "#version 330 core\n"
3435  "layout (location = 0) out highp vec4 oColour;\n"
3436  "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
3437  "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture;\n"
3438  "in mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
3439  "in mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
3440  "\n"
3441  "void main()\n"
3442  "{\n"
3443  " oColour = v_fragmentColor * texture2D(u_texture, v_texCoord);\n"
3444  "}");
3445  }
3446  void TermShader()
3447  {
3448  if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
3449  {
3450  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3451  for(sint32 i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
3452  {
3453  if(mProgram[i]) {f->glDeleteProgram(mProgram[i]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0); mProgram[i] = 0;}
3454  if(mVShader[i]) {f->glDeleteShader(mVShader[i]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0); mVShader[i] = 0;}
3455  if(mFShader[i]) {f->glDeleteShader(mFShader[i]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0); mFShader[i] = 0;}
3456  }
3457  }
3458  }
3459 
3460  public:
3461  static uint08 GetVersionGLES()
3462  {
3463  static uint08 Version = 0xFF;
3464  if(Version != 0xFF) return Version;
3465 
3466  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3467  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3468  chars VendorString = (chars) f->glGetString(GL_VENDOR);
3469  chars RendererString = (chars) f->glGetString(GL_RENDERER);
3470  chars VersionString = (chars) f->glGetString(GL_VERSION);
3471  // 예시1: OpenGL ES 2.0 IMGSGX543-124.1
3472  // 예시2: OpenGL ES 3.0 APPLE-12.0.38
3473  // 예시3: 2.1 ATI-1.51.8
3474  // 예시4: 4.0.0 - Build 10.18.10.4303
3475  BOSS_TRACE("========================================");
3476  BOSS_TRACE("OpenGLPrivate GetVersion()");
3477  BOSS_TRACE("----------------------------------------");
3478  BOSS_TRACE("Vendor: %s", VendorString);
3479  BOSS_TRACE("Renderer: %s", RendererString);
3480  BOSS_TRACE("Version: %s", VersionString);
3481  BOSS_TRACE("========================================");
3482 
3483  if(!boss_strncmp(VersionString, "OpenGL ES ", 10))
3484  {
3485  const uint32 VersionMajor = VersionString[10] - '0';
3486  const uint32 VersionMinor = VersionString[12] - '0';
3487  Version = ((VersionMajor & 0xF) << 4) | (VersionMinor & 0xF);
3488  }
3489  else if(!boss_strcmp(VersionString, "3.0 Mesa 18.0.5"))
3490  Version = 0x30;
3491  else Version = 0x00; // 데스크탑용 OpenGL
3492  return Version;
3493  }
3494  static void TestGL(BOSS_DBG_PRM sint32 nouse)
3495  {
3496  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3497  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3498  if(auto errorCode = f->glGetError())
3499  BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestGL(error:%d) is failed", errorCode), false);
3500  }
3501  static void TestShader(BOSS_DBG_PRM GLuint shader)
3502  {
3503  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3504  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3505 
3506  GLint status;
3507  f->glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &status);
3508  if(status == GL_FALSE)
3509  {
3510  GLchar log[4096];
3511  GLsizei s;
3512  f->glGetShaderInfoLog(shader, 4096, &s, log);
3513  BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestShader(%s) is failed", log), false);
3514  }
3515  else if(auto errorCode = f->glGetError())
3516  BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestShader(error:%d) is failed", errorCode), false);
3517  }
3518  static void TestProgram(BOSS_DBG_PRM GLuint program)
3519  {
3520  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3521  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3522 
3523  GLint linked;
3524  f->glGetProgramiv(program, GL_LINK_STATUS, &linked);
3525  if(!linked)
3526  {
3527  int i32InfoLogLength, i32CharsWritten;
3528  f->glGetProgramiv(program, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH, &i32InfoLogLength);
3529  char* pszInfoLog = new char[i32InfoLogLength];
3530  f->glGetProgramInfoLog(program, i32InfoLogLength, &i32CharsWritten, pszInfoLog);
3531  BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestProgram(%s) is failed", pszInfoLog), false);
3532  delete [] pszInfoLog;
3533  }
3534  else if(auto errorCode = f->glGetError())
3535  BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestProgram(error:%d) is failed", errorCode), false);
3536  }
3537  private:
3538  void LoadIdentity()
3539  {
3540  mM[0][0] = 1; mM[0][1] = 0; mM[0][2] = 0; mM[0][3] = 0;
3541  mM[1][0] = 0; mM[1][1] = 1; mM[1][2] = 0; mM[1][3] = 0;
3542  mM[2][0] = 0; mM[2][1] = 0; mM[2][2] = 1; mM[2][3] = 0;
3543  mM[3][0] = 0; mM[3][1] = 0; mM[3][2] = 0; mM[3][3] = 1;
3544  }
3545  void Multiply(
3546  const float m00, const float m01, const float m02, const float m03,
3547  const float m10, const float m11, const float m12, const float m13,
3548  const float m20, const float m21, const float m22, const float m23,
3549  const float m30, const float m31, const float m32, const float m33)
3550  {
3551  GLfloat m[4][4];
3552  Memory::Copy(&m[0][0], &mM[0][0], sizeof(GLfloat) * 16);
3553  mM[0][0] = m[0][0] * m00 + m[0][1] * m10 + m[0][2] * m20 + m[0][3] * m30;
3554  mM[0][1] = m[0][0] * m01 + m[0][1] * m11 + m[0][2] * m21 + m[0][3] * m31;
3555  mM[0][2] = m[0][0] * m02 + m[0][1] * m12 + m[0][2] * m22 + m[0][3] * m32;
3556  mM[0][3] = m[0][0] * m03 + m[0][1] * m13 + m[0][2] * m23 + m[0][3] * m33;
3557  mM[1][0] = m[1][0] * m00 + m[1][1] * m10 + m[1][2] * m20 + m[1][3] * m30;
3558  mM[1][1] = m[1][0] * m01 + m[1][1] * m11 + m[1][2] * m21 + m[1][3] * m31;
3559  mM[1][2] = m[1][0] * m02 + m[1][1] * m12 + m[1][2] * m22 + m[1][3] * m32;
3560  mM[1][3] = m[1][0] * m03 + m[1][1] * m13 + m[1][2] * m23 + m[1][3] * m33;
3561  mM[2][0] = m[2][0] * m00 + m[2][1] * m10 + m[2][2] * m20 + m[2][3] * m30;
3562  mM[2][1] = m[2][0] * m01 + m[2][1] * m11 + m[2][2] * m21 + m[2][3] * m31;
3563  mM[2][2] = m[2][0] * m02 + m[2][1] * m12 + m[2][2] * m22 + m[2][3] * m32;
3564  mM[2][3] = m[2][0] * m03 + m[2][1] * m13 + m[2][2] * m23 + m[2][3] * m33;
3565  mM[3][0] = m[3][0] * m00 + m[3][1] * m10 + m[3][2] * m20 + m[3][3] * m30;
3566  mM[3][1] = m[3][0] * m01 + m[3][1] * m11 + m[3][2] * m21 + m[3][3] * m31;
3567  mM[3][2] = m[3][0] * m02 + m[3][1] * m12 + m[3][2] * m22 + m[3][3] * m32;
3568  mM[3][3] = m[3][0] * m03 + m[3][1] * m13 + m[3][2] * m23 + m[3][3] * m33;
3569  }
3570 
3571  private:
3572  GLuint mVShader[2];
3573  GLuint mFShader[2];
3574  GLuint mProgram[2];
3575 
3576  private:
3577  enum {VerticeID = 0, ColorID = 1, TexCoordsID = 2};
3578  struct Attrib
3579  {
3580  GLfloat vertices[2];
3581  union
3582  {
3583  GLubyte colors[4];
3584  GLuint color32;
3585  };
3586  GLfloat texcoords[2];
3587  };
3588  Attrib mAttrib[4];
3589  GLint mMatrix[2];
3590  GLfloat mM[4][4];
3591  GLint mTextureY;
3592  GLint mTextureUV;
3593  };
3594 
3595  class TextureClass
3596  {
3597  BOSS_DECLARE_NONCOPYABLE_CLASS(TextureClass)
3598 
3599  public:
3600  TextureClass()
3601  {
3602  mRefCount = 1;
3603  mNV21 = false;
3604  mWidth = 0;
3605  mHeight = 0;
3606  mTexture[0] = mTexture[1] = 0;
3607  }
3608  ~TextureClass()
3609  {
3610  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", mRefCount == 0);
3611  Remove();
3612  }
3613 
3614  public:
3615  void Init(bool nv21, bool bitmapcache, sint32 width, sint32 height, const void* bits)
3616  {
3617  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3618  BOSS_ASSERT("OpenGL의 Context접근에 실패하였습니다", ctx);
3619  if(ctx)
3620  {
3621  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3622  mNV21 = nv21;
3623  mWidth = width;
3624  mHeight = height;
3625  if(nv21)
3626  {
3627  const sint32 Level[2] = {GL_LUMINANCE, GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA};
3628  const sint32 Widths[2] = {mWidth, mWidth / 2};
3629  const sint32 Heights[2] = {mHeight, mHeight / 2};
3630  const void* Bits[2] = {bits, (bits)? &((bytes) bits)[mWidth * mHeight] : nullptr};
3631  const sint32 BitsSizes[2] = {1 * Widths[0] * Heights[0], 2 * Widths[1] * Heights[1]};
3632  f->glGenTextures(2, mTexture);
3633  for(sint32 i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
3634  {
3635  f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTexture[i]);
3636  f->glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
3637  f->glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D,
3638  0, Level[i], Widths[i], Heights[i],
3639  0, Level[i], GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, Bits[i]);
3640  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3641  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3642  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3643  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3644  if(bitmapcache && Bits[i]) // CreateBitmap()을 위해 저장해 둠
3645  Memory::Copy(mBits[i].AtDumping(0, BitsSizes[i]), Bits[i], BitsSizes[i]);
3646  }
3647  }
3648  else
3649  {
3650  const sint32 BitsSize = 4 * mWidth * mHeight;
3651  f->glGenTextures(1, mTexture);
3652  f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTexture[0]);
3653  f->glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D,
3654  0, GL_RGBA8, mWidth, mHeight,
3655  0, GL_BGRA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, bits);
3656  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3657  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3658  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3659  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3660  if(bitmapcache && bits) // CreateBitmap()을 위해 저장해 둠
3661  Memory::Copy(mBits[0].AtDumping(0, BitsSize), bits, BitsSize);
3662  }
3663  }
3664  }
3665  void Remove()
3666  {
3667  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3668  if(ctx)
3669  {
3670  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3671  for(sint32 i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
3672  {
3673  if(mTexture[i])
3674  {
3675  f->glDeleteTextures(1, &mTexture[i]);
3676  mTexture[i] = 0;
3677  }
3678  }
3679  }
3680  }
3681  id_bitmap CreateBitmapByGL() const
3682  {
3683  id_bitmap NewBitmap = nullptr;
3684  if(mNV21)
3685  BOSS_ASSERT("NV21방식은 CreateBitmapByGL를 지원하지 않습니다", false);
3686  else
3687  {
3688  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3689  if(ctx)
3690  {
3691  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3692  GLuint fbo = 0, prevFbo = 0;
3693  f->glGenFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
3694  f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
3695  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo);
3696  NewBitmap = Bmp::Create(4, mWidth, mHeight);
3697  f->glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTexture[0], 0);
3698  f->glReadPixels(0, 0, mWidth, mHeight, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, Bmp::GetBits(NewBitmap));
3699  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
3700  f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
3701  Bmp::SwapRedBlue(NewBitmap);
3702  }
3703  else BOSS_ASSERT("OpenGL의 Context접근에 실패하였습니다", ctx);
3704  }
3705  return NewBitmap;
3706  }
3707  id_bitmap CreateBitmapByCopy() const
3708  {
3709  id_bitmap NewBitmap = nullptr;
3710  if(mNV21)
3711  {
3712  const sint32 Widths[2] = {mWidth, mWidth / 2};
3713  const sint32 Heights[2] = {mHeight, mHeight / 2};
3714  const sint32 BitsSizes[2] = {1 * Widths[0] * Heights[0], 2 * Widths[1] * Heights[1]};
3715  if(mBits[0].Count() == BitsSizes[0] && mBits[1].Count() == BitsSizes[1])
3716  NewBitmap = Bmp::CloneFromNV21(&mBits[0][0], (uv16s) &mBits[1][0], mWidth, mHeight);
3717  else BOSS_ASSERT("미리 저장된 mBits가 없어서 CreateBitmapByCopy에 실패하였습니다", false);
3718  }
3719  else
3720  {
3721  const sint32 BitsSize = 4 * mWidth * mHeight;
3722  if(mBits[0].Count() == BitsSize)
3723  {
3724  NewBitmap = Bmp::Create(4, mWidth, mHeight);
3725  Memory::Copy(Bmp::GetBits(NewBitmap), &mBits[0][0], BitsSize);
3726  }
3727  else BOSS_ASSERT("미리 저장된 mBits가 없어서 CreateBitmapByCopy에 실패하였습니다", false);
3728  }
3729  return NewBitmap;
3730  }
3731  void CopyFromBitmap(sint32 x, sint32 y, sint32 width, sint32 height, const Bmp::bitmappixel* bits)
3732  {
3733  BOSS_ASSERT("복사영역이 텍스쳐영역을 벗어납니다", 0 <= x && 0 <= y && x + width <= mWidth && y + height <= mHeight);
3734 
3735  QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
3736  BOSS_ASSERT("OpenGL의 Context접근에 실패하였습니다", ctx);
3737  if(ctx)
3738  {
3739  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
3740  if(mNV21)
3741  BOSS_ASSERT("개발이 필요합니다!", false);
3742  else
3743  {
3744  f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTexture[0]);
3745  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3746  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3747  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3748  f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
3749  f->glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0,
3750  x, y, width, height, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, bits);
3751  }
3752  }
3753  }
3754 
3755  public:
3756  inline TextureClass* clone() {++mRefCount; return this;}
3757  inline bool release() {return (--mRefCount == 0);}
3758  inline bool nv21() const {return mNV21;}
3759  inline sint32 width() const {return mWidth;}
3760  inline sint32 height() const {return mHeight;}
3761  inline uint32 id(sint32 i) const {return mTexture[i];}
3762 
3763  public:
3764  void ResetDirectly(uint32 texture, sint32 width, sint32 height)
3765  {
3766  mRefCount = 1;
3767  mNV21 = false;
3768  mWidth = width;
3769  mHeight = height;
3770  mTexture[0] = texture;
3771  }
3772  void ClearDirectly()
3773  {
3774  mRefCount = 0;
3775  mTexture[0] = 0;
3776  }
3777 
3778  private:
3779  sint32 mRefCount;
3780  bool mNV21;
3781  sint32 mWidth;
3782  sint32 mHeight;
3783  uint32 mTexture[2];
3784  uint08s mBits[2];
3785  };
3786 
3787  class SurfaceClass
3788  {
3789  public:
3790  SurfaceClass() : mFBO(0, 0, QOpenGLFramebufferObjectFormat()), mDevice(0, 0)
3791  {
3792  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", false);
3793  mSavedSurface = nullptr;
3794  mIsValidLastImage = false;
3795  }
3796  SurfaceClass(sint32 width, sint32 height, QOpenGLFramebufferObjectFormat* format)
3797  : mFBO(width, height, *format), mDevice(width, height)
3798  {
3799  BOSS_ASSERT("FBO생성에 실패하였습니다", mFBO.isValid());
3800  mSavedSurface = nullptr;
3801  mIsValidLastImage = false;
3802  }
3803  ~SurfaceClass()
3804  {
3805  mFBO.release();
3806  mLastTexture.ClearDirectly();
3807  }
3808 
3809  public:
3810  SurfaceClass(const SurfaceClass& rhs) : mFBO(0, 0, QOpenGLFramebufferObjectFormat()), mDevice(0, 0)
3811  {
3812  operator=(rhs);
3813  }
3814  SurfaceClass& operator=(const SurfaceClass& rhs)
3815  {
3816  BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", false);
3817  return *this;
3818  }
3819 
3820  public:
3821  inline uint32 fbo() const {return mFBO.handle();}
3822  inline id_texture_read texture() const
3823  {
3824  mLastTexture.ResetDirectly(mFBO.texture(), mFBO.width(), mFBO.height());
3825  return (id_texture_read) &mLastTexture;
3826  }
3827  inline sint32 width() const {return mFBO.width();}
3828  inline sint32 height() const {return mFBO.height();}
3829  inline PainterPrivate* painter() {return &mCanvas.painter();}
3830 
3831  public:
3832  void BindGraphics()
3833  {
3834  BOSS_ASSERT("mSavedSurface는 nullptr이어야 합니다", !mSavedSurface);
3835  mSavedSurface = ST();
3836  mCanvas.Bind(&mDevice);
3837  mFBO.bind();
3838  ST() = this;
3839  }
3840  void UnbindGraphics()
3841  {
3842  BOSS_ASSERT("SurfaceClass는 스택식으로 해제해야 합니다", ST() == this);
3843  mIsValidLastImage = false;
3844  mCanvas.Unbind();
3845  if(ST() = mSavedSurface)
3846  {
3847  mSavedSurface->mFBO.bind();
3848  mSavedSurface = nullptr;
3849  }
3850  }
3851  const ImagePrivate& GetLastImage() const
3852  {
3853  if(!mIsValidLastImage)
3854  {
3855  mIsValidLastImage = true;
3856  mLastImage = mFBO.toImage();
3857  }
3858  return mLastImage;
3859  }
3860 
3861  public:
3862  static void LockForGL()
3863  {
3864  BOSS_ASSERT("STGL()는 nullptr이어야 합니다", !STGL());
3865  STGL() = ST();
3866  ST() = nullptr;
3867  }
3868  static void UnlockForGL()
3869  {
3870  BOSS_ASSERT("ST()는 nullptr이어야 합니다", !ST());
3871  if(ST() = STGL())
3872  {
3873  STGL()->mFBO.bind();
3874  STGL() = nullptr;
3875  }
3876  }
3877 
3878  private:
3879  static inline SurfaceClass*& ST() {static SurfaceClass* _ = nullptr; return _;}
3880  static inline SurfaceClass*& STGL() {static SurfaceClass* _ = nullptr; return _;}
3881 
3882  private:
3883  SurfaceClass* mSavedSurface;
3884  QOpenGLFramebufferObject mFBO;
3885  QOpenGLPaintDevice mDevice;
3886  CanvasClass mCanvas;
3887 
3888  private:
3889  mutable bool mIsValidLastImage;
3890  mutable ImagePrivate mLastImage;
3891  mutable TextureClass mLastTexture;
3892  };
3893  #endif
3894 
3895  class ThreadClass : public QThread
3896  {
3897  Q_OBJECT
3898 
3899  public:
3900  static void Begin(ThreadCB cb, payload data)
3901  {
3902  new ThreadClass(cb, nullptr, data);
3903  }
3904  static void* BeginEx(ThreadExCB cb, payload data)
3905  {
3906  return new ThreadClass(nullptr, cb, data);
3907  }
3908 
3909  private:
3910  ThreadClass(ThreadCB cb1, ThreadExCB cb2, payload data)
3911  {
3912  BOSS_ASSERT("cb1와 cb2가 모두 nullptr일 순 없습니다", cb1 || cb2);
3913  m_cb1 = cb1;
3914  m_cb2 = cb2;
3915  m_data = data;
3916  connect(this, SIGNAL(finished()), SLOT(OnFinished()));
3917  start();
3918  }
3919  virtual ~ThreadClass() {}
3920 
3921  private:
3922  void run() override
3923  {
3924  if(m_cb1) m_cb1(m_data);
3925  else if(m_cb2) m_cb2(m_data);
3926  }
3927 
3928  private slots:
3929  void OnFinished()
3930  {
3931  delete this;
3932  }
3933 
3934  private:
3935  ThreadCB m_cb1;
3936  ThreadExCB m_cb2;
3937  payload m_data;
3938  };
3939 
3940  class ClockClass
3941  {
3942  public:
3943  ClockClass()
3944  {
3945  m_prev = GetHead();
3946  m_next = m_prev->m_next;
3947  m_prev->m_next = this;
3948  m_next->m_prev = this;
3949  if(!GetTimer().isValid())
3950  {
3951  GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() = ((sint64) EpochToJulian(QDateTime::currentMSecsSinceEpoch())) + GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc();
3952  GetTimer().start();
3953  }
3954  m_laptime = GetTimer().nsecsElapsed();
3955  }
3956  ClockClass(const ClockClass& rhs)
3957  {
3958  m_prev = GetHead();
3959  m_next = m_prev->m_next;
3960  m_prev->m_next = this;
3961  m_next->m_prev = this;
3962  operator=(rhs);
3963  }
3964  ~ClockClass()
3965  {
3966  m_prev->m_next = m_next;
3967  m_next->m_prev = m_prev;
3968  }
3969 
3970  public:
3971  void SetClock(sint32 year, sint32 month, sint32 day, sint32 hour, sint32 min, sint32 sec, sint64 nsec)
3972  {
3973  QDateTime NewTime = QDateTime::fromString(
3974  (chars) String::Format("%04d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d:%02d",
3975  year, month, day, hour, min, sec), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
3976  const sint64 NewClockMSec = ((sint64) EpochToJulian(NewTime.toMSecsSinceEpoch())) + GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc();
3977  m_laptime = (NewClockMSec - GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay()) * 1000000 + nsec;
3978  }
3979  void SetClock(uint64 windowtime_msec)
3980  {
3981  const uint64 NewWindowMSec = WindowToEpoch(windowtime_msec);
3982  const sint64 NewClockMSec = ((sint64) EpochToJulian(NewWindowMSec)) + GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc();
3983  m_laptime = (NewClockMSec - GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay()) * 1000000;
3984  }
3985 
3986  public:
3987  inline ClockClass& operator=(const ClockClass& rhs)
3988  {m_laptime = rhs.m_laptime; return *this;}
3989 
3990  public:
3991  inline sint64 GetLap() const {return m_laptime;}
3992  inline void AddLap(sint64 nsec) {m_laptime += nsec;}
3993  inline sint64 GetTotalSec() const
3994  {return GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() / 1000 + m_laptime / 1000000000;}
3995  inline sint64 GetNSecInSec() const
3996  {return ((GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() % 1000) * 1000000 + 1000000000 + (m_laptime % 1000000000)) % 1000000000;}
3997 
3998  public:
3999  static void SetBaseTime(chars timestring)
4000  {
4001  QDateTime CurrentTime = QDateTime::fromString(timestring, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
4002  GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() = ((sint64) EpochToJulian(CurrentTime.toMSecsSinceEpoch())) + GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc();
4003 
4004  const sint64 ChangedNSec = GetTimer().restart() * 1000000;
4005  ClockClass* CurNode = GetHead();
4006  while((CurNode = CurNode->m_next) != GetHead())
4007  CurNode->m_laptime -= ChangedNSec;
4008  }
4009  static sint64 GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc() {static sint64 _ = (sint64) (QDateTime::currentDateTime().utcOffset() * 1000); return _;}
4010 
4011  private:
4012  static ClockClass* GetHead() {static ClockClass _(0); return &_;}
4013  static QElapsedTimer& GetTimer() {static QElapsedTimer _; return _;}
4014  static sint64& GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() {static sint64 _ = 0; return _;}
4015 
4016  private:
4017  ClockClass(int) // Head전용
4018  {
4019  m_prev = this;
4020  m_next = this;
4021  }
4022 
4023  private:
4024  ClockClass* m_prev;
4025  ClockClass* m_next;
4026  sint64 m_laptime;
4027  };
4028 
4029  #ifdef QT_HAVE_MULTIMEDIA
4030  class SoundClass
4031  {
4032  public:
4033  SoundClass(chars filename, bool loop)
4034  {
4035  m_volume = 0;
4036  m_player = new QMediaPlayer();
4037  m_playlist = nullptr;
4038  m_output = nullptr;
4039  m_outputdevice = nullptr;
4040  m_outputmutex = nullptr;
4041 
4042  if(loop)
4043  {
4044  m_playlist = new QMediaPlaylist();
4045  m_playlist->addMedia(QUrl::fromLocalFile(filename));
4046  m_playlist->setPlaybackMode(QMediaPlaylist::Loop);
4047  m_player->setPlaylist(m_playlist);
4048  }
4049  else m_player->setMedia(QUrl::fromLocalFile(filename));
4050  m_player->setVolume(100);
4051  }
4052  SoundClass(sint32 channel, sint32 sample_rate, sint32 sample_size)
4053  {
4054  QAudioFormat AudioFormat;
4055  AudioFormat.setCodec("audio/pcm");
4056  AudioFormat.setChannelCount(channel);
4057  AudioFormat.setSampleRate(sample_rate);
4058  AudioFormat.setSampleSize(sample_size);
4059  AudioFormat.setSampleType(QAudioFormat::SignedInt);
4060  AudioFormat.setByteOrder(QAudioFormat::LittleEndian);
4061 
4062  m_volume = 0;
4063  m_player = nullptr;
4064  m_playlist = nullptr;
4065  m_output = new QAudioOutput(AudioFormat);
4066  m_output->setBufferSize(sample_rate);
4067  m_output->setVolume(100);
4068  m_outputdevice = nullptr;
4069  m_outputmutex = Mutex::Open();
4070  }
4071  ~SoundClass()
4072  {
4073  Stop();
4074  delete m_player;
4075  delete m_playlist;
4076  delete m_output;
4077  Mutex::Close(m_outputmutex);
4078  }
4079 
4080  public:
4081  void Play(float volume_rate)
4082  {
4083  m_volume = Math::Max(0, 256 * volume_rate);
4084  branch;
4085  jump(m_player)
4086  {
4087  m_player->setVolume(100 * volume_rate);
4088  m_player->play();
4089  }
4090  jump(m_output)
4091  {
4092  if(!m_outputdevice)
4093  {
4094  Mutex::Lock(m_outputmutex);
4095  m_outputdevice = m_output->start();
4096  Mutex::Unlock(m_outputmutex);
4097  }
4098  }
4099  }
4100  void Stop()
4101  {
4102  branch;
4103  jump(m_player) m_player->stop();
4104  jump(m_output)
4105  {
4106  if(m_outputdevice)
4107  {
4108  Mutex::Lock(m_outputmutex);
4109  m_output->stop();
4110  m_outputdevice = nullptr;
4111  Mutex::Unlock(m_outputmutex);
4112  }
4113  }
4114  }
4115  bool NowPlaying()
4116  {
4117  branch;
4118  jump(m_player)
4119  {
4120  if(m_player->state() == QMediaPlayer::PlayingState)
4121  return true;
4122  }
4123  jump(m_output)
4124  {
4125  if(m_outputdevice && m_output->state() == QAudio::ActiveState)
4126  return true;
4127  }
4128  return false;
4129  }
4130  sint32 AddStreamForPlay(bytes raw, sint32 size, sint32 timeout)
4131  {
4132  Mutex::Lock(m_outputmutex);
4133  sint32 WrittenBytes = -1;
4134  if(m_outputdevice)
4135  WrittenBytes = m_outputdevice->write((chars) raw, size);
4136  Mutex::Unlock(m_outputmutex);
4137 
4138  if(WrittenBytes == -1)
4139  return -1;
4140  else if(WrittenBytes < size)
4141  {
4142  uint64 BeginMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
4143  while(Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec() < BeginMsec + timeout)
4144  {
4145  Platform::Utility::Sleep(1, false, false);
4146  raw += WrittenBytes;
4147  size -= WrittenBytes;
4148 
4149  Mutex::Lock(m_outputmutex);
4150  WrittenBytes = -1;
4151  if(m_outputdevice)
4152  WrittenBytes = m_outputdevice->write((chars) raw, size);
4153  Mutex::Unlock(m_outputmutex);
4154 
4155  if(WrittenBytes == -1)
4156  return -1;
4157  if(WrittenBytes == size)
4158  return m_volume;
4159  }
4160  return -1; // Timeout
4161  }
4162  return m_volume;
4163  }
4164 
4165  private:
4166  sint32 m_volume;
4167  QMediaPlayer* m_player;
4168  QMediaPlaylist* m_playlist;
4169  QAudioOutput* m_output;
4170  QIODevice* m_outputdevice;
4171  id_mutex m_outputmutex;
4172  };
4173  #endif
4174 
4175  class TCPPeerData : public QObjectUserData
4176  {
4177  public:
4178  const sint32 ID;
4179  sint32 PacketNeeds;
4180 
4181  public:
4182  TCPPeerData() : ID(MakeID()) {PacketNeeds = 0;}
4183  virtual ~TCPPeerData() {}
4184 
4185  public:
4186  static uint ClassID()
4187  {static uint _ = QObject::registerUserData(); return _;}
4188  static int MakeID() {static int _ = -1; return ++_;}
4189  };
4190 
4191  class TCPPacket
4192  {
4193  public:
4194  const packettype Type;
4195  const sint32 PeerID;
4196  buffer Buffer;
4197 
4198  public:
4199  TCPPacket(packettype type, sint32 peerid, sint32 buffersize)
4200  : Type(type), PeerID(peerid) {Buffer = Buffer::Alloc(BOSS_DBG buffersize);}
4201  ~TCPPacket() {Buffer::Free(Buffer);}
4202  public:
4203  void DestroyMe() {delete this;}
4204  };
4205 
4206  class TCPAgent : public QTcpServer
4207  {
4208  Q_OBJECT
4209 
4210  private:
4211  bool UsingSizeField;
4212  Map<QTcpSocket*> Peers;
4213  Queue<TCPPacket*> PacketQueue;
4214  TCPPacket* FocusedPacket;
4215 
4216  private slots:
4217  void acceptPeer()
4218  {
4219  QTcpSocket* Peer = nextPendingConnection();
4220  TCPPeerData* NewData = new TCPPeerData();
4221  Peers[NewData->ID] = Peer;
4222  Peer->setUserData(TCPPeerData::ClassID(), NewData);
4223  PacketQueue.Enqueue(new TCPPacket(packettype_entrance, NewData->ID, 0));
4224 
4225  if(!UsingSizeField) connect(Peer, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(readyPeer()));
4226  else connect(Peer, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(readyPeerWithSizeField()));
4227  connect(Peer, SIGNAL(error(QAbstractSocket::SocketError)),
4228  this, SLOT(errorPeer(QAbstractSocket::SocketError)));
4229  Platform::BroadcastNotify("entrance", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4230  }
4231 
4232  void readyPeer()
4233  {
4234  QTcpSocket* Peer = (QTcpSocket*) sender();
4235  TCPPeerData* Data = (TCPPeerData*) Peer->userData(TCPPeerData::ClassID());
4236  sint64 PacketSize = Peer->bytesAvailable();
4237 
4238  if(0 < PacketSize)
4239  {
4240  TCPPacket* NewPacket = new TCPPacket(packettype_message, Data->ID, PacketSize);
4241  Peer->read((char*) NewPacket->Buffer, PacketSize);
4242  PacketQueue.Enqueue(NewPacket);
4243  }
4244  Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4245  }
4246 
4247  void readyPeerWithSizeField()
4248  {
4249  QTcpSocket* Peer = (QTcpSocket*) sender();
4250  TCPPeerData* Data = (TCPPeerData*) Peer->userData(TCPPeerData::ClassID());
4251  sint64 PacketSize = Peer->bytesAvailable();
4252 
4253  while(0 < PacketSize)
4254  {
4255  if(Data->PacketNeeds == 0)
4256  {
4257  if(4 <= PacketSize)
4258  {
4259  PacketSize -= 4;
4260  int GetPacketSize = 0;
4261  Peer->read((char*) &GetPacketSize, 4);
4262  Data->PacketNeeds = GetPacketSize;
4263  }
4264  else break;
4265  }
4266  if(0 < Data->PacketNeeds)
4267  {
4268  if(Data->PacketNeeds <= PacketSize)
4269  {
4270  PacketSize -= Data->PacketNeeds;
4271  TCPPacket* NewPacket = new TCPPacket(packettype_message, Data->ID, Data->PacketNeeds);
4272  Peer->read((char*) NewPacket->Buffer, Data->PacketNeeds);
4273  PacketQueue.Enqueue(NewPacket);
4274  Data->PacketNeeds = 0;
4275  }
4276  else break;
4277  }
4278  }
4279  Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4280  }
4281 
4282  void errorPeer(QAbstractSocket::SocketError error)
4283  {
4284  QTcpSocket* Peer = (QTcpSocket*) sender();
4285  TCPPeerData* Data = (TCPPeerData*) Peer->userData(TCPPeerData::ClassID());
4286  Peers.Remove(Data->ID);
4287 
4288  if(error == QAbstractSocket::RemoteHostClosedError)
4289  {
4290  PacketQueue.Enqueue(new TCPPacket(packettype_leaved, Data->ID, 0));
4291  Platform::BroadcastNotify("leaved", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4292  }
4293  else
4294  {
4295  PacketQueue.Enqueue(new TCPPacket(packettype_kicked, Data->ID, 0));
4296  Platform::BroadcastNotify("kicked", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4297  }
4298  }
4299 
4300  public:
4301  TCPAgent(bool sizefield = false)
4302  {
4303  UsingSizeField = sizefield;
4304  FocusedPacket = new TCPPacket(packettype_null, -1, 0);
4305  connect(this, SIGNAL(newConnection()), this, SLOT(acceptPeer()));
4306  }
4307 
4308  virtual ~TCPAgent()
4309  {
4310  for(TCPPacket* UnusedPacket = nullptr; UnusedPacket = PacketQueue.Dequeue();)
4311  UnusedPacket->DestroyMe();
4312  delete FocusedPacket;
4313  }
4314 
4315  TCPAgent& operator=(const TCPAgent&)
4316  {
4317  BOSS_ASSERT("호출불가", false);
4318  return *this;
4319  }
4320 
4321  public:
4322  bool TryPacket()
4323  {
4324  TCPPacket* PopPacket = PacketQueue.Dequeue();
4325  if(!PopPacket) return false;
4326  delete FocusedPacket;
4327  FocusedPacket = PopPacket;
4328  return true;
4329  }
4330 
4331  TCPPacket* GetFocusedPacket()
4332  {
4333  return FocusedPacket;
4334  }
4335 
4336  bool SendPacket(int peerid, const void* buffer, sint32 buffersize)
4337  {
4338  if(QTcpSocket** Peer = Peers.Access(peerid))
4339  return ((*Peer)->write((chars) buffer, buffersize) == buffersize);
4340  Peers.Remove(peerid);
4341  return false;
4342  }
4343 
4344  bool KickPeer(int peerid)
4345  {
4346  if(QTcpSocket** Peer = Peers.Access(peerid))
4347  {
4348  (*Peer)->disconnectFromHost();
4349  Peers.Remove(peerid);
4350  PacketQueue.Enqueue(new TCPPacket(packettype_kicked, peerid, 0));
4351  Platform::BroadcastNotify("kicked", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4352  return true;
4353  }
4354  return false;
4355  }
4356 
4357  bool GetPeerAddress(int peerid, ip4address* ip4, ip6address* ip6, uint16* port)
4358  {
4359  if(QTcpSocket** Peer = Peers.Access(peerid))
4360  {
4361  if(ip4)
4362  {
4363  auto IPv4Address = (*Peer)->peerAddress().toIPv4Address();
4364  ip4->ip[0] = (IPv4Address >> 24) & 0xFF;
4365  ip4->ip[1] = (IPv4Address >> 16) & 0xFF;
4366  ip4->ip[2] = (IPv4Address >> 8) & 0xFF;
4367  ip4->ip[3] = (IPv4Address >> 0) & 0xFF;
4368  }
4369  if(ip6)
4370  {
4371  auto IPv6Address = (*Peer)->peerAddress().toIPv6Address();
4372  *ip6 = *((ip6address*) &IPv6Address);
4373  }
4374  if(port) *port = (*Peer)->peerPort();
4375  return true;
4376  }
4377  return false;
4378  }
4379  };
4380 
4381  class SocketBox : public QObject
4382  {
4383  Q_OBJECT
4384 
4385  public:
4386  SocketBox()
4387  {
4388  m_socket = nullptr;
4389  m_udp = false;
4390  m_udpip.clear();
4391  m_udpport = 0;
4392  }
4393  virtual ~SocketBox()
4394  {
4395  delete m_socket;
4396  }
4397 
4398  public:
4399  void Init(bool udp)
4400  {
4401  m_socket = (udp)? (QAbstractSocket*) new QUdpSocket() : (QAbstractSocket*) new QTcpSocket();
4402  connect(m_socket, &QAbstractSocket::connected, this, &SocketBox::OnConnected);
4403  connect(m_socket, &QAbstractSocket::disconnected, this, &SocketBox::OnDisconnected);
4404  connect(m_socket, &QAbstractSocket::readyRead, this, &SocketBox::OnReadyRead);
4405  m_udp = udp;
4406  }
4407  bool CheckState(chars name)
4408  {
4409  if(!m_udp)
4410  {
4411  if(!m_socket->isValid())
4412  return false;
4413  if(m_socket->state() == QAbstractSocket::UnconnectedState)
4414  return false;
4415  }
4416  return true;
4417  }
4418 
4419  private slots:
4420  void OnConnected()
4421  {
4422  Platform::BroadcastNotify("connected", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4423  }
4424  void OnDisconnected()
4425  {
4426  Platform::BroadcastNotify("disconnected", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4427  }
4428  void OnReadyRead()
4429  {
4430  Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
4431  }
4432 
4433  public:
4434  QAbstractSocket* m_socket;
4435  bool m_udp;
4436  QHostAddress m_udpip;
4437  quint16 m_udpport;
4438 
4439  private:
4440  class STClass
4441  {
4442  public:
4443  STClass()
4444  {
4445  static uint64 LastThreadID = 0;
4446  m_lastId = (++LastThreadID) << 32;
4447  }
4448  ~STClass() {}
4449  public:
4450  Map<SocketBox> m_map;
4451  ublock m_lastId;
4452  };
4453  static inline STClass& ST() {return *BOSS_STORAGE_SYS(STClass);}
4454 
4455  public:
4456  static void Create(id_socket& result, bool udp)
4457  {
4458  STClass& CurClass = ST();
4459  CurClass.m_map[++CurClass.m_lastId].Init(udp);
4460  result = (id_socket) AnyTypeToPtr(CurClass.m_lastId);
4461  }
4462  static SocketBox* Access(id_socket id)
4463  {
4464  if(id == nullptr) return nullptr;
4465  BOSS_ASSERT("타 스레드에서 생성된 소켓입니다", (ST().m_lastId >> 32) == (((ublock) id) >> 32));
4466  return ST().m_map.Access(PtrToUint64(id));
4467  }
4468  static void Remove(id_socket id)
4469  {
4470  ST().m_map.Remove(PtrToUint64(id));
4471  }
4472  };
4473 
4474  class Hostent
4475  {
4476  public:
4477  Hostent() :
4478  h_addrtype(2), // AF_INET
4479  h_length(4) // IPv4
4480  {
4481  h_name = nullptr;
4482  h_aliases = nullptr;
4483  h_addr_list = nullptr;
4484  }
4485 
4486  ~Hostent()
4487  {
4488  Clear();
4489  }
4490 
4491  public:
4492  void Clear()
4493  {
4494  delete[] h_name;
4495  if(h_aliases)
4496  for(chars* ptr_aliases = h_aliases; *ptr_aliases; ++ptr_aliases)
4497  delete[] *ptr_aliases;
4498  delete[] h_aliases;
4499  if(h_addr_list)
4500  for(bytes* ptr_addr_list = h_addr_list; *ptr_addr_list; ++ptr_addr_list)
4501  delete[] *ptr_addr_list;
4502  delete[] h_addr_list;
4503  h_name = nullptr;
4504  h_aliases = nullptr;
4505  h_addr_list = nullptr;
4506  }
4507 
4508  public:
4509  chars h_name;
4510  chars* h_aliases;
4511  const sint16 h_addrtype;
4512  const sint16 h_length;
4513  bytes* h_addr_list;
4514  };
4515 
4516  class Servent
4517  {
4518  public:
4519  Servent()
4520  {
4521  s_name = nullptr;
4522  s_aliases = nullptr;
4523  s_port = 0;
4524  s_proto = nullptr;
4525  }
4526 
4527  ~Servent()
4528  {
4529  Clear();
4530  }
4531 
4532  public:
4533  void Clear()
4534  {
4535  delete[] s_name;
4536  for(chars* ptr_aliases = s_aliases; ptr_aliases; ++ptr_aliases)
4537  delete[] *ptr_aliases;
4538  delete[] s_aliases;
4539  delete[] s_proto;
4540  s_name = nullptr;
4541  s_aliases = nullptr;
4542  s_port = 0;
4543  s_proto = nullptr;
4544  }
4545 
4546  public:
4547  chars s_name;
4548  chars* s_aliases;
4549  sint16 s_port;
4550  chars s_proto;
4551  };
4552 
4553  class PipePrivate : public QObject
4554  {
4555  Q_OBJECT
4556 
4557  public:
4558  PipePrivate(QSharedMemory* semaphore)
4559  {
4560  mStatus = CS_Connecting;
4561  mTempContext = nullptr;
4562  mSemaphore = semaphore;
4563  }
4564  virtual ~PipePrivate()
4565  {
4566  delete mTempContext;
4567  delete mSemaphore;
4568  }
4569 
4570  public:
4571  inline ConnectStatus Status() const {return mStatus;}
4572  inline sint32 RecvAvailable() const {return mData.Count();}
4573  sint32 Recv(uint08* data, sint32 size)
4574  {
4575  const sint32 MinSize = Math::Min(size, mData.Count());
4576  Memory::Copy(data, &mData[0], MinSize);
4577  if(MinSize == mData.Count()) mData.SubtractionAll();
4578  else mData.SubtractionSection(0, MinSize);
4579  return MinSize;
4580  }
4581  bool Send(bytes data, sint32 size)
4582  {
4583  bool Result = SendCore(data, size);
4584  FlushCore();
4585  return Result;
4586  }
4587 
4588  public:
4589  virtual bool IsServer() const = 0;
4590  virtual bool SendCore(bytes data, sint32 size) = 0;
4591  virtual void FlushCore() = 0;
4592 
4593  public:
4594  const Context* RecvJson()
4595  {
4596  static const String JsonBegin("#json begin");
4597  static const String JsonEnd("#json end");
4598  delete mTempContext;
4599  mTempContext = nullptr;
4600 
4601  if(JsonEnd.Length() < mData.Count())
4602  {
4603  String Message(mData);
4604  sint32 BeginPos = 0, EndPos = 0;
4605  if((EndPos = Message.Find(0, JsonEnd)) != -1)
4606  {
4607  if((BeginPos = Message.Find(0, JsonBegin)) != -1)
4608  {
4609  const sint32 JsonPos = BeginPos + JsonBegin.Length();
4610  const sint32 JsonSize = EndPos - JsonPos;
4611  mTempContext = new Context(ST_Json, SO_NeedCopy, &mData[JsonPos], JsonSize);
4612  }
4613  mData.SubtractionSection(0, EndPos + JsonEnd.Length());
4614  }
4615  }
4616  return mTempContext;
4617  }
4618  bool SendJson(const String& json)
4619  {
4620  bool Result = true;
4621  Result &= SendCore((bytes) "#json begin", 11);
4622  Result &= SendCore((bytes) (chars) json, json.Length());
4623  Result &= SendCore((bytes) "#json end", 9);
4624  FlushCore();
4625  return Result;
4626  }
4627 
4628  protected:
4629  ConnectStatus mStatus;
4630  chararray mData;
4631  Context* mTempContext;
4632  QSharedMemory* mSemaphore;
4633  };
4634 
4635  class PipeServerPrivate : public PipePrivate
4636  {
4637  Q_OBJECT
4638 
4639  public:
4640  PipeServerPrivate(QLocalServer* server, QSharedMemory* semaphore) : PipePrivate(semaphore)
4641  {
4642  mServer = server;
4643  mLastClient = nullptr;
4644  connect(server, &QLocalServer::newConnection, this, &PipeServerPrivate::OnNewConnection);
4645  }
4646  ~PipeServerPrivate() override
4647  {
4648  delete mServer;
4649  }
4650 
4651  private:
4652  bool IsServer() const override
4653  {
4654  return true;
4655  }
4656  bool SendCore(bytes data, sint32 size) override
4657  {
4658  if(mLastClient)
4659  return (mLastClient->write((chars) data, size) == size);
4660  return false;
4661  }
4662  void FlushCore() override
4663  {
4664  if(mLastClient)
4665  mLastClient->flush();
4666  }
4667 
4668  private slots:
4669  void OnNewConnection()
4670  {
4671  QLocalSocket* NewClient = mServer->nextPendingConnection();
4672  if(mStatus == CS_Connecting)
4673  {
4674  mStatus = CS_Connected;
4675  mLastClient = NewClient;
4676  connect(mLastClient, &QLocalSocket::readyRead, this, &PipeServerPrivate::OnReadyRead);
4677  connect(mLastClient, &QLocalSocket::disconnected, this, &PipeServerPrivate::OnDisconnected);
4678  }
4679  else NewClient->disconnectFromServer();
4680  }
4681  void OnReadyRead()
4682  {
4683  mLastClient = (QLocalSocket*) sender();
4684  if(sint64 PacketSize = mLastClient->bytesAvailable())
4685  mLastClient->read((char*) mData.AtDumpingAdded(PacketSize), PacketSize);
4686  }
4687  void OnDisconnected()
4688  {
4689  mStatus = CS_Connecting;
4690  mLastClient = nullptr;
4691  }
4692 
4693  private:
4694  QLocalServer* mServer;
4695  QLocalSocket* mLastClient;
4696  };
4697 
4698  class PipeClientPrivate : public PipePrivate
4699  {
4700  Q_OBJECT
4701 
4702  public:
4703  PipeClientPrivate(chars name, QSharedMemory* semaphore) : PipePrivate(semaphore)
4704  {
4705  mClient = new QLocalSocket();
4706  connect(mClient, &QLocalSocket::readyRead, this, &PipeClientPrivate::OnReadyRead);
4707  connect(mClient, &QLocalSocket::connected, this, &PipeClientPrivate::OnConnected);
4708  connect(mClient, &QLocalSocket::disconnected, this, &PipeClientPrivate::OnDisconnected);
4709 
4710  mClient->abort();
4711  mClient->connectToServer(name);
4712  }
4713  ~PipeClientPrivate() override
4714  {
4715  delete mClient;
4716  }
4717 
4718  private:
4719  bool IsServer() const override
4720  {
4721  return false;
4722  }
4723  bool SendCore(bytes data, sint32 size) override
4724  {
4725  return (mClient->write((chars) data, size) == size);
4726  }
4727  void FlushCore() override
4728  {
4729  mClient->flush();
4730  }
4731 
4732  private slots:
4733  void OnReadyRead()
4734  {
4735  if(sint64 PacketSize = mClient->bytesAvailable())
4736  mClient->read((char*) mData.AtDumpingAdded(PacketSize), PacketSize);
4737  }
4738  void OnConnected()
4739  {
4740  mStatus = CS_Connected;
4741  }
4742  void OnDisconnected()
4743  {
4744  mStatus = CS_Disconnected;
4745  }
4746 
4747  private:
4748  QLocalSocket* mClient;
4749  };
4750
