4835  class WebViewPrivate : public WebEngineViewClass
4836  {
4837  Q_OBJECT
4838 
4839  public:
4840  WebViewPrivate(WidgetPrivate* parent = nullptr) : WebEngineViewClass(parent), mHandle(h_web::null())
4841  {
4842  mNowLoading = false;
4843  mLoadingProgress = 100;
4844  mLoadingRate = 1;
4845  mCb = nullptr;
4846  mData = nullptr;
4847 
4848  setPage(new WebPagePrivate(this));
4849  setMouseTracking(true);
4850  connect(this, SIGNAL(titleChanged(QString)), SLOT(onTitleChanged(QString)));
4851  connect(this, SIGNAL(urlChanged(QUrl)), SLOT(onUrlChanged(QUrl)));
4852  connect(this, SIGNAL(loadStarted()), SLOT(onLoadStarted()));
4853  connect(this, SIGNAL(loadProgress(int)), SLOT(onLoadProgress(int)));
4854  connect(this, SIGNAL(loadFinished(bool)), SLOT(onLoadFinished(bool)));
4855  }
4856  virtual ~WebViewPrivate()
4857  {
4858  mHandle.set_buf(nullptr);
4859  }
4860 
4861  public:
4862  WebViewPrivate(const WebViewPrivate&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
4863  WebViewPrivate& operator=(const WebViewPrivate&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
4864 
4865  public:
4866  void SetCallback(Platform::Web::EventCB cb, payload data)
4867  {
4868  mCb = cb;
4869  mData = data;
4870  ((WebPagePrivate*) page())->SetCallback(cb, data);
4871  }
4872  void CallJSFunction(chars script, sint32 matchid)
4873  {
4874  page()->runJavaScript(script,
4875  [this, matchid](const QVariant& v)->void
4876  {
4877  if(mCb)
4878  {
4879  const String Result = v.toString().toUtf8().constData();
4880  if(0 < Result.Length())
4881  mCb(mData, String::Format("JSFunction:%d", matchid), Result);
4882  }
4883  });
4884  }
4885 
4886  protected:
4887  void closeEvent(CloseEventPrivate* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
4888  {
4889  event->accept();
4890  mHandle.set_buf(nullptr);
4891  }
4892 
4893  private slots:
4894  void onTitleChanged(const QString& title)
4895  {
4896  if(mCb)
4897  mCb(mData, "TitleChanged", title.toUtf8().constData());
4898  }
4899  void onUrlChanged(const QUrl& url)
4900  {
4901  if(mCb)
4902  mCb(mData, "UrlChanged", url.url().toUtf8().constData());
4903  }
4904  void onLoadStarted()
4905  {
4906  mNowLoading = true;
4907  mLoadingProgress = 0;
4908  mLoadingRate = 0;
4909  }
4910  void onLoadProgress(int progress)
4911  {
4912  mNowLoading = true;
4913  mLoadingProgress = progress;
4914  }
4915  void onLoadFinished(bool)
4916  {
4917  mNowLoading = false;
4918  mLoadingProgress = 100;
4919  mLoadingRate = 1;
4920  }
4921 
4922  public:
4923  h_web mHandle;
4924  bool mNowLoading;
4925  int mLoadingProgress;
4926  float mLoadingRate;
4927 
4928  private:
4929  Platform::Web::EventCB mCb;
4930  payload mData;
4931  };
4932 
4933  #if defined(QT_HAVE_WEBENGINEWIDGETS) & !defined(BOSS_SILENT_NIGHT_IS_ENABLED)
4934  class WebPrivateForDesktop
4935  {
4936  public:
4937  WebPrivateForDesktop()
4938  {
4939  mProxy = mScene.addWidget(&mView);
4940  mLastTextureGL = nullptr;
4941  }
4942  ~WebPrivateForDesktop()
4943  {
4944  mScene.removeItem(mProxy);
4945  mLastTexture.ClearDirectly();
4946  delete mLastTextureGL;
4947  }
4948 
4949  public:
4950  WebPrivateForDesktop(const WebPrivateForDesktop&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
4951  WebPrivateForDesktop& operator=(const WebPrivateForDesktop&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
4952 
4953  public:
4954  void AttachHandle(h_web web)
4955  {
4956  mView.mHandle = web;
4957  }
4958  void ClearCookies()
4959  {
4960  mView.page()->profile()->setPersistentCookiesPolicy(QWebEngineProfile::NoPersistentCookies);
4961  }
4962  void Reload(chars url)
4963  {
4964  mView.load(QUrl(QString(url)));
4965  }
4966  bool NowLoading(float* rate)
4967  {
4968  if(rate)
4969  {
4970  mView.mLoadingRate = mView.mLoadingRate * 0.9f + mView.mLoadingProgress / 100.0f * 0.1f;
4971  *rate = mView.mLoadingRate;
4972  }
4973  return mView.mNowLoading && (mView.mLoadingProgress < 100); // LoadingProgress만 100%가 되어도 로딩이 끝난것으로 간주
4974  }
4975  bool Resize(sint32 width, sint32 height)
4976  {
4977  if(width != mLastImage.width() || height != mLastImage.height())
4978  {
4979  mView.resize(width, height);
4980  mLastImage = ImagePrivate(width, height, ImagePrivate::Format_ARGB32);
4981  return true;
4982  }
4983  return false;
4984  }
4985  void SetCallback(Platform::Web::EventCB cb, payload data)
4986  {
4987  mView.SetCallback(cb, data);
4988  }
4989  void SendTouchEvent(TouchType type, sint32 x, sint32 y)
4990  {
4991  MouseEventPrivate::Type CurType = MouseEventPrivate::None;
4992  switch(type)
4993  {
4994  case TT_Moving: CurType = MouseEventPrivate::MouseMove; break;
4995  case TT_Press: CurType = MouseEventPrivate::MouseButtonPress; break;
4996  case TT_Dragging: CurType = MouseEventPrivate::MouseMove; break;
4997  case TT_Release: CurType = MouseEventPrivate::MouseButtonRelease; break;
4998  default: BOSS_ASSERT("해당 case가 준비되지 않았습니다", false);
4999  }
5000  MouseEventPrivate NewEvent(CurType, QPoint(x, y), Qt::LeftButton, Qt::LeftButton, Qt::NoModifier);
5001  Q_FOREACH(QObject* obj, mView.page()->view()->children())
5002  {
5003  if(qobject_cast<WidgetPrivate*>(obj))
5004  ApplicationPrivate::sendEvent(obj, &NewEvent);
5005  }
5006  }
5007  void SendKeyEvent(sint32 code, chars text, bool pressed)
5008  {
5009  if(auto CurWidget = mView.focusProxy())
5010  {
5011  KeyEventPrivate NewEvent((pressed)? KeyEventPrivate::KeyPress : KeyEventPrivate::KeyRelease, code, Qt::NoModifier, text);
5012  ApplicationPrivate::sendEvent(CurWidget, &NewEvent);
5013  }
5014  }
5015  void CallJSFunction(chars script, sint32 matchid)
5016  {
5017  mView.CallJSFunction(script, matchid);
5018  }
5019  id_texture_read GetTexture()
5020  {
5021  delete mLastTextureGL;
5022  mLastTextureGL = new QOpenGLTexture(GetImage());
5023  mLastTexture.ResetDirectly(mLastTextureGL->textureId(), mLastTextureGL->width(), mLastTextureGL->height());
5024  return (id_texture_read) &mLastTexture;
5025  }
5026  const PixmapPrivate GetPixmap()
5027  {
5028  return PixmapPrivate::fromImage(GetImage());
5029  }
5030  const ImagePrivate& GetImage()
5031  {
5032  CanvasClass CurCanvas(&mLastImage);
5033  mView.update();
5034  mView.render(&CurCanvas.painter());
5035  return mLastImage;
5036  }
5037 
5038  private:
5039  WebViewPrivate mView;
5040  QGraphicsProxyWidget* mProxy;
5041  QGraphicsScene mScene;
5042  ImagePrivate mLastImage;
5043  TextureClass mLastTexture;
5044  QOpenGLTexture* mLastTextureGL;
5045  };
5046  typedef WebPrivateForDesktop WebPrivate;
5047  #else
5048  class WebPrivateForExtraDesktop
5049  {
5050  public:
5051  WebPrivateForExtraDesktop()
5052  {
5053  }
5054  ~WebPrivateForExtraDesktop()
5055  {
5056  }
5057 
5058  public:
5059  WebPrivateForExtraDesktop(const WebPrivateForExtraDesktop&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
5060  WebPrivateForExtraDesktop& operator=(const WebPrivateForExtraDesktop&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
5061 
5062  public:
5063  void AttachHandle(h_web web)
5064  {
5065  }
5066  void ClearCookies()
5067  {
5068  }
5069  void Reload(chars url)
5070  {
5071  }
5072  bool NowLoading(float* rate)
5073  {
5074  if(rate) *rate = 1;
5075  return false;
5076  }
5077  bool Resize(sint32 width, sint32 height)
5078  {
5079  if(width != mLastImage.width() || height != mLastImage.height())
5080  {
5081  mLastImage = ImagePrivate(width, height, ImagePrivate::Format_ARGB32);
5082  return true;
5083  }
5084  return false;
5085  }
5086  void SetCallback(Platform::Web::EventCB cb, payload data)
5087  {
5088  }
5089  void SendTouchEvent(TouchType type, sint32 x, sint32 y)
5090  {
5091  }
5092  void SendKeyEvent(sint32 code, chars text, bool pressed)
5093  {
5094  }
5095  void CallJSFunction(chars script, sint32 matchid)
5096  {
5097  }
5098  id_texture_read GetTexture()
5099  {
5100  return nullptr;
5101  }
5102  const PixmapPrivate GetPixmap()
5103  {
5104  return PixmapPrivate::fromImage(GetImage());
5105  }
5106  const ImagePrivate& GetImage()
5107  {
5108  CanvasClass CurCanvas(&mLastImage);
5109  const QRect CurRect(0, 0, mLastImage.width(), mLastImage.height());
5110  return mLastImage;
5111  }
5112 
5113  private:
5114  ImagePrivate mLastImage;
5115  };
5116  typedef WebPrivateForExtraDesktop WebPrivate;
5117  #endif
5118 
5119  #ifdef QT_HAVE_PURCHASING
5120  class PurchasePrivate : public QInAppStore
5121  {
5122  Q_OBJECT
5123 
5124  public:
5125  PurchasePrivate(WidgetPrivate* parent = nullptr) : QInAppStore(parent)
5126  {
5127  mProduct = nullptr;
5128  connect(this, SIGNAL(productRegistered(QInAppProduct*)), SLOT(onProductRegistered(QInAppProduct*)));
5129  connect(this, SIGNAL(productUnknown(QInAppProduct::ProductType, const QString&)), SLOT(onProductUnknown(QInAppProduct::ProductType, const QString&)));
5130  connect(this, SIGNAL(transactionReady(QInAppTransaction*)), SLOT(onTransactionReady(QInAppTransaction*)));
5131  }
5132  ~PurchasePrivate()
5133  {
5134  }
5135 
5136  public:
5137  PurchasePrivate(const PurchasePrivate&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
5138  PurchasePrivate& operator=(const PurchasePrivate&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
5139 
5140  public:
5141  bool Register(chars name, PurchaseType type)
5142  {
5143  mName = name;
5144  switch(type)
5145  {
5146  case PT_Consumable:
5147  registerProduct(QInAppProduct::Consumable, name);
5148  return true;
5149  case PT_Unlockable:
5150  registerProduct(QInAppProduct::Unlockable, name);
5151  return true;
5152  }
5153  return false;
5154  }
5155  bool Purchase(PurchaseCB cb)
5156  {
5157  if(!mProduct)
5158  mProduct = registeredProduct((chars) mName);
5159  if(mProduct)
5160  {
5161  mProduct->purchase();
5162  return true;
5163  }
5164  return false;
5165  }
5166 
5167  private slots:
5168  void onProductRegistered(QInAppProduct* product)
5169  {
5170  }
5171  void onProductUnknown(QInAppProduct::ProductType productType, const QString& identifier)
5172  {
5173  }
5174  void onTransactionReady(QInAppTransaction* transaction)
5175  {
5176  }
5177 
5178  public:
5179  String mName;
5180  QInAppProduct* mProduct;
5181  };
5182  #else
5183  class PurchasePrivate : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
5184  #endif
5185 
5186  #if BOSS_ANDROID & defined(QT_HAVE_SERIALPORT)
5187  typedef QSerialPortInfo SerialPortInfoClass;
5188  class SerialPortForAndroid
5189  {
5190  public:
5191  enum BaudRate {
5192  Baud1200 = QSerialPort::Baud1200,
5193  Baud2400 = QSerialPort::Baud2400,
5194  Baud4800 = QSerialPort::Baud4800,
5195  Baud9600 = QSerialPort::Baud9600,
5196  Baud19200 = QSerialPort::Baud19200,
5197  Baud38400 = QSerialPort::Baud38400,
5198  Baud57600 = QSerialPort::Baud57600,
5199  Baud115200 = QSerialPort::Baud115200,
5200  UnknownBaud = QSerialPort::UnknownBaud};
5201  enum DataBits {
5202  Data5 = QSerialPort::Data5,
5203  Data6 = QSerialPort::Data6,
5204  Data7 = QSerialPort::Data7,
5205  Data8 = QSerialPort::Data8,
5206  UnknownDataBits = QSerialPort::UnknownDataBits};
5207  enum Parity {
5208  NoParity = QSerialPort::NoParity,
5209  EvenParity = QSerialPort::EvenParity,
5210  OddParity = QSerialPort::OddParity,
5211  SpaceParity = QSerialPort::SpaceParity,
5212  MarkParity = QSerialPort::MarkParity,
5213  UnknownParity = QSerialPort::UnknownParity};
5214  enum StopBits {
5215  OneStop = QSerialPort::OneStop,
5216  OneAndHalfStop = QSerialPort::OneAndHalfStop,
5217  TwoStop = QSerialPort::TwoStop,
5218  UnknownStopBits = QSerialPort::UnknownStopBits};
5219  enum FlowControl {
5220  NoFlowControl = QSerialPort::NoFlowControl,
5221  HardwareControl = QSerialPort::HardwareControl,
5222  SoftwareControl = QSerialPort::SoftwareControl,
5223  UnknownFlowControl = QSerialPort::UnknownFlowControl};
5224  enum SerialPortError {
5225  NoError = QSerialPort::NoError,
5226  DeviceNotFoundError = QSerialPort::DeviceNotFoundError,
5227  PermissionError = QSerialPort::PermissionError,
5228  OpenError = QSerialPort::OpenError,
5229  ParityError = QSerialPort::ParityError,
5230  FramingError = QSerialPort::FramingError,
5231  BreakConditionError = QSerialPort::BreakConditionError,
5232  WriteError = QSerialPort::WriteError,
5233  ReadError = QSerialPort::ReadError,
5234  ResourceError = QSerialPort::ResourceError,
5235  UnsupportedOperationError = QSerialPort::UnsupportedOperationError,
5236  UnknownError = QSerialPort::UnknownError,
5237  TimeoutError = QSerialPort::TimeoutError,
5238  NotOpenError = QSerialPort::NotOpenError};
5239  public:
5240  SerialPortForAndroid(const SerialPortInfoClass& info)
5241  {
5242  mPortName = info.portName().toUtf8().constData();
5243  mLocation = info.systemLocation().toUtf8().constData();
5244  mBaudRate = UnknownBaud;
5245  mDataBits = UnknownDataBits;
5246  mParity = UnknownParity;
5247  mStopBits = UnknownStopBits;
5248  mFlowControl = UnknownFlowControl;
5249  mFd = -1;
5250  }
5251  ~SerialPortForAndroid()
5252  {
5253  close();
5254  }
5255 
5256  public:
5257  bool open(QIODevice::OpenModeFlag flag)
5258  {
5259  close();
5260  int mode = 0;
5261  switch(flag)
5262  {
5263  case QIODevice::ReadOnly: mode = O_RDONLY | O_NOCTTY | O_NONBLOCK; break;
5264  case QIODevice::WriteOnly: mode = O_WRONLY | O_NOCTTY | O_NONBLOCK; break;
5265  case QIODevice::ReadWrite: mode = O_RDWR | O_NOCTTY | O_NONBLOCK; break;
5266  default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 flag값입니다", false); return false;
5267  }
5268  const int fd = ::open(mLocation, mode);
5269  BOSS_TRACE("SerialPortForAndroid::open(%s, %d) fd = %d", (chars) mLocation, mode, fd);
5270  if(fd == -1)
5271  {
5272  if(errno == EINTR) // Recurse because this is a recoverable error
5273  return open(flag);
5274  return false;
5275  }
5276  mFd = reconfigurePort(fd);
5277  return true;
5278  }
5279  void close()
5280  {
5281  if(mFd != -1)
5282  {
5283  ::close(mFd);
5284  mFd = -1;
5285  }
5286  }
5287  bool waitForReadyRead(int msecs)
5288  {
5289  if(mFd != -1)
5290  {
5291  fd_set readfds;
5292  FD_ZERO(&readfds);
5293  FD_SET(mFd, &readfds);
5294  timespec timeout_ts(timespec_from_ms(msecs));
5295  if(0 < pselect(mFd + 1, &readfds, nullptr, nullptr, &timeout_ts, nullptr))
5296  return (FD_ISSET(mFd, &readfds) != 0);
5297  }
5298  return false;
5299  }
5300  QByteArray readAll()
5301  {
5302  QByteArray Result;
5303  if(mFd != -1)
5304  {
5305  char buf[1024];
5306  ssize_t bytes_read = ::read(mFd, buf, sizeof(buf));
5307  if(0 < bytes_read)
5308  Result.append(buf, bytes_read);
5309  }
5310  return Result;
5311  }
5312  qint64 write(const char* data, qint64 len)
5313  {
5314  if(mFd == -1) return 0;
5315  size_t data_focus = 0;
5316  while(data_focus < len)
5317  {
5318  fd_set writefds;
5319  FD_ZERO(&writefds);
5320  FD_SET(mFd, &writefds);
5321  timespec timeout_ts(timespec_from_ms(10));
5322  int ret = pselect(mFd + 1, nullptr, &writefds, nullptr, &timeout_ts, nullptr);
5323  if(ret < 0)
5324  {
5325  if(errno == EINTR) continue;
5326  return false;
5327  }
5328  else if(0 < ret)
5329  {
5330  if(FD_ISSET(mFd, &writefds) != 0)
5331  {
5332  const ssize_t bytes_written_now = ::write(mFd, data + data_focus, len - data_focus);
5333  if(bytes_written_now < 1) break;
5334  data_focus += bytes_written_now;
5335  }
5336  }
5337  }
5338  return data_focus;
5339  }
5340  bool flush()
5341  {
5342  return (mFd != -1);
5343  }
5344 
5345  public: // setter
5346  void setBaudRate(BaudRate baudrate) {mBaudRate = baudrate;}
5347  void setDataBits(DataBits databits) {mDataBits = databits;}
5348  void setParity(Parity parity) {mParity = parity;}
5349  void setStopBits(StopBits stopbits) {mStopBits = stopbits;}
5350  void setFlowControl(FlowControl flowcontrol) {mFlowControl = flowcontrol;}
5351 
5352  public: // getter
5353  QString portName() {return (chars) mPortName;}
5354  QString errorString() {return "NoError";}
5355  SerialPortError error() {return NoError;}
5356 
5357  private:
5358  String mPortName;
5359  String mLocation;
5360  BaudRate mBaudRate;
5361  DataBits mDataBits;
5362  Parity mParity;
5363  StopBits mStopBits;
5364  FlowControl mFlowControl;
5365  int mFd;
5366 
5367  private:
5368  int reconfigurePort(const int fd)
5369  {
5370  struct termios options;
5371  if(tcgetattr(fd, &options) == -1)
5372  {
5373  ::close(fd);
5374  return -1;
5375  }
5376 
5377  // set up raw mode / no echo / binary
5378  options.c_cflag |= (tcflag_t) (CLOCAL | CREAD);
5379  options.c_lflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(ICANON | ECHO | ECHOE | ECHOK | ECHONL | ISIG | IEXTEN);
5380  options.c_oflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(OPOST);
5381  options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(INLCR | IGNCR | ICRNL | IGNBRK);
5382  #ifdef IUCLC
5383  options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~IUCLC;
5384  #endif
5385  #ifdef PARMRK
5386  options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~PARMRK;
5387  #endif
5388 
5389  // setup baud rate
5390  speed_t baud;
5391  switch(mBaudRate)
5392  {
5393  case Baud1200: baud = B1200; break;
5394  case Baud2400: baud = B2400; break;
5395  case Baud4800: baud = B4800; break;
5396  default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mBaudRate값입니다", false);
5397  case Baud9600: baud = B9600; break;
5398  case Baud19200: baud = B19200; break;
5399  case Baud38400: baud = B38400; break;
5400  case Baud57600: baud = B57600; break;
5401  case Baud115200: baud = B115200; break;
5402  }
5403  #ifdef _BSD_SOURCE
5404  ::cfsetspeed(&options, baud);
5405  #else
5406  ::cfsetispeed(&options, baud);
5407  ::cfsetospeed(&options, baud);
5408  #endif
5409 
5410  // setup char len
5411  options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~CSIZE;
5412  switch(mDataBits)
5413  {
5414  case Data5: options.c_cflag |= CS5; break;
5415  case Data6: options.c_cflag |= CS6; break;
5416  case Data7: options.c_cflag |= CS7; break;
5417  default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mDataBits값입니다", false);
5418  case Data8: options.c_cflag |= CS8; break;
5419  }
5420 
5421  // setup stopbits
5422  switch(mStopBits)
5423  {
5424  default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mStopBits값입니다", false);
5425  case OneStop: options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(CSTOPB); break;
5426  case OneAndHalfStop: options.c_cflag |= (CSTOPB); break;
5427  case TwoStop: options.c_cflag |= (CSTOPB); break;
5428  }
5429 
5430  // setup parity
5431  options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(INPCK | ISTRIP);
5432  switch(mParity)
5433  {
5434  default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mParity값입니다", false);
5435  case NoParity: options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(PARENB | PARODD); break;
5436  case EvenParity: options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(PARODD); options.c_cflag |= (PARENB); break;
5437  case OddParity: options.c_cflag |= (PARENB | PARODD); break;
5438  case SpaceParity: options.c_cflag |= (PARENB | CMSPAR); options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(PARODD); break;
5439  case MarkParity: options.c_cflag |= (PARENB | CMSPAR | PARODD); break;
5440  }
5441  #ifndef CMSPAR
5442  if(mParity == SpaceParity || mParity == MarkParity)
5443  BOSS_ASSERT("OS에서 지원하지 않는 mParity값입니다", false);
5444  #endif
5445 
5446  // setup flow control
5447  bool xonxoff, rtscts;
5448  switch(mFlowControl)
5449  {
5450  default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mFlowControl값입니다", false);
5451  case NoFlowControl: xonxoff = false; rtscts = false; break;
5452  case HardwareControl: xonxoff = false; rtscts = true; break;
5453  case SoftwareControl: xonxoff = true; rtscts = false; break;
5454  }
5455  // xonxoff
5456  #ifdef IXANY
5457  if(xonxoff) options.c_iflag |= (IXON | IXOFF);
5458  else options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(IXON | IXOFF | IXANY);
5459  #else
5460  if(xonxoff) options.c_iflag |= (IXON | IXOFF);
5461  else options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(IXON | IXOFF);
5462  #endif
5463  // rtscts
5464  #ifdef CRTSCTS
5465  if(rtscts) options.c_cflag |= (CRTSCTS);
5466  else options.c_cflag &= (unsigned long) ~(CRTSCTS);
5467  #elif defined CNEW_RTSCTS
5468  if(rtscts) options.c_cflag |= (CNEW_RTSCTS);
5469  else options.c_cflag &= (unsigned long) ~(CNEW_RTSCTS);
5470  #else
5471  BOSS_ASSERT("OS에서 지원하지 않는 rtscts값입니다", false);
5472  #endif
5473 
5474  options.c_cc[VMIN] = 0;
5475  options.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
5476  if(tcsetattr(fd, TCSANOW, &options) == -1)
5477  {
5478  ::close(fd);
5479  return -1;
5480  }
5481  return fd;
5482  }
5483  timespec timespec_from_ms(const uint32_t millis)
5484  {
5485  timespec time;
5486  time.tv_sec = millis / 1e3;
5487  time.tv_nsec = (millis - (time.tv_sec * 1e3)) * 1e6;
5488  return time;
5489  }
5490  };
5491  typedef SerialPortForAndroid SerialPortClass;
5492  #elif defined(QT_HAVE_SERIALPORT)
5493  typedef QSerialPortInfo SerialPortInfoClass;
5494  typedef QSerialPort SerialPortClass;
5495  #else
5496  class SerialPortInfoForBlank
5497  {
5498  public:
5499  SerialPortInfoForBlank()
5500  {
5501  }
5502  ~SerialPortInfoForBlank()
5503  {
5504  }
5505  public:
5506  static const QList<SerialPortInfoForBlank>& availablePorts()
5507  {
5508  static QList<SerialPortInfoForBlank> Result;
5509  return Result;
5510  }
5511  public:
5512  QString portName() const {return QString();}
5513  QString description() const {return QString();}
5514  QString systemLocation() const {return QString();}
5515  QString manufacturer() const {return QString();}
5516  QString serialNumber() const {return QString();}
5517  };
5518  typedef SerialPortInfoForBlank SerialPortInfoClass;
5519  class SerialPortForBlank
5520  {
5521  public:
5522  enum BaudRate {Baud115200};
5523  enum DataBits {Data8};
5524  enum Parity {NoParity};
5525  enum StopBits {OneStop};
5526  enum FlowControl {NoFlowControl};
5527  enum SerialPortError {NoError};
5528  public:
5529  SerialPortForBlank(const SerialPortInfoClass& info)
5530  {
5531  }
5532  ~SerialPortForBlank()
5533  {
5534  }
5535  public:
5536  bool open(QIODevice::OpenModeFlag flag) {return false;}
5537  void close() {}
5538  bool waitForReadyRead(int msecs) {return false;}
5539  QByteArray readAll() {return QByteArray();}
5540  qint64 write(const char* data, qint64 len) {return 0;}
5541  bool flush() {return false;}
5542  public: // setter
5543  void setBaudRate(BaudRate baudrate) {}
5544  void setDataBits(DataBits databits) {}
5545  void setParity(Parity parity) {}
5546  void setStopBits(StopBits stopbits) {}
5547  void setFlowControl(FlowControl flowcontrol) {}
5548  public: // getter
5549  QString portName() {return QString();}
5550  QString errorString() {return "NoError";}
5551  SerialPortError error() {return NoError;}
5552  };
5553  typedef SerialPortForBlank SerialPortClass;
5554  #endif
5555 
5556  class SerialClass
5557  {
5558  private:
5559  SerialPortClass* mSerial;
5560  SerialDecodeCB mDec;
5561  SerialEncodeCB mEnc;
5562  uint08s mReadStream;
5563  uint08s mWriteStream;
5564  uint08s mLastDecodedData;
5565  sint32 mLastDecodedDataFocus;
5566 
5567  private:
5568  class Chunk
5569  {
5570  public:
5571  uint08* mPtr;
5572  bytes mPtrConst;
5573  sint32 mLength;
5574  bool mBigEndian;
5575  public:
5576  Chunk() {mPtr = nullptr; mPtrConst = nullptr; mLength = 0; mBigEndian = false;}
5577  Chunk(uint08* ptr, sint32 length, bool bigendian) {Init(ptr, length, bigendian);}
5578  Chunk(bytes ptr, sint32 length, bool bigendian) {InitConst(ptr, length, bigendian);}
5579  ~Chunk() {}
5580  void Init(uint08* ptr, sint32 length, bool bigendian)
5581  {
5582  mPtr = ptr;
5583  mPtrConst = nullptr;
5584  mLength = length;
5585  mBigEndian = bigendian;
5586  }
5587  void InitConst(bytes ptr, sint32 length, bool bigendian)
5588  {
5589  mPtr = nullptr;
5590  mPtrConst = ptr;
5591  mLength = length;
5592  mBigEndian = bigendian;
5593  }
5594  sint64 GetLength() const
5595  {
5596  sint64 Result;
5597  Load(&Result, sizeof(sint64));
5598  return Result;
5599  }
5600  void Load(void* outptr, sint32 length) const
5601  {
5602  Memory::Set(outptr, 0, length);
5603  const sint32 CopyLength = Math::Min(mLength, length);
5604  if(!mBigEndian) Memory::Copy(outptr, mPtrConst, CopyLength);
5605  else
5606  {
5607  uint08* Dest = ((uint08*) outptr) + CopyLength - 1;
5608  for(sint32 i = 0; i < CopyLength; ++i)
5609  Dest[-i] = mPtrConst[i];
5610  }
5611  }
5612  void Save(bytes ptr, sint32 length)
5613  {
5614  Memory::Set(mPtr, 0, mLength);
5615  const sint32 CopyLength = Math::Min(mLength, length);
5616  if(!mBigEndian) Memory::Copy(mPtr, ptr, CopyLength);
5617  else
5618  {
5619  uint08* Dest = ((uint08*) mPtr) + CopyLength - 1;
5620  for(sint32 i = 0; i < CopyLength; ++i)
5621  Dest[-i] = ptr[i];
5622  }
5623  }
5624  };
5625 
5626  public:
5627  static Strings GetList(String* spec)
5628  {
5629  Strings Result;
5630  Context SpecCollector;
5631  const QList<SerialPortInfoClass>& AllPorts = SerialPortInfoClass::availablePorts();
5632  foreach(const auto& CurPort, AllPorts)
5633  {
5634  String CurName = CurPort.portName().toUtf8().constData();
5635  if(CurName.Length() == 0)
5636  CurName = CurPort.description().toUtf8().constData();
5637  Result.AtAdding() = CurName;
5638  if(spec)
5639  {
5640  Context& NewChild = SpecCollector.At(SpecCollector.LengthOfIndexable());
5641  NewChild.At("portname").Set(CurPort.portName().toUtf8().constData());
5642  NewChild.At("description").Set(CurPort.description().toUtf8().constData());
5643  NewChild.At("systemlocation").Set(CurPort.systemLocation().toUtf8().constData());
5644  NewChild.At("manufacturer").Set(CurPort.manufacturer().toUtf8().constData());
5645  NewChild.At("serialnumber").Set(CurPort.serialNumber().toUtf8().constData());
5646  }
5647  }
5648  if(spec)
5649  *spec = SpecCollector.SaveJson(*spec);
5650  return Result;
5651  }
5652 
5653  public:
5654  SerialClass(chars name, SerialDecodeCB dec, SerialEncodeCB enc)
5655  {
5656  mSerial = nullptr;
5657  mDec = (dec)? dec : DefaultSerialDecode;
5658  mEnc = (enc)? enc : DefaultSerialEncode;
5659  mLastDecodedDataFocus = 0;
5660  const QList<SerialPortInfoClass>& AllPorts = SerialPortInfoClass::availablePorts();
5661  foreach(const auto& CurPort, AllPorts)
5662  {
5663  if(*name == '\0' || CurPort.portName() == name || CurPort.description() == name)
5664  {
5665  mSerial = new SerialPortClass(CurPort);
5666  mSerial->setBaudRate(SerialPortClass::Baud115200);
5667  mSerial->setDataBits(SerialPortClass::Data8);
5668  mSerial->setParity(SerialPortClass::NoParity);
5669  mSerial->setStopBits(SerialPortClass::OneStop);
5670  mSerial->setFlowControl(SerialPortClass::NoFlowControl);
5671  if(!mSerial->open(QIODevice::ReadWrite))
5672  {
5673  BOSS_TRACE("QSerialPort error: port=%s, error=%s(%d)",
5674  mSerial->portName().toUtf8().constData(),
5675  mSerial->errorString().toUtf8().constData(),
5676  (sint32) mSerial->error());
5677  delete mSerial;
5678  mSerial = nullptr;
5679  if(*name == '\0') continue;
5680  }
5681  break;
5682  }
5683  }
5684  }
5685 
5686  ~SerialClass()
5687  {
5688  delete mSerial;
5689  }
5690 
5691  public:
5692  bool IsValid()
5693  {
5694  return (mSerial != nullptr);
5695  }
5696 
5697  bool Connected()
5698  {
5699  return (mSerial->error() == SerialPortClass::NoError);
5700  }
5701 
5702  bool ReadReady(sint32* gettype)
5703  {
5704  // 데이터수신시 읽기스트림에 추가연결
5705  if(mSerial->waitForReadyRead(1))
5706  {
5707  QByteArray NewArray = mSerial->readAll();
5708  Memory::Copy(mReadStream.AtDumpingAdded(NewArray.length()), NewArray.constData(), NewArray.length());
5709  }
5710 
5711  // 읽기스트림의 처리
5712  if(0 < mReadStream.Count())
5713  {
5714  // 디코딩과정
5715  mLastDecodedData.SubtractionAll();
5716  mLastDecodedDataFocus = 0;
5717  const sint32 UsedLength = mDec(&mReadStream[0], mReadStream.Count(), mLastDecodedData, gettype);
5718  if(0 < UsedLength)
5719  {
5720  BOSS_ASSERT("SerialDecodeCB의 리턴값이 허용범위를 초과합니다", UsedLength <= mReadStream.Count());
5721  const sint32 CopyLength = mReadStream.Count() - UsedLength;
5722  if(0 < CopyLength)
5723  {
5724  uint08s NewReadStream;
5725  Memory::Copy(NewReadStream.AtDumping(0, CopyLength), &mReadStream[UsedLength], CopyLength);
5726  mReadStream = NewReadStream;
5727  }
5728  else mReadStream.SubtractionAll();
5729  return (0 < mLastDecodedData.Count());
5730  }
5731  }
5732  return false;
5733  }
5734 
5735  sint32 ReadAvailable()
5736  {
5737  return mLastDecodedData.Count() - mLastDecodedDataFocus;
5738  }
5739 
5740  sint32 Read(chars format, va_list args)
5741  {
5742  Map<Chunk> Cache;
5743  chars Pos = format;
5744  bool CurEndian = false;
5745  sint32 CurIndex = -1;
5746  while(*Pos)
5747  {
5748  if(*Pos == '#')
5749  {
5750  CurIndex++;
5751  // 인용길이
5752  sint64 LastLength = 0;
5753  if('1' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= '8') LastLength = Pos[1] - '0';
5754  else if('a' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= 'z') LastLength = Cache[Pos[1] - 'a'].GetLength();
5755  else if('A' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= 'Z') LastLength = Cache[Pos[1] - 'A'].GetLength();
5756  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5757  if(ReadAvailable() < LastLength) return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_SHORT_STREAM - CurIndex;
5758  Pos += 2;
5759 
5760  bytes LastPtr = &mLastDecodedData[mLastDecodedDataFocus];
5761  // 캐시로 읽기
5762  if(*Pos == '=')
5763  {
5764  if('a' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= 'z') Cache[Pos[1] - 'a'].InitConst(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
5765  else if('A' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= 'Z') Cache[Pos[1] - 'A'].InitConst(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
5766  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5767  Pos += 2;
5768  }
5769  // 타입힌트식 읽기
5770  else if(*Pos == ':')
5771  {
5772  if(Pos[1] == 's' && Pos[2] == 'k' && Pos[3] == 'i' && Pos[4] == 'p') Pos += 5;
5773  else
5774  {
5775  const Chunk NewChunk(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
5776  if(Pos[1] == 's')
5777  {
5778  if(Pos[2] == '1') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, sint08*), sizeof(sint08));
5779  else if(Pos[2] == '2') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, sint16*), sizeof(sint16));
5780  else if(Pos[2] == '4') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, sint32*), sizeof(sint32));
5781  else if(Pos[2] == '8') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, sint64*), sizeof(sint64));
5782  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5783  }
5784  else if(Pos[1] == 'u')
5785  {
5786  if(Pos[2] == '1') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, uint08*), sizeof(uint08));
5787  else if(Pos[2] == '2') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, uint16*), sizeof(uint16));
5788  else if(Pos[2] == '4') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, uint32*), sizeof(uint32));
5789  else if(Pos[2] == '8') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, uint64*), sizeof(uint64));
5790  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5791  }
5792  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5793  Pos += 3;
5794  }
5795  }
5796  // 일반적인 읽기
5797  else Chunk(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian).Load(va_arg(args, void*), LastLength);
5798  mLastDecodedDataFocus += LastLength;
5799  }
5800  else if(*Pos == '[')
5801  {
5802  if(Pos[1] == 'b' && Pos[2] == 'e' && Pos[3] == ']') CurEndian = true;
5803  else if(Pos[1] == 'l' && Pos[2] == 'e' && Pos[3] == ']') CurEndian = false;
5804  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5805  Pos += 4;
5806  }
5807  else Pos++;
5808  }
5809  return ReadAvailable();
5810  }
5811 
5812  sint32 Write(chars format, va_list args)
5813  {
5814  #if BOSS_ANDROID
5815  #define va_sint08 sint32
5816  #define va_sint16 sint32
5817  #define va_sint32 sint32
5818  #define va_sint64 sint64
5819  #define va_uint08 uint32
5820  #define va_uint16 uint32
5821  #define va_uint32 uint32
5822  #define va_uint64 uint64
5823  #else
5824  #define va_sint08 sint08
5825  #define va_sint16 sint16
5826  #define va_sint32 sint32
5827  #define va_sint64 sint64
5828  #define va_uint08 uint08
5829  #define va_uint16 uint16
5830  #define va_uint32 uint32
5831  #define va_uint64 uint64
5832  #endif
5833 
5834  chars Pos = format;
5835  bool CurEndian = false;
5836  while(*Pos)
5837  {
5838  if(*Pos == '#')
5839  {
5840  // 인용길이
5841  sint64 LastLength = 0;
5842  if('1' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= '8') LastLength = Pos[1] - '0';
5843  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5844  Pos += 2;
5845 
5846  uint08* LastPtr = mWriteStream.AtDumpingAdded(LastLength);
5847  // 상수로 쓰기
5848  if(*Pos == '=')
5849  {
5850  const sint32 SavedPos = &Pos[-1] - format;
5851  uint08s Value;
5852  if(Pos[1] == '0' && (Pos[2] == 'x' || Pos[2] == 'X'))
5853  {
5854  Pos += 2;
5855  bool AddingTurn = false;
5856  while(*(++Pos))
5857  {
5858  if(AddingTurn = !AddingTurn)
5859  {
5860  if('0' <= *Pos && *Pos <= '9') Value.AtAdding() = ((*Pos - '0') & 0xF) << 4;
5861  else if('a' <= *Pos && *Pos <= 'f') Value.AtAdding() = ((*Pos - 'a' + 10) & 0xF) << 4;
5862  else if('A' <= *Pos && *Pos <= 'F') Value.AtAdding() = ((*Pos - 'A' + 10) & 0xF) << 4;
5863  else break;
5864  }
5865  else
5866  {
5867  if('0' <= *Pos && *Pos <= '9') Value.At(-1) |= (*Pos - '0') & 0xF;
5868  else if('a' <= *Pos && *Pos <= 'f') Value.At(-1) |= (*Pos - 'a' + 10) & 0xF;
5869  else if('A' <= *Pos && *Pos <= 'F') Value.At(-1) |= (*Pos - 'A' + 10) & 0xF;
5870  else break;
5871  }
5872  }
5873  }
5874  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5875  // 16진수는 큰수가 메모리의 앞쪽에 오므로 CurEndian을 반대로 적용
5876  Chunk(LastPtr, LastLength, !CurEndian).Save(&Value[0], Value.Count());
5877  }
5878  // 타입힌트식 쓰기
5879  else if(*Pos == ':')
5880  {
5881  Chunk NewChunk(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
5882  if(Pos[1] == 's')
5883  {
5884  if(Pos[2] == '1') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_sint08); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5885  else if(Pos[2] == '2') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_sint16); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5886  else if(Pos[2] == '4') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_sint32); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5887  else if(Pos[2] == '8') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_sint64); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5888  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5889  }
5890  else if(Pos[1] == 'u')
5891  {
5892  if(Pos[2] == '1') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint08); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5893  else if(Pos[2] == '2') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint16); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5894  else if(Pos[2] == '4') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint32); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5895  else if(Pos[2] == '8') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint64); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5896  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5897  }
5898  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5899  Pos += 3;
5900  }
5901  // 일반적인 쓰기
5902  else
5903  {
5904  Chunk NewChunk(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
5905  if(LastLength == 1) {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint08); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5906  else if(LastLength == 2) {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint16); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5907  else if(LastLength == 4) {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint32); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5908  else if(LastLength == 8) {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint64); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
5909  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[-1] - format);
5910  }
5911  }
5912  else if(*Pos == '[')
5913  {
5914  if(Pos[1] == 'b' && Pos[2] == 'e' && Pos[3] == ']') CurEndian = true;
5915  else if(Pos[1] == 'l' && Pos[2] == 'e' && Pos[3] == ']') CurEndian = false;
5916  else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
5917  Pos += 4;
5918  }
5919  else Pos++;
5920  }
5921  return mWriteStream.Count();
5922  }
5923 
5924  void WriteFlush(sint32 type)
5925  {
5926  // 쓰기스트림의 처리
5927  if(0 < mWriteStream.Count())
5928  {
5929  static uint08s NewEncodedData;
5930  NewEncodedData.SubtractionAll();
5931  mEnc(&mWriteStream[0], mWriteStream.Count(), NewEncodedData, type);
5932  mWriteStream.SubtractionAll();
5933 
5934  if(0 < NewEncodedData.Count())
5935  {
5936  mSerial->write((const char*) &NewEncodedData[0], NewEncodedData.Count());
5937  mSerial->flush();
5938  }
5939  }
5940  }
5941 
5942  private:
5943  static sint32 DefaultSerialDecode(bytes data, sint32 length, uint08s& outdata, sint32* outtype)
5944  {
5945  Memory::Copy(outdata.AtDumping(0, length), data, length);
5946  return length;
5947  }
5948 
5949  static void DefaultSerialEncode(bytes data, sint32 length, uint08s& outdata, sint32 type)
5950  {
5951  Memory::Copy(outdata.AtDumping(0, length), data, length);
5952  }
5953  };
5954 
5955  #ifdef QT_HAVE_MULTIMEDIA
5956  class CameraSurface : public QAbstractVideoSurface
5957  {
5958  Q_OBJECT
5959 
5960  private:
5961  QCamera mCamera;
5962  id_mutex mMutex;
5963  QVideoFrame::PixelFormat mPixelFormat;
5964  bool mNeedFlip;
5965  uint08s mLastImage;
5966  sint32 mLastImageWidth;
5967  sint32 mLastImageHeight;
5968 
5969  public:
5970  CameraSurface(const QCameraInfo& info) : mCamera(info)
5971  {
5972  mMutex = Mutex::Open();
5973  mNeedFlip = false;
5974  mLastImageWidth = 0;
5975  mLastImageHeight = 0;
5976  }
5977  ~CameraSurface()
5978  {
5979  StopCamera();
5980  Mutex::Close(mMutex);
5981  }
5982 
5983  public:
5984  void StartCamera() {mCamera.start();}
5985  void StopCamera() {mCamera.stop();}
5986  const QCameraViewfinderSettings GetSettings() {return mCamera.viewfinderSettings();}
5987  void SetSettings(const QCameraViewfinderSettings& settings) {mCamera.setViewfinderSettings(settings);}
5988  const QList<QCameraViewfinderSettings> GetSupportedAllSettings() {return mCamera.supportedViewfinderSettings();}
5989 
5990  protected:
5991  void StartPreview(bool preview) {mCamera.setViewfinder(this);}
5992  void StopPreview() {mCamera.setViewfinder((QAbstractVideoSurface*) nullptr);}
5993  sint32 GetLastImageWidth() const {return mLastImageWidth;}
5994  sint32 GetLastImageHeight() const {return mLastImageHeight;}
5995  id_texture CreateLastTexture(bool bitmapcache)
5996  {
5997  if(0 < mLastImageWidth && 0 < mLastImageHeight && 0 < mLastImage.Count())
5998  return Platform::Graphics::CreateTexture(false, bitmapcache, mLastImageWidth, mLastImageHeight, &mLastImage[0]);
5999  return nullptr;
6000  }
6001 
6002  protected:
6003  virtual bool CaptureEnabled() {return false;}
6004  virtual void BufferFlush() {}
6005  virtual void AddPictureShotCount() {}
6006  virtual void AddPreviewShotCount() {}
6007 
6008  protected:
6009  void DecodeImage(sint32& width, sint32& height, uint08s& bits)
6010  {
6011  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6012  if(0 < mLastImage.Count())
6013  {
6014  width = mLastImageWidth;
6015  height = mLastImageHeight;
6016  bits.SubtractionAll();
6017  if(mNeedFlip)
6018  {
6019  switch(mPixelFormat)
6020  {
6021  case QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32:
6022  ToARGB32<QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32, true>((bytes) &mLastImage[0], width, height, 4 * width,
6023  bits.AtDumpingAdded(4 * width * height));
6024  break;
6025  case QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32:
6026  ToARGB32<QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32, true>((bytes) &mLastImage[0], width, height, 4 * width,
6027  bits.AtDumpingAdded(4 * width * height));
6028  break;
6029  }
6030  }
6031  else switch(mPixelFormat)
6032  {
6033  case QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32:
6034  ToARGB32<QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32, false>((bytes) &mLastImage[0], width, height, 4 * width,
6035  bits.AtDumpingAdded(4 * width * height));
6036  break;
6037  case QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32:
6038  ToARGB32<QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32, false>((bytes) &mLastImage[0], width, height, 4 * width,
6039  bits.AtDumpingAdded(4 * width * height));
6040  break;
6041  }
6042  //단편화방지차원: mLastImage.Clear();
6043  }
6044  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6045  }
6046 
6047  private:
6048  virtual QList<QVideoFrame::PixelFormat> supportedPixelFormats(QAbstractVideoBuffer::HandleType handleType) const
6049  {
6050  Q_UNUSED(handleType);
6051  return QList<QVideoFrame::PixelFormat>()
6052  << QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32
6053  << QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32;
6054  }
6055 
6056  private slots:
6057  virtual bool present(const QVideoFrame& frame)
6058  {
6059  AddPictureShotCount();
6060  bool Result = false;
6061  if(frame.isValid() && CaptureEnabled())
6062  {
6063  auto FrameType = frame.handleType();
6064  if(FrameType != QAbstractVideoBuffer::GLTextureHandle)
6065  {
6066  QVideoFrame ClonedFrame(frame);
6067  if(ClonedFrame.map(QAbstractVideoBuffer::ReadOnly))
6068  {
6069  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6070  {
6071  mPixelFormat = ClonedFrame.pixelFormat();
6072  mNeedFlip = true;
6073  mLastImage.SubtractionAll();
6074  mLastImageWidth = ClonedFrame.width();
6075  mLastImageHeight = ClonedFrame.height();
6076  Memory::Copy(mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4 * mLastImageWidth * mLastImageHeight),
6077  ClonedFrame.bits(), 4 * mLastImageWidth * mLastImageHeight);
6078  }
6079  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6080  BufferFlush();
6081  ClonedFrame.unmap();
6082  Result = true;
6083  }
6084  }
6085  #ifndef BOSS_SILENT_NIGHT_IS_ENABLED
6086  // QVideoFrame::map함수의 버그에 따른 수동패치
6087  else if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
6088  {
6089  QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
6090  GLuint textureId = frame.handle().toUInt();
6091  GLuint fbo = 0, prevFbo = 0;
6092  f->glGenFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
6093  f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
6094  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo);
6095  f->glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureId, 0);
6096  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6097  {
6098  mPixelFormat = frame.pixelFormat();
6099  mNeedFlip = false;
6100  mLastImage.SubtractionAll();
6101  mLastImageWidth = frame.width();
6102  mLastImageHeight = frame.height();
6103  f->glReadPixels(0, 0, mLastImageWidth, mLastImageHeight, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,
6104  mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4 * mLastImageWidth * mLastImageHeight));
6105  }
6106  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6107  BufferFlush();
6108  f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
6109  f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
6110  Result = true;
6111  }
6112  #endif
6113  }
6114  return Result;
6115  }
6116 
6117  private:
6118  template<sint32 FORMAT, bool FLIP>
6119  void ToARGB32(bytes srcbits, const sint32 width, const sint32 height, const sint32 rowbytes, uint08* dstbits)
6120  {
6121  for(sint32 y = 0, yend = height; y < yend; ++y)
6122  {
6123  Bmp::bitmappixel* CurDst = (Bmp::bitmappixel*) &dstbits[rowbytes * y];
6124  bytes CurSrc = (FLIP)? &srcbits[rowbytes * (yend - 1 - y)] : &srcbits[rowbytes * y];
6125  for(sint32 x = 0, xend = width; x < xend; ++x)
6126  {
6127  if(FORMAT == (sint32) QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32)
6128  {
6129  CurDst->a = 0xFF;
6130  CurDst->r = CurSrc[2];
6131  CurDst->g = CurSrc[1];
6132  CurDst->b = CurSrc[0];
6133  CurDst++; CurSrc += 4;
6134  }
6135  if(FORMAT == (sint32) QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32)
6136  {
6137  CurDst->a = 0xFF;
6138  CurDst->r = CurSrc[0];
6139  CurDst->g = CurSrc[1];
6140  CurDst->b = CurSrc[2];
6141  CurDst++; CurSrc += 4;
6142  }
6143  }
6144  }
6145  }
6146  };
6147 
6148  #if BOSS_ANDROID
6149  class CameraSurfaceForAndroid
6150  {
6151  private:
6152  QCameraViewfinderSettings mSettings;
6153  QList<QCameraViewfinderSettings> mAllSettings;
6154  id_mutex mMutex;
6155  uint08s mLastImage;
6156  sint32 mLastImageWidth;
6157  sint32 mLastImageHeight;
6158  id_texture mCamTexture;
6159 
6160  public:
6161  CameraSurfaceForAndroid(const QCameraInfo& info)
6162  {
6163  JNIEnv* env = GetAndroidJNIEnv();
6164  // 카메라 정보수집
6165  QAndroidJniObject Collector = QAndroidJniObject::callStaticObjectMethod("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "info", "()Ljava/lang/String;");
6166  String Result = Collector.toString().toUtf8().constData();
6167  chars ResultPtr = Result;
6168 
6169  // 정보입력
6170  QList<QSize> SupportedResolutions;
6171  for(sint32 i = 0; (i = Result.Find(i, "Size_")) != -1;)
6172  {
6173  QSize NewResolution;
6174  i += 5; // Size_
6175  NewResolution.setWidth(Parser::GetInt(ResultPtr, -1, &i));
6176  i += 1; // x
6177  NewResolution.setHeight(Parser::GetInt(ResultPtr, -1, &i));
6178  i += 1; // ;
6179  SupportedResolutions.append(NewResolution);
6180  }
6181  foreach(const auto& CurResolution, SupportedResolutions)
6182  {
6183  QCameraViewfinderSettings NewSettings = mSettings;
6184  NewSettings.setResolution(CurResolution);
6185  mAllSettings.append(NewSettings);
6186  }
6187  // "Format_JPEG;" -> Format_Jpeg
6188  // "Format_NV21;" -> Format_NV21
6189  // "Format_RGB_565;" -> Format_RGB565
6190  // "Format_YUV_420_888;" -> Format_YUV420P
6191  // "Format_YUV_444_888;" -> Format_YUV444
6192  // "Format_YUY2;" -> Format_YUYV
6193  // "Format_YV12;" -> Format_YV12
6194 
6195  mMutex = Mutex::Open();
6196  mLastImageWidth = 0;
6197  mLastImageHeight = 0;
6198  mCamTexture = nullptr;
6199  // 콜백함수 연결
6200  JNINativeMethod methods[] {
6201  {"OnPictureTaken", "([BIII)V", reinterpret_cast<void*>(OnPictureTaken)},
6202  {"OnPreviewTaken", "([BIII)V", reinterpret_cast<void*>(OnPreviewTaken)}};
6203  jclass BossCameraManagerClass = env->FindClass("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager");
6204  env->RegisterNatives(BossCameraManagerClass, methods, sizeof(methods) / sizeof(methods[0]));
6205  env->DeleteLocalRef(BossCameraManagerClass);
6206  SavedMe() = this;
6207  }
6208  ~CameraSurfaceForAndroid()
6209  {
6210  Platform::Graphics::RemoveTexture(mCamTexture);
6211  StopCamera();
6212  SavedMe() = nullptr;
6213  Mutex::Close(mMutex);
6214  }
6215 
6216  public:
6217  void StartCamera()
6218  {
6219  mCamTexture = Platform::Graphics::CreateTexture(false, false, mSettings.resolution().width(), mSettings.resolution().height());
6220  BOSS_TRACE("StartCamera: GenTexture - LastTexture: %d, width: %d, height: %d",
6221  Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(mCamTexture), mSettings.resolution().width(), mSettings.resolution().height());
6222  QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "init", "(III)V",
6223  Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(mCamTexture), mSettings.resolution().width(), mSettings.resolution().height());
6224  }
6225  void StopCamera()
6226  {
6227  QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "quit", "()V");
6228  Platform::Graphics::RemoveTexture(mCamTexture);
6229  mCamTexture = nullptr;
6230  BOSS_TRACE("StopCamera: DeleteTexture done");
6231  }
6232  const QCameraViewfinderSettings GetSettings() {return mSettings;}
6233  void SetSettings(const QCameraViewfinderSettings& settings) {mSettings = settings;}
6234  const QList<QCameraViewfinderSettings> GetSupportedAllSettings() {return mAllSettings;}
6235 
6236  protected:
6237  void StartPreview(bool preview) {QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "play", "(I)V", (preview)? 1 : 2);}
6238  void StopPreview() {QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "stop", "()V");}
6239  sint32 GetLastImageWidth() const {return mLastImageWidth;}
6240  sint32 GetLastImageHeight() const {return mLastImageHeight;}
6241  id_texture CreateLastTexture(bool bitmapcache)
6242  {
6243  if(0 < mLastImageWidth && 0 < mLastImageHeight)
6244  {
6245  switch(*((uint32*) &mLastImage[0]))
6246  {
6247  case codeid("NV21"):
6248  if(12 < mLastImage.Count())
6249  return Platform::Graphics::CreateTexture(true, bitmapcache, mLastImageWidth, mLastImageHeight, &mLastImage[12]);
6250  break;
6251  }
6252  }
6253  return nullptr;
6254  }
6255 
6256  protected:
6257  virtual bool CaptureEnabled() {return false;}
6258  virtual void BufferFlush() {}
6259  virtual void AddPictureShotCount() {}
6260  virtual void AddPreviewShotCount() {}
6261 
6262  protected:
6263  void DecodeImage(sint32& width, sint32& height, uint08s& bits)
6264  {
6265  BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage - Begin(%d)", mLastImage.Count());
6266  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6267  if(0 < mLastImage.Count())
6268  {
6269  switch(*((uint32*) &mLastImage[0]))
6270  {
6271  case codeid("NV21"):
6272  {
6273  BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(RAW8) - Mid-A (%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6274  width = *((sint32*) &mLastImage[4]);
6275  height = *((sint32*) &mLastImage[8]);
6276  bits.SubtractionAll();
6277  Bmp::bitmappixel* Dst = (Bmp::bitmappixel*)
6278  bits.AtDumpingAdded(sizeof(Bmp::bitmappixel) * width * height);
6279  auto SrcY = (const uint08*) &mLastImage[12];
6280  auto SrcUVBegin = (const uint08*) &mLastImage[12 + width * height];
6281  const uint08* SrcUVPair[2] = {SrcUVBegin, SrcUVBegin};
6282  for(sint32 y = 0; y < height; ++y)
6283  {
6284  const uint08*& SrcUV = SrcUVPair[y & 1];
6285  for(sint32 x = 0; x < width; x += 2)
6286  {
6287  const sint32 Y1 = *(SrcY++) & 0xFF;
6288  const sint32 Y2 = *(SrcY++) & 0xFF;
6289  const sint32 V = (*(SrcUV++) & 0xFF) - 128;
6290  const sint32 U = (*(SrcUV++) & 0xFF) - 128;
6291  const sint32 Y1Value = (sint32)(1.164f * (Y1 - 16));
6292  const sint32 Y2Value = (sint32)(1.164f * (Y2 - 16));
6293  const sint32 RValue = (sint32)(1.596f * V);
6294  const sint32 GValue = (sint32)(0.391f * U + 0.813f * V);
6295  const sint32 BValue = (sint32)(2.018f * U);
6296  Dst->a = 0xFF;
6297  Dst->r = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y1Value + RValue, 255));
6298  Dst->g = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y1Value - GValue, 255));
6299  Dst->b = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y1Value + BValue, 255));
6300  Dst++;
6301  Dst->a = 0xFF;
6302  Dst->r = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y2Value + RValue, 255));
6303  Dst->g = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y2Value - GValue, 255));
6304  Dst->b = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y2Value + BValue, 255));
6305  Dst++;
6306  }
6307  }
6308  BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(RAW8) - Mid-B (%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6309  }
6310  break;
6311  case codeid("JPEG"):
6312  BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(JPEG)");
6313  if(id_bitmap NewBitmap = AddOn::Jpg::ToBmp(&mLastImage[4], mLastImage.Count() - 4))
6314  {
6315  BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(JPEG) - Mid-A");
6316  width = Bmp::GetWidth(NewBitmap);
6317  height = Bmp::GetHeight(NewBitmap);
6318  bits.SubtractionAll();
6319  Bmp::bitmappixel* Dst = (Bmp::bitmappixel*)
6320  bits.AtDumpingAdded(sizeof(Bmp::bitmappixel) * width * height);
6321  auto Src = (const Bmp::bitmappixel*) Bmp::GetBits(NewBitmap);
6322  for(sint32 y = 0; y < height; ++y)
6323  Memory::Copy(&Dst[width * y], &Src[width * (height - 1 - y)],
6324  sizeof(Bmp::bitmappixel) * width);
6325  Bmp::Remove(NewBitmap);
6326  BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(JPEG) - Mid-B");
6327  }
6328  break;
6329  }
6330  //단편화방지차원: mLastImage.Clear();
6331  }
6332  else
6333  {
6334  width = 1;
6335  height = 1;
6336  bits.SubtractionAll();
6337  Bmp::bitmappixel* Dst = (Bmp::bitmappixel*)
6338  bits.AtDumpingAdded(sizeof(Bmp::bitmappixel) * width * height);
6339  Dst->a = 0xFF;
6340  Dst->r = 0xFF;
6341  Dst->g = 0x00;
6342  Dst->b = 0x00;
6343  }
6344  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6345  BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage - End(%d)", bits.Count());
6346  }
6347 
6348  private:
6349  static CameraSurfaceForAndroid*& SavedMe()
6350  {
6351  static CameraSurfaceForAndroid* _ = nullptr;
6352  return _;
6353  }
6354  static void OnPictureTaken(JNIEnv* env, jobject thiz, jbyteArray data, jint length, jint width, jint height)
6355  {
6356  BOSS_TRACE("OnPictureTaken Begin(%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6357  bytes paramData = (bytes) env->GetByteArrayElements(data, nullptr);
6358  CameraSurfaceForAndroid* Me = SavedMe();
6359  BOSS_TRACE("OnPictureTaken - width: %d, height: %d, paramData: %08X, length: %d, Me: %08X",
6360  width, height, paramData, length, Me);
6361  if(Me)
6362  {
6363  Me->AddPictureShotCount();
6364  if(Me->CaptureEnabled())
6365  if(paramData && 0 < length)
6366  {
6367  if(16 <= length)
6368  BOSS_TRACE("OnPictureTaken - %08X %08X %08X %08X... (%d)",
6369  ((sint32*) paramData)[0], ((sint32*) paramData)[1],
6370  ((sint32*) paramData)[2], ((sint32*) paramData)[3], length);
6371  Mutex::Lock(Me->mMutex);
6372  {
6373  Me->mLastImage.SubtractionAll();
6374  Me->mLastImageWidth = width;
6375  Me->mLastImageHeight = height;
6376  const uint32 TypeCode = codeid("JPEG");
6377  Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4), &TypeCode, 4);
6378  Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(length), paramData, length);
6379  }
6380  Mutex::Unlock(Me->mMutex);
6381  Me->BufferFlush();
6382  }
6383  }
6384  env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(data, (jbyte*) paramData, JNI_ABORT);
6385  BOSS_TRACE("OnPictureTaken End(%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6386  }
6387  static void OnPreviewTaken(JNIEnv* env, jobject thiz, jbyteArray data, jint length, jint width, jint height)
6388  {
6389  BOSS_TRACE("OnPreviewTaken Begin(%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6390  bytes paramData = (bytes) env->GetByteArrayElements(data, nullptr);
6391  CameraSurfaceForAndroid* Me = SavedMe();
6392  BOSS_TRACE("OnPreviewTaken - width: %d, height: %d, paramData: %08X, length: %d, Me: %08X",
6393  width, height, paramData, length, Me);
6394  if(Me)
6395  {
6396  Me->AddPreviewShotCount();
6397  if(Me->CaptureEnabled())
6398  if(paramData && 0 < length)
6399  {
6400  if(16 <= length)
6401  BOSS_TRACE("OnPreviewTaken - %08X %08X %08X %08X... (%d)",
6402  ((sint32*) paramData)[0], ((sint32*) paramData)[1],
6403  ((sint32*) paramData)[2], ((sint32*) paramData)[3], length);
6404  Mutex::Lock(Me->mMutex);
6405  {
6406  Me->mLastImage.SubtractionAll();
6407  Me->mLastImageWidth = width;
6408  Me->mLastImageHeight = height;
6409  const uint32 TypeCode = codeid("NV21");
6410  Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4), &TypeCode, 4);
6411  Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4), &width, 4);
6412  Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4), &height, 4);
6413  Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(length), paramData, length);
6414  }
6415  Mutex::Unlock(Me->mMutex);
6416  Me->BufferFlush();
6417  }
6418  }
6419  env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(data, (jbyte*) paramData, JNI_ABORT);
6420  BOSS_TRACE("OnPreviewTaken End(%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6421  }
6422  };
6423  typedef CameraSurfaceForAndroid CameraSurfaceClass;
6424  #else
6425  typedef CameraSurface CameraSurfaceClass;
6426  #endif
6427 
6428  class CameraService : public CameraSurfaceClass
6429  {
6430  private:
6431  enum CaptureOrder {CaptureOrder_None, CaptureOrder_ShotOnly, CaptureOrder_ShotAndStop, CaptureOrder_NeedStop};
6432  id_mutex mMutex;
6433  bool mStartPreview;
6434  CaptureOrder mCaptureOrder;
6435  sint32 mDecodedWidth;
6436  sint32 mDecodedHeight;
6437  uint08s mDecodedBits;
6438  bool mUpdateForImage;
6439  bool mUpdateForBitmap;
6440  uint64 mUpdateTimeMsec;
6441  float mUpdateAvgMsec;
6442  sint32 mPictureShotCount;
6443  sint32 mPreviewShotCount;
6444 
6445  public:
6446  CameraService(const QCameraInfo& info) : CameraSurfaceClass(info)
6447  {
6448  mMutex = Mutex::Open();
6449  mStartPreview = false;
6450  mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_None;
6451  mDecodedWidth = 0;
6452  mDecodedHeight = 0;
6453  mUpdateForImage = false;
6454  mUpdateForBitmap = false;
6455  mUpdateTimeMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
6456  mUpdateAvgMsec = 0;
6457  mPictureShotCount = 0;
6458  mPreviewShotCount = 0;
6459  }
6460  ~CameraService()
6461  {
6462  Mutex::Close(mMutex);
6463  }
6464 
6465  private:
6466  virtual bool CaptureEnabled() override
6467  {
6468  bool Result = false;
6469  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6470  {
6471  Result = (mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_ShotOnly
6472  || mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_ShotAndStop);
6473  }
6474  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6475  return Result;
6476  }
6477  virtual void BufferFlush() override
6478  {
6479  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6480  {
6481  if(mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_ShotOnly)
6482  mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_None;
6483  else if(mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_ShotAndStop)
6484  mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_NeedStop;
6485  mUpdateForImage = true;
6486  mUpdateForBitmap = true;
6487  }
6488  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6489  }
6490  virtual void AddPictureShotCount() override
6491  {
6492  mPictureShotCount++;
6493  const uint64 NewTimeMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
6494  mUpdateAvgMsec = (mUpdateAvgMsec * 19 + Math::Max(1, NewTimeMsec - mUpdateTimeMsec)) / 20;
6495  mUpdateTimeMsec = NewTimeMsec;
6496  }
6497  virtual void AddPreviewShotCount() override
6498  {
6499  mPreviewShotCount++;
6500  const uint64 NewTimeMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
6501  mUpdateAvgMsec = (mUpdateAvgMsec * 19 + Math::Max(1, NewTimeMsec - mUpdateTimeMsec)) / 20;
6502  mUpdateTimeMsec = NewTimeMsec;
6503  }
6504 
6505  public:
6506  void Capture(bool preview, bool needstop)
6507  {
6508  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6509  {
6510  mCaptureOrder = (needstop)? CaptureOrder_ShotAndStop : CaptureOrder_ShotOnly;
6511  mStartPreview = true;
6512  StartPreview(preview);
6513  }
6514  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6515  }
6516  id_texture CloneCapturedTexture(bool bitmapcache)
6517  {
6518  id_texture Result = nullptr;
6519  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6520  {
6521  Result = CreateLastTexture(bitmapcache);
6522  }
6523  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6524  return Result;
6525  }
6526  void GetCapturedImage(PixmapPrivate& pixmap, sint32 maxwidth, sint32 maxheight, sint32 rotate)
6527  {
6528  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6529  {
6530  if(mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_NeedStop)
6531  {
6532  mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_None;
6533  if(mStartPreview)
6534  {
6535  mStartPreview = false;
6536  StopPreview();
6537  }
6538  }
6539  if(mUpdateForImage)
6540  {
6541  mUpdateForImage = false;
6542  if(mUpdateForBitmap) DecodeImage(mDecodedWidth, mDecodedHeight, mDecodedBits);
6543  ImagePrivate NewImage(&mDecodedBits[0], mDecodedWidth, mDecodedHeight, ImagePrivate::Format_ARGB32);
6544 
6545  if(maxwidth == -1 && maxheight == -1)
6546  {maxwidth = mDecodedWidth; maxheight = mDecodedHeight;}
6547  else if(maxwidth == -1) maxwidth = mDecodedWidth * maxheight / mDecodedHeight;
6548  else if(maxheight == -1) maxheight = mDecodedHeight * maxwidth / mDecodedWidth;
6549 
6550  // 스케일링
6551  if(maxwidth < mDecodedWidth || maxheight < mDecodedHeight)
6552  NewImage = NewImage.scaled(Math::Min(maxwidth, mDecodedWidth), Math::Min(maxheight, mDecodedHeight));
6553 
6554  // 회전
6555  if(0 < rotate)
6556  {
6557  MatrixPrivate NewMatrix;
6558  NewMatrix.translate(mDecodedWidth / 2, mDecodedHeight / 2);
6559  NewMatrix.rotate(rotate);
6560  NewImage = NewImage.transformed(NewMatrix);
6561  }
6562  pixmap.convertFromImage(NewImage);
6563  //단편화방지차원: if(!mUpdateForBitmap) mDecodedBits.Clear();
6564  }
6565  }
6566  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6567  }
6568  void GetCapturedBitmap(id_bitmap& bitmap, orientationtype ori)
6569  {
6570  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6571  {
6572  if(mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_NeedStop)
6573  {
6574  mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_None;
6575  if(mStartPreview)
6576  {
6577  mStartPreview = false;
6578  StopPreview();
6579  }
6580  }
6581  if(mUpdateForBitmap)
6582  {
6583  mUpdateForBitmap = false;
6584  if(mUpdateForImage) DecodeImage(mDecodedWidth, mDecodedHeight, mDecodedBits);
6585  bitmap = Bmp::CloneFromBits(&mDecodedBits[0], mDecodedWidth, mDecodedHeight, 32, ori, bitmap);
6586  //단편화방지차원: if(!mUpdateForImage) mDecodedBits.Clear();
6587  }
6588  }
6589  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6590  }
6591  size64 GetCapturedSize() const
6592  {
6593  size64 Result = {0, 0};
6594  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6595  {
6596  Result.w = GetLastImageWidth();
6597  Result.h = GetLastImageHeight();
6598  }
6599  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6600  return Result;
6601  }
6602  uint64 GetCapturedTimeMsec(sint32* avgmsec) const
6603  {
6604  uint64 Result = 0;
6605  Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6606  {
6607  Result = mUpdateTimeMsec;
6608  if(avgmsec) *avgmsec = Math::Max(1, (sint32) mUpdateAvgMsec);
6609  }
6610  Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6611  return Result;
6612  }
6613  sint32 GetPictureShotCount() const
6614  {
6615  return mPictureShotCount;
6616  }
6617  sint32 GetPreviewShotCount() const
6618  {
6619  return mPreviewShotCount;
6620  }
6621  };
6622 
6623  class CameraClass
6624  {
6625  private:
6626  sint32 mRefCount;
6627  QCameraInfo mCameraInfo;
6628  CameraService* mCameraService;
6629  PixmapPrivate mLastPixmap;
6630  id_bitmap mLastBitmap;
6631 
6632  public:
6633  static Strings GetList(String* spec)
6634  {
6635  Strings Result;
6636  Context SpecCollector;
6637  const QList<QCameraInfo>& AllCameras = QCameraInfo::availableCameras();
6638  foreach(const auto& CurCamera, AllCameras)
6639  {
6640  String CurName = CurCamera.description().toUtf8().constData();
6641  if(CurName.Length() == 0)
6642  CurName = CurCamera.deviceName().toUtf8().constData();
6643  Result.AtAdding() = CurName;
6644  if(spec)
6645  {
6646  Context& NewChild = SpecCollector.At(SpecCollector.LengthOfIndexable());
6647  NewChild.At("description").Set(CurCamera.description().toUtf8().constData());
6648  NewChild.At("devicename").Set(CurCamera.deviceName().toUtf8().constData());
6649  NewChild.At("position").Set(String::FromInteger(CurCamera.position()));
6650  NewChild.At("orientation").Set(String::FromInteger(CurCamera.orientation()));
6651  }
6652  }
6653  if(spec)
6654  *spec = SpecCollector.SaveJson(*spec);
6655  return Result;
6656  }
6657 
6658  public:
6659  CameraClass(chars name, sint32 width, sint32 height)
6660  {
6661  mRefCount = 1;
6662  mCameraService = nullptr;
6663  mLastBitmap = nullptr;
6664  const QList<QCameraInfo>& AllCameraInfos = QCameraInfo::availableCameras();
6665  foreach(const auto& CurCameraInfo, AllCameraInfos)
6666  {
6667  if(*name == '\0' || CurCameraInfo.description() == name || CurCameraInfo.deviceName() == name)
6668  {
6669  mCameraInfo = CurCameraInfo;
6670  mCameraService = new CameraService(mCameraInfo);
6671 
6672  sint32 BestValue = 0, SavedWidth = -1, SavedHeight = -1;
6673  double SavedMinFR = -1, SavedMaxFR = -1;
6674  auto AllSettings = mCameraService->GetSupportedAllSettings();
6675  BOSS_TRACE("Created Camera: %s(%s) [Included %d settings]",
6676  CurCameraInfo.deviceName().toUtf8().constData(),
6677  CurCameraInfo.description().toUtf8().constData(), AllSettings.size());
6678  BOSS_TRACE(" - Setting Count: %d", AllSettings.size());
6679  foreach(const auto& CurSetting, AllSettings)
6680  {
6681  const sint32 CurWidth = CurSetting.resolution().width();
6682  const sint32 CurHeight = CurSetting.resolution().height();
6683  const double CurMinFR = CurSetting.minimumFrameRate();
6684  const double CurMaxFR = CurSetting.maximumFrameRate();
6685  BOSS_TRACE(" - 1.Supported Resolution: %dx%d", CurWidth, CurHeight);
6686  BOSS_TRACE(" - 2.Supported PixelFormat: %d", (sint32) CurSetting.pixelFormat());
6687  BOSS_TRACE(" - 3.Supported FrameRate: %f~%f", (float) CurMinFR, (float) CurMaxFR);
6688  bool IsFinded = false;
6689  if(width == -1 && height == -1)
6690  {
6691  if(BestValue <= CurWidth * CurHeight)
6692  {
6693  BestValue = CurWidth * CurHeight;
6694  IsFinded = true;
6695  }
6696  }
6697  else if(width == -1)
6698  {
6699  if(height == CurHeight && BestValue <= CurWidth)
6700  {
6701  BestValue = CurWidth;
6702  IsFinded = true;
6703  }
6704  }
6705  else if(height == -1)
6706  {
6707  if(width == CurWidth && BestValue <= CurHeight)
6708  {
6709  BestValue = CurHeight;
6710  IsFinded = true;
6711  }
6712  }
6713  else if(width == CurWidth && height == CurHeight)
6714  IsFinded = true;
6715  if(IsFinded)
6716  {
6717  SavedWidth = CurWidth;
6718  SavedHeight = CurHeight;
6719  SavedMinFR = CurMinFR;
6720  SavedMaxFR = CurMaxFR;
6721  }
6722  }
6723 
6724  QCameraViewfinderSettings NewSettings = mCameraService->GetSettings();
6725  if(SavedWidth != -1 && SavedHeight != -1)
6726  NewSettings.setResolution(SavedWidth, SavedHeight);
6727  else NewSettings.setResolution(640, 480);
6728  if(SavedMinFR != -1) NewSettings.setMinimumFrameRate(SavedMinFR);
6729  if(SavedMaxFR != -1) NewSettings.setMaximumFrameRate(SavedMaxFR);
6730  mCameraService->SetSettings(NewSettings);
6731  mCameraService->StartCamera();
6732  break;
6733  }
6734  }
6735  }
6736  ~CameraClass()
6737  {
6738  delete mCameraService;
6739  Bmp::Remove(mLastBitmap);
6740  }
6741 
6742  public:
6743  CameraClass* AddRef()
6744  {
6745  mRefCount++;
6746  return this;
6747  }
6748  bool SubRef()
6749  {
6750  return (--mRefCount == 0);
6751  }
6752  bool IsValid() const
6753  {
6754  return (mCameraService != nullptr);
6755  }
6756  void Capture(bool preview, bool needstop)
6757  {
6758  if(mCameraService)
6759  mCameraService->Capture(preview, needstop);
6760  }
6761  id_texture CloneCapturedTexture(bool bitmapcache)
6762  {
6763  if(mCameraService)
6764  return mCameraService->CloneCapturedTexture(bitmapcache);
6765  return nullptr;
6766  }
6767  id_image_read LastCapturedImage(sint32 maxwidth, sint32 maxheight, sint32 rotate)
6768  {
6769  if(mCameraService)
6770  {
6771  mCameraService->GetCapturedImage(mLastPixmap, maxwidth, maxheight, rotate);
6772  return (id_image_read) &mLastPixmap;
6773  }
6774  return nullptr;
6775  }
6776  id_bitmap_read LastCapturedBitmap(orientationtype ori)
6777  {
6778  if(mCameraService)
6779  {
6780  mCameraService->GetCapturedBitmap(mLastBitmap, ori);
6781  return mLastBitmap;
6782  }
6783  return nullptr;
6784  }
6785  size64 LastCapturedSize() const
6786  {
6787  if(mCameraService)
6788  return mCameraService->GetCapturedSize();
6789  return {0, 0};
6790  }
6791  uint64 LastCapturedTimeMsec(sint32* avgmsec) const
6792  {
6793  if(mCameraService)
6794  return mCameraService->GetCapturedTimeMsec(avgmsec);
6795  return 0;
6796  }
6797  sint32 TotalPictureShotCount() const
6798  {
6799  if(mCameraService)
6800  return mCameraService->GetPictureShotCount();
6801  return 0;
6802  }
6803  sint32 TotalPreviewShotCount() const
6804  {
6805  if(mCameraService)
6806  return mCameraService->GetPreviewShotCount();
6807  return 0;
6808  }
6809  };
6810  #else
6811  class CameraSurface : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
6812  #endif
6813 
6814  #ifdef QT_HAVE_MULTIMEDIA
6815  class MicrophoneClass : public QAudioProbe
6816  {
6817  Q_OBJECT
6818 
6819  private:
6820  class Data
6821  {
6822  public:
6823  Data() {}
6824  ~Data() {}
6825  public:
6826  Data(const Data& rhs) {operator=(rhs);}
6827  Data& operator=(const Data& rhs)
6828  {
6829  mPcm = rhs.mPcm;
6830  mTimeMsec = rhs.mTimeMsec;
6831  return *this;
6832  }
6833  operator void*() const {return nullptr;}
6834  bool operator!() const {return (mPcm.Count() == 0);}
6835  public:
6836  uint08s mPcm;
6837  uint64 mTimeMsec;
6838  };
6839 
6840  private:
6841  QAudioRecorder* mRecorder;
6842  QAudioEncoderSettings mAudioSettings;
6843  const sint32 mMaxQueueCount;
6844  Queue<Data> mDataQueue;
6845  Data mLastData;
6846 
6847  public:
6848  static Strings GetList(String* spec)
6849  {
6850  Strings Result;
6851  Context SpecCollector;
6852  const QList<QAudioDeviceInfo>& AllMicrophones = QAudioDeviceInfo::availableDevices(QAudio::AudioInput);
6853  foreach(const auto& CurMicrophone, AllMicrophones)
6854  {
6855  String CurName = CurMicrophone.deviceName().toUtf8().constData();
6856  Result.AtAdding() = CurName;
6857  if(spec)
6858  {
6859  Context& NewChild = SpecCollector.At(SpecCollector.LengthOfIndexable());
6860  NewChild.At("devicename").Set(CurName);
6861  const auto& AllByteOrders = CurMicrophone.supportedByteOrders();
6862  foreach(const auto& CurByteOrder, AllByteOrders)
6863  {
6864  Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("byteorders").At(NewChild.At("byteorders").LengthOfIndexable());
6865  if(CurByteOrder == QAudioFormat::BigEndian) NewChild2.Set("BigEndian");
6866  else if(CurByteOrder == QAudioFormat::LittleEndian) NewChild2.Set("LittleEndian");
6867  }
6868  const auto& AllChannelCounts = CurMicrophone.supportedChannelCounts();
6869  foreach(const auto& CurChannelCount, AllChannelCounts)
6870  {
6871  Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("channelcounts").At(NewChild.At("channelcounts").LengthOfIndexable());
6872  NewChild2.Set(String::FromInteger(CurChannelCount));
6873  }
6874  const auto& AllCodecs = CurMicrophone.supportedCodecs();
6875  foreach(const auto& CurCodec, AllCodecs)
6876  {
6877  Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("codecs").At(NewChild.At("codecs").LengthOfIndexable());
6878  NewChild2.Set(CurCodec.toUtf8().constData());
6879  }
6880  const auto& AllSampleRates = CurMicrophone.supportedSampleRates();
6881  foreach(const auto& CurSampleRate, AllSampleRates)
6882  {
6883  Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("samplerates").At(NewChild.At("samplerates").LengthOfIndexable());
6884  NewChild2.Set(String::FromInteger(CurSampleRate));
6885  }
6886  const auto& AllSampleSizes = CurMicrophone.supportedSampleSizes();
6887  foreach(const auto& CurSampleSize, AllSampleSizes)
6888  {
6889  Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("samplesizes").At(NewChild.At("samplesizes").LengthOfIndexable());
6890  NewChild2.Set(String::FromInteger(CurSampleSize));
6891  }
6892  const auto& AllSampleTypes = CurMicrophone.supportedSampleTypes();
6893  foreach(const auto& CurSampleType, AllSampleTypes)
6894  {
6895  Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("sampletypes").At(NewChild.At("sampletypes").LengthOfIndexable());
6896  if(CurSampleType == QAudioFormat::Unknown) NewChild2.Set("Unknown");
6897  else if(CurSampleType == QAudioFormat::SignedInt) NewChild2.Set("SignedInt");
6898  else if(CurSampleType == QAudioFormat::UnSignedInt) NewChild2.Set("UnSignedInt");
6899  else if(CurSampleType == QAudioFormat::Float) NewChild2.Set("Float");
6900  }
6901  }
6902  }
6903  if(spec)
6904  *spec = SpecCollector.SaveJson(*spec);
6905  return Result;
6906  }
6907 
6908  public:
6909  MicrophoneClass(chars name, sint32 maxcount) : mMaxQueueCount(maxcount)
6910  {
6911  mRecorder = new QAudioRecorder();
6912  QString SelectedInput = "";
6913  if(*name != '\0')
6914  {
6915  QStringList Inputs = mRecorder->audioInputs();
6916  foreach(QString Input, Inputs)
6917  if(!String::Compare(name, Input.toUtf8().constData()))
6918  SelectedInput = Input;
6919  }
6920  else SelectedInput = mRecorder->defaultAudioInput();
6921  if(SelectedInput.length() == 0)
6922  {
6923  delete mRecorder;
6924  mRecorder = nullptr;
6925  return;
6926  }
6927  mRecorder->setAudioInput(SelectedInput);
6928 
6929  mAudioSettings = mRecorder->audioSettings();
6930  mAudioSettings.setCodec("audio/pcm");
6931  mAudioSettings.setBitRate(128000);
6932  mAudioSettings.setChannelCount(2);
6933  mAudioSettings.setSampleRate(44100);
6934  mAudioSettings.setQuality(QMultimedia::HighQuality);
6935  mAudioSettings.setEncodingMode(QMultimedia::ConstantBitRateEncoding);
6936  mRecorder->setAudioSettings(mAudioSettings);
6937 
6938  connect(this, SIGNAL(audioBufferProbed(QAudioBuffer)), this, SLOT(processBuffer(QAudioBuffer)));
6939  setSource(mRecorder);
6940  mRecorder->record();
6941  }
6942  ~MicrophoneClass()
6943  {
6944  setSource((QMediaRecorder*) nullptr);
6945  delete mRecorder;
6946  while(0 < mDataQueue.Count())
6947  mDataQueue.Dequeue();
6948  }
6949 
6950  public:
6951  bool IsValid()
6952  {
6953  return (mRecorder != nullptr);
6954  }
6955  bool TryLastData()
6956  {
6957  if(0 < mDataQueue.Count())
6958  {
6959  mLastData = mDataQueue.Dequeue();
6960  return true;
6961  }
6962  return false;
6963  }
6964  const uint08s& GetLastData(uint64* timems) const
6965  {
6966  if(timems) *timems = mLastData.mTimeMsec;
6967  return mLastData.mPcm;
6968  }
6969  const QAudioEncoderSettings& GetAudioSettings() const
6970  {return mAudioSettings;}
6971 
6972  private slots:
6973  virtual void processBuffer(const QAudioBuffer& buffer)
6974  {
6975  // 한계처리
6976  while(mMaxQueueCount < mDataQueue.Count())
6977  mDataQueue.Dequeue();
6978  // 데이터적재
6979  if(buffer.isValid())
6980  {
6981  Data NewData;
6982  Memory::Copy(NewData.mPcm.AtDumpingAdded(buffer.byteCount()), buffer.constData(), buffer.byteCount());
6983  NewData.mTimeMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
6984  mDataQueue.Enqueue(NewData);
6985  }
6986  }
6987  };
6988  #else
6989  class MicrophoneClass : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
6990  #endif
6991 
6992 #elif defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(QT_DLL)
6993 
6994  // 플랫폼매크로를 변경하였을때 아래 코드가 없으면
6995  // Qt는 moc를 다시 빌드하지 않아 링크에러를 유발.
6996  #include <QtWidgets>
6997  #include <QMainWindow>
6998  #include <QSystemTrayIcon>
6999  #include <QHostInfo>
7000  #include <QTcpSocket>
7001  #include <QUdpSocket>
7002  #include <QTcpServer>
7003  #include <QGLWidget>
7004  #include <QGLFunctions>
7005  #include <QGLShaderProgram>
7006  #include <QAbstractVideoSurface>
7007  #include <QAudioProbe>
7008  #include <QWebEngineView>
7009 
7010  class ViewAPI : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7011  class GenericView : public QFrame {Q_OBJECT};
7012  class MainViewGL : public QGLWidget {Q_OBJECT};
7013  class MainViewMDI : public QMdiArea {Q_OBJECT};
7014  class TrayIcon : public QSystemTrayIcon {Q_OBJECT};
7015  class MainWindow : public QMainWindow {Q_OBJECT};
7016  class EditTracker : public QLineEdit {Q_OBJECT};
7017  class ListTracker : public QListWidget {Q_OBJECT};
7018  class ThreadClass : public QThread {Q_OBJECT};
7019  class TCPAgent : public QTcpServer {Q_OBJECT};
7020  class PipePrivate : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7021  class PipeServerPrivate : public PipePrivate {Q_OBJECT};
7022  class PipeClientPrivate : public PipePrivate {Q_OBJECT};
7023  class WebEngineViewForExtraDesktop : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7024  class WebViewPrivate : public WebEngineViewClass {Q_OBJECT};
7025  class PurchasePrivate : public QInAppStore {Q_OBJECT};
7026  class CameraSurface : public QAbstractVideoSurface {Q_OBJECT};
7027  class MicrophoneClass : public QAudioProbe {Q_OBJECT};
7028 
7029 #endif
